Expect more. Connect more. Be more at Diebold Nixdorf. Our teams automate, digitize, and transform the way more than 75 million people around the globe bank and shop in this hyper-connected, consumer-centric world. Join us in connecting people to commerce in this vital, rewarding role. We are looking for Field Service Technicians located in Bangkok . Installs, debugs and provides technical maintenance for product and component hardware and software, mainly on customer premises. Provides scheduled inspection, cleaning and other services and performs minor product repairs within an assigned territory. Inspects products for correct operation and resolves noted issues and / or escalates according to established procedure. Schedules services, completes all required paperwork and works with customers to ensure satisfaction with service delivery and understanding of product functionality. ในฐานะ Field Service Technician ที่ Diebold Nixdorf, คุณมีหน้าที่รับผิดชอบในการติดตั้ง ตรวจสอบ และให้การบํารุงรักษาทางเทคนิคสําหรับฮาร์ดแวร์และซอฟต์แวร์ของผลิตภัณฑ์ ซึ่งส่วนใหญ่อยู่ในสถานที่ของลูกค้า คุณจะดําเนินการตรวจสอบ ทําความสะอาด และบริการอื่นๆ ตามกําหนดเวลา รวมถึงดําเนินการซ่อมแซมผลิตภัณฑ์เล็กน้อยภายในเขตที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณจะตรวจสอบผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อการทํางานที่ถูกต้องและแก้ไขปัญหาและ/หรือส่งต่อตามขั้นตอนที่กําหนดไว้ กรอกเอกสารที่จําเป็นทั้งหมด และทํางานร่วมกับลูกค้าเพื่อให้มั่นใจในความพึงพอใจกับการส่งมอบบริการและความเข้าใจในฟังก์ชันการทํางานของผลิตภัณฑ์ RESPONSIBILITIES Installs, debugs and provides technical maintenance for ATMs, retail and other equipment within an assigned customer and / or product area. Performs all incident handling, preventive maintenance, IMAC / R and customer training duties as follows: Incident Handling: Utilizes diagnostic tools to perform troubleshooting via detailed analysis of hardware and software failures. Performs hardware repairs on a component level. Cleans and adjusts mechanical components. Configures and installs applicable software. Preventive Maintenance: Performs routine checks according to documented procedures. Refills consumables as directed. IMAC/R: Installs, moves, adds, changes and removes hardware and software products. Customer Training: Instructs and trains customers on usage and operation of installed hardware and software. Also performs the following: Process Tasks: Receives incident briefing sand orders from the dispatch function. Updates the dispatch function on all unforeseen issues. Provides detailed briefings on all performed activities. Proactively informs customers about status, progress and outcomes. Continuous Process Improvement: Observes technical or process problems, informing manager / other relevant personnel and offering improvement recommendations. Actively uses corporate tools and processes for knowledge sharing and information gathering. QUALIFICATIONS Required Qualifications • มีวุฒิการศึกษาหรือมีประสบการณ์ทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง •มีประสบการณ์ที่เกี่ยวข้องใน Field service อย่างน้อย 2-4 ปี •มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดีทั้งการพูดและการเขียน • มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่ตามกฎหมาย และข้อกําหนดของยานพาหนะของ DN Education or equivalent work experience required. Minimum of 2-4 years of relevant experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in Field Service. Good written and verbal communication skills. Driver's license and driving record that satisfies DN's fleet requirements.

เปิดรับสมัคร Project engineer หลายตำแหน่ง คุณสมบัติ - ชาย/หญิง ช่วงวัย 28-45 ปี - วุฒิการศึกษาระดับ ปริญญาตรี สาขา วิศวกรรมโยธา - ประสบการณ์ทำงาน 3 ปีขึ้นไป - มีใบอนุญาตประกอบวิชาชีพวิศวกรรมโยรา (กว.) - มีความรับผิดชอบสูงและมีความสามารถในการบริหารงานก่อสร้าง หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ - สามารถรับผิดชอบงานได้มากกว่า 1 โครงการ - ประสานงานกับวิศวกรสนามเพื่อวางแผนงานก่อสร้าง ให้ดำเนินการเป็นไปตามแผนงานก่อสร้าง - จัดทำ Schedule งานก่อสร้าง และติดตาม Progress ให้เป็นไปตามงวดงาน - ติดตามรวบรวมข้อมูลของแต่ละไซต์งาน และ จัดทำรายงานความคืบหน้าประจำเดือน - สามารถทำงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย เงินเดือน 35,000-65,000บาท หรือตามประสบการณ์ สวัสดิการ - สนับสนุนให้เข้าร่วมฝึกอบรมและสัมมนาเพื่อความก้าวหน้าในสายอาชีพ - โบนัสประจำปี - ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา (OT) สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน - จันทบุรี - ตราด - ระยอง ติดต่อสมัครงาน พี่นัน 0928741935 Facebook : Choksomrit_Design

Job_Description: Job summary: ออกแบบงานระบบไฟฟ้าและเครื่องกลสำหรับอาคารศูนย์การค้า ถอดปริมาณงานและตรวจสอบการคิดราคางานวิศวกรรมระบบ ตรวจสอบงานติดตั้งและงานทดสอบวิศวกรรมระบบ วางแผนและกำกับดูแลงานก่อสร้างให้เป็นไปตามแบบและงบประมาณและระยะเวลาที่กำหนดไว้ Qualifications: วุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป  สาขา วิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า-เครื่องกล ประสบการณ์ 10  ปีขึ้นไป  ด้านบริหารงานก่อสร้าง  หรืองานออกแบบวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า-เครื่องกล หากมีประสบการณ์ในธุรกิจศูนย์การค้า  โรงแรม หรือ ธุรกิจพัฒนาอสังหาริมทรัพย์ จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ Auto CAD, 3D, Ms.Project กระตือรือร้น มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์  และแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี ประสานงานเก่ง  มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี

We’re Nestle, We’re the biggest food and beverages company in the world who believe in “enhancing quality of life and contributing to a healthier future.” Join us and be part of Nestle to drive over 2,000 brands in 191 countries worldwide, if you; Love to drive results Love to challenge yourself POSITION SNAPSHOT Location: Rayong Company: Nestlé Business Unit/Division: Technical and Production Contract 3+ years of working experience as project engineer from food manufacturing A DAY IN THE LIFE... Understanding the Scope of Projects: required to thoroughly comprehend the project requirements and objectives, ensuring a clear understanding of the desired outcomes. Writing Basic User Requirement Specifications: responsible for drafting user requirement specifications (URS) that outline the necessary features and functionalities of the project, ensuring alignment with hygienic design principles. Supplier Consultation and Analysis: required to consult with 2-3 suppliers, analyze their offers, and make suggestions based on your evaluation of their capabilities, quality, and pricing. Supplier Selection: Based on analysis, recommend the most suitable supplier(s) for the project, considering factors such as cost-effectiveness, quality, and reliability. Contractor and Factory Activities Organization: responsible for coordinating and organizing contractors and factory activities, ensuring smooth project execution and timely completion. Installation Follow-up: monitor the installation process, ensuring adherence to project specifications, quality standards, and timelines. ARE YOU A FIT? Proven experience as a Project Engineer is a plus, preferably in the field of small capex projects. Strong knowledge of hygienic design principles and their application in project execution. Ability to independently comprehend project scopes and write basic user requirement specifications. Proactive approach to problem-solving and ability to propose innovative solutions. Strong analytical skills to evaluate supplier offers and make informed recommendations. Effective communication and negotiation skills to liaise with suppliers, contractors, and internal stakeholders. Ability to work under tight deadlines.

Position: Operation Engineer Type of hiring: Permanent Location: Bangkok Working: 6 Days/Week Responsibilities: The role of an Electrical Operation Engineer in a wastewater treatment company is essential for maintaining the reliability and efficiency of electrical systems critical to the treatment process and environmental protection. Equipment Maintenance and Troubleshooting: Oversee the maintenance, repair, and troubleshooting of electrical equipment and systems used in wastewater treatment processes, such as pumps, motors, control panels, and instrumentation. Perform regular inspections and preventive maintenance to ensure equipment operates efficiently and safely. Diagnose and address electrical faults, failures, and malfunctions in a timely manner to minimize downtime. Process Monitoring and Control: Monitor the performance of electrical systems that control and automate wastewater treatment processes. Adjust control parameters and settings to optimize process efficiency, ensure compliance with environmental regulations, and maintain treatment quality. Emergency Response: Develop and implement contingency plans for electrical equipment failures or emergencies to minimize disruptions to the treatment process. Respond quickly and effectively to critical situations to prevent environmental and operational risks. Safety and Compliance: Ensure that all electrical systems and equipment are installed and operated in compliance with relevant safety codes, standards, and regulations. Participate in safety audits and inspections to identify potential hazards and implement corrective actions. Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of equipment maintenance, repairs, and modifications. Prepare reports detailing equipment performance, maintenance activities, and any incidents or issues. Training and Development: Provide training and guidance to operational staff on electrical systems, safety protocols, and proper maintenance procedures. Stay updated on industry trends, technological advancements, and best practices related to electrical systems in wastewater treatment. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including process engineers, maintenance technicians, and management, to ensure smooth operation of the treatment facility. Communicate effectively with team members and superiors regarding equipment status, maintenance schedules, and any potential issues. Energy Efficiency and Optimization: Identify opportunities to improve energy efficiency within the wastewater treatment process through electrical system upgrades and optimizations. Implement energy-saving initiatives while maintaining treatment effectiveness. Continuous Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement and cost reduction within the electrical operations. Propose and implement innovative solutions to enhance equipment performance and operational efficiency. Budget and Resource Management: Assist in budget planning and resource allocation for electrical maintenance and operations. Manage inventory of spare parts and supplies required for electrical equipment maintenance. New Projects and Installations: Participate in the design, installation, and commissioning of new electrical systems and equipment for expansion or upgrades of the wastewater treatment facility. Environmental Stewardship: Contribute to the company's environmental goals by ensuring the proper functioning of electrical systems that play a crucial role in maintaining water quality and compliance. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field. Minimum 3 years of experience as an Operation Engineer in wastewater treatment works or related field. Have H&S Certificate - Confined Space and Safety Officer Technical level. Good command of English (Writing, Listening, and Speaking ). Able to work under pressure and in teams.

Key Responsibilities Control and supervise mechanical maintenance work assigned by supervisor Coordinate with other staff to improve the equipment efficiency to ensure equipment reliability, availability and plant performance within budget, safety, and environment regulation Prepare work reports concerning types of repairs made, materials used, and cost of completed work assignments Recommend repairs, supervise the mechanical maintenance of tools and equipment, and determine work procedures Schedule work orders and preventative maintenance plan Inspect equipment and supplies to ensure equipment and machinery reliability Maintain maintenance record and report to supervisor Define problems and propose solutions to improve reliability of equipment and machinery Ensure to practice according Qualification Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering or other related fields 3 years of working experience in maintenance with minimum 1-year direct experience in power plant operations or power generator equipment maintenance Knowledge of mechanical engineering, operation and maintenance and project management are preferable IT and computer literacy Working Location: B.Grimm BIP Power 1,2 Limited. Bangkadi Industrial Park, Phatum Thani

Skills Possess strong technical background in equipment / automation / software / facility & equipment maintenance. Good written & spoken English. Other languages will be an advantage. Experience with thermal transfer printers, barcode/RFID scanners and applications software would be an advantage. Good project and time management skills. Creative with strong analytical, problem-solving and decision-making skills. Excellent team player with good interpersonal skills. Willing to travel within SEA region. Able to work independently.

Job_Title: Project Engineer (M&E)/ผู้จัดการงานระบบ/วิศวกรงานระบบ
Job_Description: 1.ถอดแบบ ประมาณราคา ตรวจเช็ค แก้ไข ปรับปรุง รวบรวมเอกสาร Spec สรุป BOQ. งานระบบ (ผ่านงานร้านอาหารเเละโรงพยาบาลจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) 2.ตรวจเช็คราคาวัสดุ ก่อนนำเข้า Site.งาน จัดหา จัดจ้าง ผู้รับเหมารายย่อย เข้าดำเนิน งานระบบประกอบอาคาร 3.ตรวจเช็ค ปรับแก้ไขแผนงาน ที่ใช้ในการดำเนินงานในแต่ล่ะ Project พร้อมนำเสนอเพื่อขออนุมัติ 4.ตรวจเช็ครวบรวมเเละออกเเบบ Shop Dwg. M&E เพื่อส่งขออนุมัติ 5.ควบคุมการดำเนินงาน จัดหาวัสดุ อุปกรณ์ งานระบบ ,วัสดุตัวอย่าง เพื่อขออนุมัติ 6.ควบคุมดูแล ให้คำปรึกษา ประสานงาน กับผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องในการดำเนินงาน ให้ผู้รับเหมารายย่อยดำเนินงานให้เสร็จ ทันตามแผนงานที่ได้วางไว้ พร้อมส่งตรวจ 7.ตรวจเช็ค ปรับแก้ไข ปริมาณงาน และจัดทำเอกสารการเบิกงวดงานของ บริษัท และของผู้รับเหมารายย่อย เพื่อยื่นขออนุมัติ 8.Test Commissioning กับทางโครงการ 9.ตรวจเช็ค ปรับปรุงแก้ไข รวบรวมเอกสารต่างๆ ของ วัสดุ อุปกรณ์ที่ใช้ใน Project 10.โครงการของบริษัทอยู่ในกรุงเทพเเละปริมณฑล มีงานกลางคืนบางโครงการ 11.มีความรู้ด้านงานระบบไฟฟ้า,ระบบสุขาภิบาล,ระบบปรับอากาศ,ระบบเเก๊ซ,ระบบระบายอากาศที่เกี่ยวข้อง

Job_Title: Facility & Energy Engineer (1-3 years of work experience)
Job_Description: Responsibilities Scope of work Planning utility machine operation and maintenance. Design facility engineering for support production and new renovation/construction. Design facility machine troubleshooting and machine maintenance improvement. Design energy saving project and CO2 reduction. Oversea facility project collaboration with Denso group. External facility project collaboration with other companies and university. Facility system & machine concern Electric low-high voltage system Air condition and air ventilation system Air compressor system Water treatment and wastewater treatment system Co-generation system Solar roof top system Diesel generator and fire protection system Building automation and online energy management system Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Energy Engineering. GPA > 2.50 up TOEIC Score 400 up 1-3 years of experience in Facility & Energy Management. Can use English for communication.

Job_Description: Job description Following an anticipated increase in work volume year-on-year, we have new job open positions for Proposal Engineers to join our company. Technical and Commercial authoring/writing of every proposal under Individual’s responsibility, with support from GCME Division Manager – Proposal Operations where required. Due to hybrid nature of this role, the Individual must be able to work independently to focus on proposal development. Qualification Must have Work Experience Background in Refinery & Petrochemical Plants. Must have at least 4 years of Experience in developing EPC Proposals or Tenders for Refinery & Petrochemical projects. Experience in authoring of technical & commercial proposal documentation is preferable. Experience in a Engineering & Construction environment is preferable. All Nationalities will be considered. Strong English Communications Skills is a must. Preference will be given to candidates who demonstrate strong English Reading, Writing and Understanding Skills. ช่องทางการติดตามงานอื่นๆ - Facebook: GCME Recruitment | Facebook [link removed] - Linkedin: GC Maintenance and Engineering Co., Ltd.: My Company | LinkedIn [link removed] - Website: ร่วมงานกับเรา • บริษัท จีซี เมนเทนแนนซ์ แอนด์ เอนจิเนียริง จํากัด (gcme.co.th) [link removed]

Job Responsibilities Provide instruction, guidance and training in the development of new processes and in the resolution of manufacturing problems Participate with product engineering to design parts for manufacturability Provide productivity improvements to reduce total manufacturing cycle time Reduce overall costs through tooling and process improvements Provide robust processes, tools and gages to reduce variation in the manufacturing process. Company: China Petroleum Pipeline Bureau (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: DUTIES, RESPONSIBILITIES, AUTHORITIES AND ACCOUNTABILITIES The Senior Pipeline Engineer performs a wide range of duties including some or all of the following: Responsible for correctness and accuracy of the engineering deliverables issued on the Project deliverables. This responsibility includes guiding/training of discipline engineers as required and close coordination with the Engineering Manager; Checks project drawings, documentation, calculations, the Material Requisition, technical evaluations and manpower estimates, etc. to ensure accuracy and completeness; Coordinates activities under own responsibility with other disciplines to ensure effective progress and avoid duplication of effort; Collects inputs on queries, reviews them and passes to the Engineering Manager for resolution; Attends design review meetings to provide advice and expertise on engineering aspects; Coordinates the various engineering inputs for consideration in project bid preparation; Ensures all necessary completion action is taken upon project completion; Mentors subordinate engineers; Compliance in accordance with HSE Engineering Standard; Maintain compliance with all company policies and procedures; Participate in the planning and creation of drawings and designs involving detailed analysis and design of alignment sheet, typical drawings, road crossings, river crossing etc.; Check pipeline specifications, data sheets, design basis, materials, calculation and scope; Check all engineering work before being released including designs, drawings, code and integration with other disciplines; Conducts site visits, liaises with clients and site personnel as required. EDUCATION AND WORK EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS Minimum of Bachelor’s Degree or higher qualification in an engineering discipline from a reputable college or university; Minimum of 10 years proven work experience in the petro-chemical/oil and gas industry; Experience of leading engineering work in EPC projects; Conversant with international Standards in pipeline engineering.

Job_Title: Tire Material Development - Raw Material (Junior Staff)
Company: Bridgestone Asia Pacific Technology Center Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Responsibilities include raw material 2nd source approval, sustainable material supplier development and raw material maintenance such as shelf-life extension, trouble shooting. Responsibilities: Raw Material 2nd Source Approval Approve competitive 2nd source in CAP region collaborating with procurement and TCJ in order to contribute to spec optimization, BCP and source localization. Conduct lab study and plant trials to confirm required properties in target. Issue raw material approval form with TCJ support. Sustainable Material Supplier Development Seek potential suppliers which can supply existing sustainable materials. Investigate new material or technology related to sustainable materials and conduct screening. Report to TCJ for further development as new material. Raw Material Maintenance Promote process change approval requested from supplier. Shelf-life extension judgment. Take prompt action to plant issues related to raw material. Qualification: Bachelor’s degree or higher in chemistry related. Especially polymer category. Be able to communicate fluently in English. (TOEIC > 650 scores) General knowledge of chemistry related. Proficiency in MS office: Excel, Word, Powerpoint Demonstrated problem-solving with logical thinking.

EXPERIENCE At least 0-3 years experience in oil/chemical industry is advantage. EDUCATION Bachelor or higher in Chemical Engineering, Chemical Technology., Petrochemical Engineering. or equivalent. OTHER REQUIREMENTS - Good command of English and computer literacy - Work @ Sriracha, Chonburi ROLE & RESPONSIBILITY - Provide all technological support to APUs and own discipline in order to improve efficiency of process operations, reliability and financial performance in the short and long term business and legislative requirements.

Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Maintenance Engineer to join our dynamic team. If you are a proactive and innovative Maintenance Engineer with a passion for driving continuous improvement, we invite you to apply and contribute to the success of our organization. Responsibilities: Supervision for Machine Installation and Upgrade: Oversee the installation and upgrade of machines, ensuring compliance with safety and quality standards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to coordinate and execute installation projects efficiently. Supervision for Refurbishing Machines: Lead the refurbishment process for machines, including planning, scheduling, and executing maintenance activities. Investigate, Analyze, and Report Problems: Identify and analyze machinery and equipment problems, and develop effective solutions. Generate comprehensive reports on the root causes of issues and recommend preventive measures. Focus on Innovation in the Facility: Drive a culture of innovation within the maintenance team. Identify and implement new technologies and methodologies to improve efficiency and reduce downtime. Participating in Kaizen Activity: Actively participate in Kaizen events to enhance continuous improvement in maintenance processes and collaborate with team members to implement Kaizen initiatives and drive positive change. Authorize Leave and Other Concern Requests: Review and authorize leave requests, ensuring adequate coverage for maintenance activities and resolving other concerns raised by team members in a timely and effective manner. Report Accidents and Join the Investigation: Report any accidents or incidents promptly participate in investigations and implement corrective actions to prevent the recurrence of accidents. Hold an Associate Electrical Engineer License Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Electrical Engineering with Engineering license (กว.) Experience in facility and maintenance engineering. Good command of written and spoken English. Good computer skills and presentation skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Knowledge of safety regulations and best practices. Excellent communication and leadership skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a team and independently when required. Able to work 6 days (Monday to Saturday)

Job_Title: Permit and License Assistant Manager - Manager
Job_Description: Job Summary Obtain and monitor permit/license process for construction and operation phase of all company project to ensure regulatory compliance and corporate governance to deliver efficiency and on time commitment of permit license process with effective cost and quality aligning with function work plan. Coordinate with regulators and related party to ensure process continuity and completion, data accuracy and readiness. Duties and Responsibilities Obtain necessary permit for construction (cogeneration & renewable) and operation (cogeneration) phase of company project while coordinating with related stakeholder both of external and internal parties Monitor permit license operating process to ensure efficiency, quality of work and all permits will be done within timeline Manage and maintain data, necessary document, and file to ensure accuracy and readiness Provide and distribute relevant data or document to related internal party as requested Analyze and develop executive reports that related to permit and license functions as requested Provide guidance and suggestion on the interpretation and application of permit license condition, related regulation and procedures to management, other functions, and subordinates Provide Business Solution related to business permit and license functions as requested Provide Data Monitoring related to business permit and license functions, if assigned Perform other related duties as assigned Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Electrical Engineering, Electrical Power field is  preferable Knowledgeable, understand and experience in Energy Market and Policy or project management or permit license process Act as liaison between the company and related license agencies Proficient in coordination, project management and negotiation skills Ability to handle all required permit from diverse internal stakeholder Ability to prioritized and manage multiple assigned tasks Have a good attitude, compliance mindset, and prioritized preferred Working Location: Krungthepkreetha, Bangkok

Responsibilities Manage customers and accounts as assigned Explore new customers and maintain positive relationship with customers Timely response to customers' enquiries Contribute new ideas to achieve business targets Price negotiation, process optimization To liaise with different teams and ensure client satisfaction consistently Requirements Diploma holder or above , preferably in Electronics, Electrical or Mechanical Engineering At least 4 years of sales experience, preferably in interconnect components Good communication & presentation skill Proficient in written and spoken English Target-oriented, aggressive, self-motivated, disciplined and able to work under pressure

Job_Title: Thailand Security and SHE Manager (ID: 571974)/**One Year Contract**
Company: PERSOLKELLY HR Services Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Thailand Security and SHE Manager (1 year contract) Bangkok Responsible for the Thailand Market on the planning, execution and management of the group/ regional/ local physical security directives, policies, and procedures with an overall objective, to protect the security and safety of employees, and safeguard corporate assets and its reputation. Actively seek and promote an appropriate level of communication and deliver a collaborative, business partner approach to all stakeholders (brands, boutiques, support functions, external partners/ suppliers); Review all physical security, health, safety and environment aspects, topics and requirements of all boutiques and facilities. Lead, conduct and review all risk assessments (PSHSE Topics) for all Boutiques and facilities, ensuring PSHSE concepts are duly submitted and documented. To collaborate with Store Planning & Design (SDP) and Back Office Services (BOS) teams to ensure appropriate execution of physical and technical PS & HSE measures To design, source and coordinate with 3rd party security vendor(s) for the implementation of security system Monitoring risks for incoming and/or outgoing business travelers, ensure coordination with stakeholders and issuance of advisory in consultation with SAO PSHSE Director and the IMT Team; Ensuring that emergency response plans are available and tested for emergencies, such as adverse weather, fires, crime, or other identified threats; Support the implementation of the physical security related aspects of the Group Security Policy and it’s Minimum Standards. Proactively and strategically working with vendors on ensuring KPI’s and SLA are agreed and delivered; Ensuring that all Thailand Incident Management Teams are set-up, maintained, trained, and exercised to coordinate the response activities in the event of a major incident; QUALIFICATIONS: University Degree or above, preferably in physical security, security risk management; Board certified ASIS PSP or CPP would be an advantage; Minimum 5 years of working experience in leading Physical Security, Health, safety and environment responsibilities regionally, preferably in managerial position and/or in luxury retail industry; Work experience in MNC preferred; Individual must possess strong communications, interpersonal and lateral leadership skills in order to nurture professional relationships amongst all stakeholders Independent individual must be capable of operating strategically within a dynamic region coupling with a complex and matricular business environment. Adequate knowledge and experience in security operations and project management, electronic security systems, security risk assessment; working / operational knowledge of Health, Safety and environment. Proficient digital savvy skills (e.g. MS Office, MS Visio, AutoCAD, Adobe tools). Proficient in English and Thai language is ideal to manage the local market and business stakeholders

Position: Senior Project Engineer – Wind Energy Type: Permanent Location: Asok (Work remote is an option) Job Description: Wind project leadership: Lead the planning, execution, and completion of wind energy projects, including wind farm installations and turbine deployments. Provide strategic guidance to project teams for successful project delivery. Turbine design and development: Oversee the design and development of wind turbines, collaborating with engineering teams to ensure optimal performance and efficiency. Conduct feasibility studies and technical assessments. Stakeholder management: Interface with clients, government agencies, and internal stakeholders to understand project objectives, address regulatory requirements, and communicate project progress. Cultivate strong relationships to facilitate effective collaboration. Quality Assurance in Wind Projects: Implement rigorous quality control measures to ensure wind energy projects meet industry standards and environmental regulations. Conduct regular inspections and audits to uphold safety protocols. Budget and Resources Management for Wind Farms: Develop and manage projects budgets, closely monitoring expenditures and resource allocation for wind farms. Optimize resource utilization to enhance project efficiency. Regulatory Compliance in Wind Energy: Ensure wind projects comply with local and international regulations, codes, and standards. Stay informed about advancements in wind energy technologies and integrate best practices into project workflows. Wind Project Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate and comprehensive project documentation, including environmental impact assessments. Prepare detailed report on Wind project progress, challenges, and resolutions. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or master’s degree in engineering, with a focus on electrical, mechanical, renewable energy, wind energy, or related field. Extensive experience (typically 8-10 years) in wind energy project management, demonstrating progressive roles in project engineering. Experience within consulting firms will be advantage. Proven track record of successful wind project completion. In-depth knowledge of wind energy principles, wind turbine technology, and relevant design software. Familiarity with industry-specific tools and methodologies. Strong leadership qualities with the ability to guide and motivate cross-functional teams in wind energy projects. Effective decision making and problem-solving skills. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English for effective collaboration with diverse stakeholders in the Wind Energy sector. Ability to adapt to changing wind project requirements, technological advancement, and industry dynamics. Benefits: Fixed bonus Annual income performance bonus Travel allowance International Travel Insurance Provident Fund

Scope of the role: Initiate the way to eliminate wastefulness in production processes primarily focusing on people efficiency. Develop ways to increase productivity, maximize efficiency and manage human capital more effectively. Improve production processes in many kinds of settings to maximize labor efficiency and minimize use of material resources, while meeting Engineering Spec. Focus on how to get the work done most efficiently, balancing many factors such as time, the number of workers needed, available technology, actions workers need to take, achieving the end product with no errors, workers' safety, environmental concerns, and cost. Key responsibilities: Review production schedules, engineering specifications, process flows, and other information to understand methods and activities in manufacturing and services. Figure out how to manufacture parts or products with maximum efficiency. Understand management control systems to make financial planning and cost analysis. Enact quality control procedures to resolve production problems or minimize costs. Work with Area Managers to develop standards for design and production. Understand control systems to coordinate activities and production planning to ensure that products meet quality standards. Review process flows and other information to understand methods and activities in manufacturing and services. Understand product requirements and design manufacturing and information systems to meet requirements. Study and rearrange material flows and operations sequence. Perform mathematical calculations to determine manufacturing processes. Work with Finance to minimize costs of production lines. Promote a value-added focus through cost-effective waste reduction, elimination of non-value-added steps or processes, and encouragement of value-added improvement activities Work with Finance to assist Production Manager in financial planning and cost analysis. Work with Area Production Manager/Supervisor to evaluate how well people do their jobs and offer improvement wherever needed. Any other assignment as Production Engineering Manager required. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in Industrial Engineering or related field. At least 2 year in the Lean Manufacturing, Continuous Improvement Engineering field. Analytical and Problem solving skills. Strong communication skills in Thai and English. Excellent computer skills in Microsoft Office. Strong time management skills. Able to work under pressure. Team work and able to communicate with all employees level. Working Hours: 45 hours/week (MON-FRI 08.00 AM - 06.00 PM) Interested candidates are invited to apply with a full CV/Resume (PDF file) , stating present and expected salary as well as a recent photograph. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Provide profitable technical, predictive, and proactive maintenance services to strategic customers to achieve or exceed the agreed KPIs. Conduct remote monitoring, Vibration analysis, condition monitoring activities, and periodic report writing for customers from multiple segments within expected delivery timeframes. Create client databases and hierarchies, maintaining and reviewing thresholds and attributes. Achieve time utilization goals and record information accurately and in a timely manner as required into the system. Engage in a high level of involvement with other business units and internal & external stakeholders to achieve the success of projects being handled. QUALIFICATIONS Graduate with a bachelor’s degree in engineering (Mechanical, Electrical Engineering) or equivalent experience. Minimum 5 years of industry experience in the field of Predictive and Proactive Maintenance Services, Asset management, Condition Monitoring, or service delivery. Must have some experience in Visual Inspection, Lubrication practices, Vibration Analysis practices, Machine Reliability, and basic electrical knowledge of applications from multiple industrial segments ISO or ASNT Level II Certification (Vibration Analysis) and above will have an added advantage. Experience in cloud-based/remote monitoring will be an added advantage. Must have a presentable personality, interpersonal skills, and proficient communication skills in the English language (both verbal & written). Comfortable and adaptable to new-age analytical tools for diagnostics in condition monitoring.

The Job Function – the primary function of this position is as follows: 1. To own and lead the demand planning and inventory management process for the respective SBU. 2. To support the leadership team with various analyses to allow better inventory management for the respective SBU while maintaining a high customer service level. Principle Accountabilities 1. Achieving Customer Service (OTIF) Chair the weekly operations call to plan production and customer demand. Apply a customer service mindset in daily operations. Coordinate the backlogs/overdue meetings with customer service & production planners. 2. Establish a Consensus Demand Plan Responsible for coordinating the SBU demand planning activities - (SIOP, consensus forecast), maintaining the optimum balance between service level (OTIF), inventory (stock levels) and new product introduction (phase in/out). 3. To sustain the Demand Plan Outlook To standardize the process related to demand planning for SBU. Use statistical forecast to generate reliable base demand plan on-monthly-basis with the support from demand review with commercial & site team. Review forecast against actual sales and consumption and coordinate with planners for replenishment and stock readiness. 4. Driving SIOP Process To prepare the demand review deck (presentation) to facilitate the SIOP meeting; participate and document the actions registers (minute meetings) and provide strict follow up on the established agreements later. To participate in the supply/demand balancing process ensuring a clear understanding of the assumptions made in the demand plan. 5. Activate the regional demand planning principles and priorities within SBU business. To highlight/escalate any issues related to demand/supply that requires business decision & follow-up closely. Monthly measurement of Forecast Accuracy SBU KPIs (BIAS & MAPE). Prepare, report, and communicate the results to regional supply chain leaders. 6. Driving RAMC review process Perform the necessary analysis to ensure excess, slow moving, expired and dead-stock value is reduced and controlled at an acceptable level. To drive the necessary review with stakeholders to ensure identified actions are executed on timely basis. 7. Inventory Management To coordinate within SEA or outside SEA for reducing excess inventory To coordinate on the stock replenishment internally To review the latest safety stock setting & publish the safety stock performance. 8. System and master data Effectively execute data uploading and any master data maintenance. On quarterly basis review the product/material classification of MTS, MTO & FMTO and make necessary changes after consulting commercial, technical and production team. 9.Perform other related duties as required by local superior or regional counterpart. Qualifications Minimum 5-7 years of working experience with exposure to matrixed organizations and delivering quality results. Proven capability in managing stakeholders with significant influencing ability at all levels in the organization. Strong demand and material planning knowledge and experience, preferably from the consumer goods industry Knowledge of and experience in chemical/paint industry is advantageous. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English Possess, at minimum, a bachelor’s degree in engineering, Science, and/or Business management. Advance working knowledge with SAP or Oracle

Schneider Electric Internship Program 2024 (Electrical, Mechatronic, Industrial, Automation, Sales & Marketing, HR and more) Your days at Schneider Electric Schneider Electric offers a variety of opportunities including basic engineering tasks related to design, analysis, test, integration and systems engineering. Opportunities can vary from performing analysis on existing electrical hardware, assisting in the design and development of future hardware, performing analysis for both completed and future launches, test, systems engineering, mission integration, quality assurance, system safety, launch operations and production operations. Activities can include but are not limited to: data analysis, analysis methodology improvement projects, software improvement projects, trade studies, design for manufacturer studies, creating or modifying tool designs, processing cause and corrective actions for non-conformances, maintain production work instructions, supplier management, and component or integrated systems test. Internships may require travel to suppliers, customers, or other Schneider locations. Interns will typically support one or more experienced engineers in performance of assignments, spend time shadowing actual operations, and have unique assignments that support larger projects as well as experience the day-to-day workings of engineering. Interns may perform and/or participate in additional activities/events which help them build a strong network within the Schneider community and with fellow interns. Our Job Functions Field Services Sales Field Services Engineer Technical Support Maintenance Production Safety Automation Sales & Marketing Primary Customer Care Primary Technical Support Quality & Technical Tooling Method Procurement/Supply Chain/logistic Human Resources Must have You must be the 2, 3rd or 4th year students from Faculty of Engineering (Electrical/Electronics, Industrial, Chemical, Mechanical, Automation, Computer), Data Science, Applied Physics, Supply Chain, Business or related field. You must have at least 2 - 3 months intern period but preferable longer intern period for Co-operative program (4-6 months) You must be a good team player Open for Schneider electric location at Bangkok (Huaykwang) or Bangpu, Samutprakarn or Rayong Nice to have Very Well communicate in English Knowledge and interest of Industrial Automation and Energy Management System Digital Savvy Required Documents Your creative resume which includes your bio, career aspiration, intern expectation, senior project, student activity etc. Certificates, photographs or any type of medias you wanted to share with us

Position Overview: We are seeking an accomplished candidate to join our Solar & Energy Section. This role is pivotal in overseeing energy design and solutions, energy distribution and management, business development and procurement efforts in the renewable energy, to advance our organization’s commitment to renewable energy and sustainable practices. Responsibilities: Energy Design and Solution: Develop and implement innovative energy design strategies and solutions, with a focus on solar and renewable energy technologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create tailored energy solutions that optimize resource usage and minimize environmental impact. Ensure adherence to industry standards and regulations while driving energy efficiency and sustainability. Energy Distribution and Management: Implement advanced energy management systems to monitor, control, and optimize energy usage, ensuring reliability and cost-effectiveness. Continuously evaluate energy distribution processes for efficiency and recommend enhancements. Renewable Energy Projects: Lead and manage renewable energy projects, including solar installations and integration of energy storage systems. Coordinate project planning, procurement, and execution to meet timelines and budgets. Manage the procurement process for solar equipment, materials, and services. Collaborate with regulatory bodies and utility companies to ensure compliance and facilitate grid integration. Others: Explore and implement emerging renewable energy technologies and practices to enhance sustainability efforts. Drive initiatives that reduce the organization's carbon footprint and environmental impact. Performs other job-related duties as assigned. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Energy Management, Renewable Energy, Sustainable Energy Systems, or a similar discipline is highly advantageous. Minimum 5 years’ experience in energy design and solutions, energy distribution and management, with a strong focus on renewable energy technologies. In-depth knowledge of solar power systems, energy management systems, and sustainability practices. Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving abilities. Familiarity with renewable energy regulations and industry standards. Demonstrated ability to drive sustainability initiatives and implement renewable energy projects successfully. Project management expertise and the ability to manage multiple writing projects concurrently. Good communication in English language. We are looking for a candidate who is passionate about renewable energy, has a proven track record of success in energy design, distribution, and sustainability. If you are a strategic thinker committed to advancing renewable energy solutions, we encourage you to apply.

AMW is an EMS company manufacturing with a strong focus on power electronics systems including magnetics, PCB assemblies then box-build and product integration, such as DC/DC converters, SMPS, battery chargers or inverters. AMW Program Management department is in charge of customer account management and business development. As part of this group, we are looking to expand our capability by opening a new job opportunity for a Business Development Manager located in our main facility in Thailand. This role is the manager of the pricing/quotation team for all new businesses as well as developing company communication with customers and prospects in support of company Sales representative who are located overseas. This strategic position will be leading and building the company value proposal and portfolio of offer (PCBA, magnetics, R&D, etc.) for business growth according to customers and market expectation. QUALIFICATION: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics, Manufacturing Engineering, or a related field. Minimum 5-7 years in Electronic manufacturing field Strong technical knowledge of PCBA such as SMT, THT processes, component packages, and DFM principles. Proficiency in SMT programming languages (G-code, etc.) and experience with SMT software platforms Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and optimize PCBA, SMT, THT processes Able to use MS Office and Experience with CAD software is advantageous (Gerber viewer , Viewmate, CAD, E-drawing) JOB DESCRIPTION: 1. Translate Design Specifications -  Interpret design specifications and translate them into optimized SMT and THT assembly processes. -  Collaborate with design and engineering teams to ensure alignment between design intent and assembly execution 2. Component Placement and SMT Setup -  Set up SMT equipment and ensure accurate component placement on PCBs. -  Verify component accuracy and conduct inspections to ensure quality. 3. THT Process Management -  Manage Through-Hole Technology (THT) processes, including wave soldering and manual soldering -  Ensure compliance with soldering standards and quality control measures 4. Complex Assembly Challenges -  Identify and address complex assembly challenges, such as fine-pitch components, double-sided boards, and tight tolerances. -  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement solutions. 5. Product Reliability -  Ensure product reliability through meticulous assembly and quality control. -  Implement and maintain quality control processes for PCBA products. 6. Technical Expertise -  Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in SMT, THT, and PCBA assembly processes. -  Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in SMT and THT processes. 7. Hands-On Experience -  Utilize hands-on experience to guide and train assembly technicians as needed. 8. Machine Programming (Laser Mark, SMT, THT) -  Program and optimize machines for various processes, including laser marking, SMT (Screen Print, SPI, Mounting, Reflow, AOI), Routing, THT wave soldering, THT selective soldering, flux cleaning, and selective coating. 9. Support RFQ department for accurate quotes -  Perform process simulation for SMT, THT Selective, Conformal Coating, and Potting processes -  Collaborate with the RFQ team to provide technical input and cost estimation for quotes Welfare Work 5 days, Monday - Friday, 8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Annual bonus (based on the operating results of that year) Regular salary adjustment Food 600 baht/month Group accident insurance Life insurance Welfare, financial assistance (wedding, ordination, child birth, child education, funeral) 6 days of business leave / year (can be exercised right from the start date as an employee but must be in the conditions specified by the company) Annual leave 8 days/year (can be exercised after 1 year of employment, will be added to 1 day per year at a maximum of 20 days/year) Holiday 16 days/year Annual Party Provident funds Health insurance Asia Magnetic Winding Co., Ltd. 99/9 Moo 9  Bangchalong, Bangplee, Samutprakarn 10540 Phone call 02-182-1418, 02 - 751-1260-2 ext. 202 , 205

Job_Title: หัวหน้าบัญชีต้นทุน/หัวหน้าบัญชีต้นทุน
Job_Description: 1.งานสต๊อคสินค้าอุตสาหกรรม - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบบัญชีควบคุมสินค้าอุตสาหกรรม - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการจัดทำรายงานยอดขายสินค้าอุตสาหกรรม สินค้าที่ตั้งสำรองประจำเดือน 2.งานสต๊อคงานรับจ้าง - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการรายงานเบิกใช้วัตถุดิบ, สารเคมี และวัสดุสิ้นเปลือง - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบรายงานวัสดุคงเหลือประจำเดือน - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบรายละเอียดน้ำหนักงานส่งออกตามใบแจ้งหนี้ประจำเดือน - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการจัดทำสต๊อควัตถุดิบเพื่อผลิต - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการตรวจนับ, กระทบยอดคงเหลือวัตถุดิบ และงานระหว่างทำ รายไตรมาส และสิ้นปี งานรวบรวมและประมวลผล - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบรายงานข้อมูล ชั่วโมงการทำงาน เงินเดือน ค่าล่วงหน้าของหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อการผลิต - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบรายงานค่าใช้จ่ายต่างๆ ที่ได้รับการปันส่วน เพื่อปันส่วนเข้างาน - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการคำนวณและการปันส่วนค่าใช้จ่ายต่างๆ วัตถุดิบ และวัสดุสิ้นเปลืองใช้ไปเพื่อการผลิต เข้างานตาม JOB - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการจัดทำรายงานค่าใช้จ่าย, วัตถุดิบเบิกใช้, วัสดุคงเหลือและงานระหว่างทำ 3.งานงบประมาณ - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการจัดทำงบประมาณของบริษัท - ควบคุมและตรวจสอบการจัดทำข้อมูลเพื่อเสนอผู้บริหารเพื่อการตัดสินใจ

Job_Title: Chief of Operations in Engineering (400-600K) Multiple Properties
Job_Description: Position: Chief of Operations in Engineering (400-600K) Business: Multiple Properties Location:  Bangkok Contact Recruiter: Nattha 086-378-4056 We are a prominent and diversified real estate group with a vast portfolio of properties, encompassing residential, and commercial. We are currently seeking an experienced and forward-thinking Chief of Operations in Engineering to oversee the efficient management of all properties within the group. Job Responsibilities: Operational Leadership: Provide strategic leadership to the engineering and operations teams, ensuring the effective and efficient management of all properties. Develop and implement operational strategies aligned with the group's overall objectives. Property Management: Oversee the day-to-day operations and maintenance of all properties, ensuring optimal functionality and adherence to safety and compliance standards. Implement best practices for property management, focusing on cost efficiency and sustainability. Team Management: Lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing team of engineers and operations professionals. Foster a collaborative and innovative team culture that prioritizes excellence in service delivery. Project Management: Manage and coordinate engineering projects across the entire property portfolio. Ensure timely completion of projects within budgetary constraints and in accordance with quality standards. Vendor and Contractor Relations: Develop and maintain strong relationships with vendors, contractors, and service providers. Negotiate contracts and agreements to secure cost-effective and high-quality services. Cost Management: Implement cost-control measures to optimize operational expenses while maintaining high-quality standards. Develop and manage budgets for property operations and engineering projects. Safety and Compliance: Ensure all properties comply with relevant safety regulations and industry standards. Implement and oversee safety programs to minimize risks and promote a safe working environment. Qualifications: Proven experience in a leadership role overseeing engineering and operations for a diverse real estate portfolio. Strong background in property management, project management, and facilities engineering. Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to inspire and lead a multidisciplinary team. In-depth knowledge of safety regulations, compliance standards, and best practices in property operations. Bachelor's degree in engineering, construction management, or a related field; Professional Engineer (PE) license is a plus An attractive salary and excellent fringe benefits will be offered to successful candidates. Interested candidates, please “ APPLY NOW ” or send your application letter, referring to the position with an updated resume, current and expected salary with contact details to If you think you are the right candidate, Please call Nattha now!! 086-378-4056

Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ 1. จัดทำนโยบาย และบริหารการดำเนินงานของฝ่าย ให้เกิดการปรับปรุงและพัฒนาอย่างต่อเนื่องในด้านต้นทุน คุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพของกระบวนการผลิต เพื่อให้บรรลุวัตถุประสงค์ขององค์กรที่ตั้งไว้ 2. การรวบรวมวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ระบุโอกาสในการเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพ และแก้ไขปัญหาในกระบวนการผลิตรวมถึงการใช้วัตถุดิบใหม่และการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ร่วมกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง 3. รักษามาตรฐานวิศวกรรมทุกสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง และพัฒนากระบวนการผลิตตามมาตรฐานวิศวกรรม ความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัยและสิ่งแวดล้อม เพื่อให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด 4. ศึกษา วางแผน และดำเนินโครงการร่วมกับส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง กำกับและตรวจสอบการดำเนินโครงการใหัถูกต้องตามกฎหมายและข้อกำหนดต่างๆ คุณสมบัติ 1. ปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่าในสาขาวิศวกรรมเคมีหรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง 2. มีประสบการณ์ในงานในอุตสาหกรรมเคมี เข้าใจในกระบวนการผลิต การดูแลอุปกรณ์ เครื่องมือด้านความปลอดภัย และการบริหารงานโครงการ 3. การบริหารจัดการเรื่องคน ความเป็นผู้นำ การสื่อสารและความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างกัน 4. ทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์และการแก้ปัญหา

Job_Title: SENIOR NPI QUALITY PROCESS ENGINEER (PCBA & INTEGRATION) 2 POSITION...
Job_Description: AMW is an EMS company manufacturing with a strong focus on power electronics systems including magnetics, PCB assemblies then box-build and product integration, such as DC/DC converters, SMPS, battery chargers or inverters. AMW Program Management department is in charge of customer account management and business development. As part of this group, we are looking to expand our capability by opening a new job opportunity for a Business Development Manager located in our main facility in Thailand. This role is the manager of the pricing/quotation team for all new businesses as well as developing company communication with customers and prospects in support of company Sales representative who are located overseas. This strategic position will be leading and building the company value proposal and portfolio of offer (PCBA, magnetics, R&D, etc.) for business growth according to customers and market expectation. SENIOR NPI QUALITY PROCESS ENGINEER (PCBA & INTEGRATION) QUALIFICATION Bachelor degree in Industry Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Science in Physic, Mathematics, stats of related field. At least 10 years for NPI QA Engineer, NPI Engineer, QA Engineer in the field of PCBA manufacturing. Able to use the basic measurement device. Abilities in statistical techniques and Knowledge ISO9001, IATF 16949. Able to use MS Office. JOB DESCRIPTION 1. Analysis and studies 1.1. Insure feasibility Studies are performed in consideration of every quality return of experience. 1.2. Interact with relevant section concerned to obtain conform documentation for product approval (COC, laboratory reports,…) 1.3. Ensure that inspection / tests records obtain accurate data. 1.4. Interact with relevant section concerned to solve product electronic function and test design quality issues encounter. 2. Machines/test programs and tooling. 2.1. Approve programs of machinery and test programs 2.2. Set up programs for quality sampling inspections (Buy off, temperature profile, etc.) 2.3. Approve test fixtures and JIG assembly 2.4. Survey available inspection laboratories and machines in order to maintain AMW inspection capabilities to the latest electronic industry practices. 3. Inspection and Qualification 3.1. Be the leader to create with department concerned any Process FMEA and control plan necessary. 3.2. Conduct the inspection and testing of product samples / prototype in conformance with customer and internal requirements (including applicable standards requirements). 3.3. Interact with relevant section concerned to solve product and process design quality issues encounter. 3.4. Gather necessary documents and reports in order to complete new product qualification report according to requirements from customer, AMW and electronic industry practices. 3.5. Build up AMW inspection quality standard also the PCBA manufacturing of new production during sample phase and transfer it to the mass production team during pre series. 3.6. Support customer sample NCR analysis when related to manufacturing process to prevent risk on every similar case and verify its efficiency. 4. Management System control 4.1. Control and update the documentation include quality record in accordance with system requirements. Welfare Work 5 days, Monday - Friday, 8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Annual bonus (based on the operating results of that year) Regular salary adjustment Food 600 baht/month Group accident insurance Life insurance Welfare, financial assistance (wedding, ordination, child birth, child education, funeral) 6 days of business leave / year (can be exercised right from the start date as an employee but must be in the conditions specified by the company) Annual leave 8 days/year (can be exercised after 1 year of employment, will be added to 1 day per year at a maximum of 20 days/year) Holiday 16 days/year Annual Party Provident funds Health insurance Asia Magnetic Winding Co., Ltd. 99/9 Moo 9  Bangchalong, Bangplee, Samutprakarn 10540 Phone call 02-182-1418, 02 - 751-1260-2 ext. 202 , 205

Company: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
Job_Description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ 1.บริหารทีมวิศวกรด้านการสำรวจ ออกแบบ ประเมินราคา และวิเคราะห์ควำมเป็นไปได้ของโครงการ 2.งานสำรวจและออกแบบระบบโซล่าร์ 2.1. งานวิเคราะห้และตรวจสอบโหลดการใช้ไฟฟ้าของโครงการฯ เพื่อประเมินข้อมูลสำหรับติดตั้งระบบโซล่าร์ 2.2. งานสำรวจพื้นที่ของลูกค้าเพื่อวิเคราะห์และประเมินตำแหน่งสำหรับติดตั้งโซล่าร์ 2.3. งานออกแบบรูปแบบการติดตั้งระบบโซลาร์ โดยเป็นตามมาตรฐานทางวิศวกรรมและข้อกำหนดตามการไฟฟ้าฯ 3.งานจัดทำ Estimate Cost โครงการโซล่าร์ 3.1.จัดทำถอดปริมาณวัสดุและจำนวนอุปกรณ์ที่ใช้งานในโครงการโซล่าร์ 3.2.จัดทำ Bill of Quantity โครงการโซล่าร์ 3.3.สรุป Cost ค่าใช้งานโครงการโซล่าร์ 4.งานจัดทำ Proposal โครงการ 4.1.ศึกษาข้อกำหนด TOR ของลูกค้า 4.2.จัดทำเอกสารทางเทคนิคให้เป็นไปตามข้อกำหนดตาม TOR 5.งาน Support Technical งาน Pre-Sale 5.1.ดำเนินการ Support ข้อมูลทางเทคนิคให้กับฝ่ายขายในการนำเสนอขายงานกับทางลูกค้า 5.2.จัดทำข้อมูลทางเทคนิค นำเสนอให้ลูกค้าพิจารณา 6.ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาในระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้ากำลัง มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5 ปี ในธุรกิจพลังงานสะอาด, พลังงานหมุนเวียน, ไฟฟ้า, ปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพด้านพลังงาน มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5 ปี ในการออกแบบและก่อสร้างระบบไฟฟ้า มีประสบการณ์การออกแบบระบบไฟฟ้าอาคารและระบบโซล่าร์ทั้งในรูปแบบ Solar Farm, Solar Roof, Solar Floating, Solar Hybrid with Energy Storage มีความเข้าใจในธุรกิจพลังงานสะอาด และพลังงานโซล่าร์ สามารถปฏิบัติงานที่ ศูนย์ราชการแจ้งวัฒนะ หลักสี่ได้

Urgently Required Tungaloy-NTK Cutting Tool Thailand is looking for an Applications Engineer Do you have a strong Machining background and programming experience?  If yes, we want to talk to you! Because of our strong growth, Tungaloy-NTK Cutting Tools Thailand is looking for an Applications Engineer in the Bangkok state territory. Tungaloy / IMC Group is one of the leading companies in the metalworking industry. With the competence brand Tungaloy we offer a unique and comprehensive range of high-tech tools and services for turning, drilling, threading, grooving, holder and milling. We are increasing productivity and competitiveness of our customers with technologically advanced machining solutions. 2,250 personnel worldwide contribute to our success through their competence and commitment. Our success results from providing expert technical resources and solutions to our customers that boost productivity and profitability in their manufacturing processes . Key performance areas: The Applications Engineer will be responsible for selling, servicing, and promoting Tungaloy brands within the Thailand state territory.  As the Applications Engineer you will use your machining technical ability provide key technical support to the local sales representatives, in order to achieve assigned sales targets and profitable growth. Additional responsibilities include: Develop and maintain distributor and end user relationships Travel throughout assigned territory to regularly call on existing and prospective customers to promote, sell and Tungaloy brands. Technically support the district through applications at the spindle High touch value added selling Displays or demonstrates product, using samples or catalog, and emphasizes value added salable features Focuses on Customer Productivity Improvements via Applied Selling Techniques Actively participate in the quotation of competitive pricing by providing accurate and current market pricing for brand-targeted competition to the Contracts and/or Specials group Coordinate and facilitate date of delivery to customer, based on knowledge of own firm’s production and delivery schedules Monitor and evaluate the activities and products of the competition Prepare reports of business call activity and keep expense accounts Coordinate customer training Attend trade shows Your profile You possess 5-7 years of related experience, along with university graduate major in Mechanical Engineering or Industrial Engineering. A background in Machining is required, and you have strong knowledge of cutting tool applications, design, and machining processes, along with programming experience. You have experience with drilling, milling, turning and boring and are very familiar with the machine shop or tool management environments. Your communication skills, verbal and written, are top-notch, and you’re a strong team player. You also possess the ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists, and you’re comfortable interpreting instructions, diagrams, and schematics. To perform this job successfully, an individual should have knowledge of MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point, AutoCAD, CADCAM software and Web based training internet software. This role will require up to 50-75% domestic travel. Benefits Tungaloy-NTK Cutting Tool Thailand offers a competitive compensation package. Our benefit package includes life insurance, paid vacation and holidays, car allowance, actual fuel & tollway expenses claim, sales growth commission, annual bonus, yearly wages increment and retirement savings plan. Senior Instrument engineer ARTELIA ENGINEERING (THAILAND) CO., LTD. Working Hours: Mon - Fri 08.00-17.00 Head Office: Artelia at Ekkamai, Bangkok Job description: Perform technical tasks assigned by Lead/Senior engineer on feasibility, conceptual, basic engineering, FEED, detailed design and EPC/ EPCM projects. Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, meet quality standard and within budgetary. Experience in engineering design both Brownfield and Greenfield. Review and assist Piping and instrument diagrams (P&ID). Knowledge of SPI for the development of I&C engineering deliverables, control systems, shutdown PLC hardware and software design. Liaise with other departments, clients, vendors, subcontractors and third parties as per Lead Engineer’s instruction. Perform calculations and prepare datasheet / RFQ for control valves, safety relieve valves, flow elements, restriction orifice; thermowell wake frequency and selection of the suitable valve, etc. Extensive and detail design of applicable codes and standards. Requisition / TBE and VDR work for general field instruments. Prepare Instrument system architecture, cause and effect matrix, inter-lock logic diagram, wiring and block diagrams, etc. Prepare fire & gas and telecom layout, and E&I and control room layout. Prepare Instrument cable tray layout, cable layout, cable schedule, tubing schedule, typical Installation detail, hook up, loop diagram, and bulk material take off, etc. Developing Process Control System Architecture, ESD and F&G Philosophies. Review checks the drafting work done by CAD operators Designers. Participate safety assessment meeting such as HAZOP, SIL, HAZIP, etc. Participate in Factory acceptance test and site acceptance test. Go to site survey and prepare site survey report. Participate in inter-department, project, client and vendor meetings when requested by the Lead Engineer. Review and assist major Control System vendors from technical bidding stage till installation and commissioning completion. Assist in plant construction, commissioning, and start-up. Collaborate and communicate effectively with Lead / Senior Instrument engineer and other project participants to provide assistance and technical support. Develops project bidding package, Technical bid evaluation, Bill of Quantity, etc. Define quality control required for projects and develop construction execution plan. Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Instrument Engineering or equivalent. 5-7 years’ experience in Instrument design engineering in the Engineering design firm such as Oil & Gas, Chemical industrial, Food & Beverage, Pharmaceutical. Familiar with API, ISA, ISO and relevant standards and design codes. Excellent analytical, literacy and numerical skills. Experience in drafting software i.e., AutoCAD plant 3D, Navisworks, Revit. Experience in designing hygienic system for Food & Beverage, Pharmaceutical would be an advantage. Excellent English verbal, written, computer, and technical communication and presentation skills, including proficiency in Microsoft Office. Be able to work independently with minimum guidance and under pressure to meet tight deadlines. Curious, open-minded style, ready to go new ways to come to best results in a challenging innovative environment. Work under pressure, multicultural, teamwork, positive thinking, service-minded, flexible, enthusiastic, respect of equality, High responsibility. TOEIC score > 600.

Job_Title: Field Operator (GHECO-1)/พนักงานปฏิบัติการกะ
Company: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
Job_Description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ (Principal Accountabilities ) ปฏิบัติงานรวมทั้งแก้ปัญหาในหน่วยผลิตและระบบส่งผลิตภัณฑ์ได้อย่างต่อเนื่อง และมีเสถียรภาพ ประสิทธิภาพ ให้สอดคล้องกับแผนการผลิต และข้อกำหนดของผลิตภัณฑ์ ปฏิบัติงาน การตัดแยกระบบ ในหน่วยผลิตและระบบส่งผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่ออำนวยความสะดวก และดูแลความปลอดภัย ของอุปกรณ์ และผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้อง ปฏิบัติงานกับผู้ส่งมอบวัตถุดิบและผู้รับมอบผลิตภัณฑ์ ให้สอดคล้องกับแผนการเดินเครื่องทั้งในสภาวะปกติ และสภาวะฉุกเฉิน  เพื่อให้การผลิตและการส่งผลิตภัณฑ์ดำเนินไปอย่างต่อเนื่อง ปลอดภัย วิเคราะห์และตัดสินใจแก้ปัญหาการเดินเครื่องเบื้องต้น  เพื่อป้องกันการเกิด Incident  & Accident ปฏิบัติงานรับและส่งมอบการปฏิบัติงาน ได้อย่างถูกต้อง เพื่อให้กระบวนการผลิตเป็นไปางนื่อง ปลอดภัย รวมทั้งบันทึกข้อมูลการปฏิบัติงาน เพื่อใช้ในการตรวจสอบและส่งมอบการปฏิบัติงานระหว่างผู้ปฏิบัติงาน ปฏิบัติงานด้านค่าใช้จ่าย และลดการสูญเสียในการผลิต เพื่อให้เป็นไปตามแผนการผลิต และมีประสิทธิผลทางต้นทุนการผลิต (Cost Effective) ปฏิบัติงานตรวจสอบ ควบคุม คุณภาพของผลิตภัณฑ์และกระบวนการผลิต เพื่อให้เป็นไปตามข้อกำหนดของผลิตภัณฑ์และขอบเขตปฏิบัติงาน (Operating Window) ที่ส่งมอบให้กับลูกค้า รวมทั้งปรับปรุงการปฏิบัติงานอย่างต่อเนื่อง ดูแล ตรวจสอบ เครื่องจักร/ อุปกรณ์ การบำรุงรักษาเบื้องต้นและประสานงานแจ้งซ่อม เพื่อให้เครื่องจักร/ อุปกรณ์ เดินเครื่องได้อย่างต่อเนื่องและปลอดภัย ปฏิบัติงานบันทึกค่า-ลงข้อมูลปริมาณวัตถุดิบ กระบวนการ และผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่อความถูกต้องและตรวจสอบคุณภาพ ปริมาณได้ ในการซื้อ- ขาย ดูแลและปฏิบัติงานตามระบบบริหารงานคุณภาพ เพื่อให้ผลิตภัณฑ์มีคุณภาพตามมาตรฐาน มีประสิทธิภาพและไม่ส่งผลกระทบต่อสิ่งแวดล้อม ตอบโต้เหตุภาวะฉุกเฉินเบื้องต้น และตามคำสั่งการ ภายใต้ความปลอดภัย ต่อชีวิตและทรัพย์สิน การศึกษา (Formal Education) ปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมศาสตร์เคมี, ไฟฟ้า, ช่างยนต์, อิเล็คทรอนิกส์, เครื่องกล, อุตสาหการ, เครื่องมือวัด  หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ ( Work Experience): ด้านโรงไฟฟ้าหรืออุตสาหกรรมที่เกี่ยวข้อง 1-3 ปี TOEIC 550 คะแนน สถานที่ทำงาน : มาบตาพุด ระยอง

Main Purpose of Job To implement, control automation and electrical systems of new fixed asset in the Factory This could involve the modification and optimizing of the existing fixed asset base and/or the purchase of new fixed assets. It may extend from the initial conceptual studies through to project closeout. Key output Conceptual Phase : Ensure that all projects are sustainable and result in a positive impact on the company ROIC. Prepare and manage the approval process in accordance with the Guidelines for Capital Investment thoroughly challenging the supporting documentation. Design Phase: Ensure that all assets are well designed and meet the business requirements through applying new technologies, proven principles, thorough design reviews and basic science. Ensure that the design is directed towards a low cost, highly efficient and flexible operation. Support Value Engineering Analysis (VEA) Qualification & Skill Degree in engineering, preferably Electrical or Electrical and Electronics Engineering 3 – 5 years’ experience in the field of electricity / automation in a manufacturing facility. In-depth knowledge of Electricity, in low voltage, medium voltage and high voltage installations. In-depth knowledge of EMC (Electromagnetic compatibility). Good knowledge of local electrical code and standards. Knowledge of Instrumentation and Process Control Systems. Knowledge of food processing operations and technology. Knowledge on MES (Manufacturing Execution System). Knowledge on manufacturing IT. Knowledge of food safety, regulatory requirements for food safety, hygienic engineering and Quality System. Project Management Training experiences :PLC (Siemens or Allen-Bradley), SCADA systems (Wonderware)

Expect more. Connect more. Be more at Diebold Nixdorf. Our teams automate, digitize, and transform the way more than 75 million people around the globe bank and shop in this hyper-connected, consumer-centric world. Join us in connecting people to commerce in this vital, rewarding role. We are looking for Field Service Technicians located in Chon Buri City and Phuket City . Installs, debugs and provides technical maintenance for product and component hardware and software, mainly on customer premises. Provides scheduled inspection, cleaning and other services and performs minor product repairs within an assigned territory. Inspects products for correct operation and resolves noted issues and / or escalates according to established procedure. Schedules services, completes all required paperwork and works with customers to ensure satisfaction with service delivery and understanding of product functionality. ในฐานะ Field Service Technician ที่ Diebold Nixdorf, คุณมีหน้าที่รับผิดชอบในการติดตั้ง ตรวจสอบ และให้การบํารุงรักษาทางเทคนิคสําหรับฮาร์ดแวร์และซอฟต์แวร์ของผลิตภัณฑ์ ซึ่งส่วนใหญ่อยู่ในสถานที่ของลูกค้า คุณจะดําเนินการตรวจสอบ ทําความสะอาด และบริการอื่นๆ ตามกําหนดเวลา รวมถึงดําเนินการซ่อมแซมผลิตภัณฑ์เล็กน้อยภายในเขตที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณจะตรวจสอบผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อการทํางานที่ถูกต้องและแก้ไขปัญหาและ/หรือส่งต่อตามขั้นตอนที่กําหนดไว้ กรอกเอกสารที่จําเป็นทั้งหมด และทํางานร่วมกับลูกค้าเพื่อให้มั่นใจในความพึงพอใจกับการส่งมอบบริการและความเข้าใจในฟังก์ชันการทํางานของผลิตภัณฑ์ RESPONSIBILITIES Installs, debugs and provides technical maintenance for ATMs, retail and other equipment within an assigned customer and / or product area. Performs all incident handling, preventive maintenance, IMAC / R and customer training duties as follows: Incident Handling: Utilizes diagnostic tools to perform troubleshooting via detailed analysis of hardware and software failures. Performs hardware repairs on a component level. Cleans and adjusts mechanical components. Configures and installs applicable software. Preventive Maintenance: Performs routine checks according to documented procedures. Refills consumables as directed. IMAC/R: Installs, moves, adds, changes and removes hardware and software products. Customer Training: Instructs and trains customers on usage and operation of installed hardware and software. Also performs the following: Process Tasks: Receives incident briefing sand orders from the dispatch function. Updates the dispatch function on all unforeseen issues. Provides detailed briefings on all performed activities. Proactively informs customers about status, progress and outcomes. Continuous Process Improvement: Observes technical or process problems, informing manager / other relevant personnel and offering improvement recommendations. Actively uses corporate tools and processes for knowledge sharing and information gathering. QUALIFICATIONS Required Qualifications • มีวุฒิการศึกษาหรือมีประสบการณ์ทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง •มีประสบการณ์ที่เกี่ยวข้องใน Field service อย่างน้อย 2-4 ปี •มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดีทั้งการพูดและการเขียน • มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่ตามกฎหมาย และข้อกําหนดของยานพาหนะของ DN Education or equivalent work experience required. Minimum of 2-4 years of relevant experience or equivalent combination of education and experience in Field Service. Good written and verbal communication skills. Driver's license and driving record that satisfies DN's fleet requirements.

Job title: In order to support QA Department in Rayong/Thailand, we are looking for Quality Supervisor who can meet the challenges of the international market with openness, flexibility and enthusiasm. Use this chance and join our success! Qualification: Bachelor's degree or Master in related field At least 5 years experience’s in automotive part manufacturing or related field. Sales Engineer Job Description We are looking for a friendly, professional, and customer-oriented Sales Engineer to join our team. As the Sales Engineer, you will make sure that customers and visitors feel welcome and are well looked after. You need to have good people skills, a professional personality, and be highly organized to be a successful Sales Engineer. The ideal candidate will have previous plastic injection knowledge and experience in sales. Sales Engineer Responsibilities: Develop and establish sales network as well as increase the market share in Thailand's market. Ensuring that all customer-related tasks are handled accurately and on time to improve guests' experience. Handling customer complaints and special requests. Maintain good relationship with customers. Promote and sell plastic injection molding machine and robot for plastic injection molding process. Increase sales volume and achieving the given sales target. Conduct and participate in sales and marketing activities including trial works, trainings, seminars, roadshows, and exhibitions. Sales Engineer Requirements: Obtained bachelor’s degree in Plastic Engineering, Polymer Engineering, Plastic Mold and die. Great interpersonal and communication skills in Thai and English, negotiation, and relationship-building skills Good presentation and Social Media skills. Own car with valid license, able to travel on frequent business trips. Experience in selling products for plastic industry would be an advantage. Great computer skills and the ability to learn new skills quickly. Fluent in English, TOEIC scores more than 700 Adaptability and Good time management skills.

AMW is an EMS company manufacturing with a strong focus on power electronics systems including magnetics, PCB assemblies then box-build and product integration, such as DC/DC converters, SMPS, battery chargers or inverters. AMW Program Management department is in charge of customer account management and business development. As part of this group, we are looking to expand our capability by opening a new job opportunity for a Business Development Manager located in our main facility in Thailand. This role is the manager of the pricing/quotation team for all new businesses as well as developing company communication with customers and prospects in support of company Sales representative who are located overseas. This strategic position will be leading and building the company value proposal and portfolio of offer (PCBA, magnetics, R&D, etc.) for business growth according to customers and market expectation. QUALIFICATION: Master or Bachelor degree in mechanical engineering or equivalent Minimum 8 years of experience in the electronics industry. Able to manage subordinate. Strong planning, project management and communication skills Strong leadership, good attitude, logic thinking. Able to communicate in English. JOB DESCRIPTION: New Product Development -  Organize engineering department forms to work with, distribution of work between the teams, duties of subordinates, etc. -  Communicates with RFQ & Program manager on new projects. -  Reconfirm process flow defined in RFQ stage from industrial team. -  Identify & request the necessary tools and fixtures to produce samples. -  Manage engineering specification changing and validate the changing before implementation -  Crimping approval for harnesses -  Planning for sample build such as electrical cabinets, switchboards, electrical chargers. -  Confirm consumable component in sample phase. -  Provide post mortem. -  Approve sample out-going report. -  Close sample MO on time. Validate new customize mechanical parts; plastics and metals -  Work with suppliers to develop and approve the new custom parts on mechanical materials. Packing design -  Design packing for in process and finish goods. Covering for all activities of magnetic, PCBA and integration. Pre-series & Transfer -  After sample approval from customer, to lead pre-series run using production team to run bigger quantity lot. -  Tools and fixtures. -  Confirm process flow and time using industrial team. -  Technical support to production concerning to integration activities. -  Participate the continuous improvement. Expense Control -  Manage expense within integration engineering section Cost reduction -  Minimize cost of material/part/component -  Minimize cost of sample shipment and so on. -  Approval new material/part/component and/or supplier changing Management and reporting -  Management. -  Develop team for PCBA skill. -  Reporting. Welfare: Work 5 days, Monday - Friday, 8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Annual bonus (based on the operating results of that year) Regular salary adjustment Food 600 baht/month Group accident insurance Life insurance Welfare, financial assistance (wedding, ordination, child birth, child education, funeral) 6 days of business leave / year (can be exercised right from the start date as an employee but must be in the conditions specified by the company) Annual leave 12 days/year (can be exercised after 1 year of employment, will be added to 1 day per year at a maximum of 20 days/year) Holiday 16 days/year Annual Party Provident funds Health insurance Asia Magnetic Winding Co., Ltd. 99/9 Moo 9  Bangchalong, Bangplee, Samutprakarn 10540 Phone call 02-182-1418, 02 - 751-1260-2 ext. 202 , 205
