Job_Title: Project Engineer – Mechanical / Electrical / Civil/วิศวกรโครงการ – เครื่องกล...
Company: Thachang Green Energy Public Company Limited
Job_Description: กำหนด TOR / Specification ของโครงการ ให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายและข้อกำหนดทางด้าน วิศกรรม ตรวจสอบ ข้อมูลการออกแบบ, คุณลักษณะ, รายการคำนวณ ในงานวิศวกรรม ให้ถูกต้อง ตรงตามข้อกำหนด หรือสัญญา จัดทำข้อสรุปเปรียบเทียบและประเมิน การเสนอราคาทางด้านเทคนิคของเครื่องจักร / อุปกรณ์ หรือโครงการก่อสร้างในส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง ตรวจรับงาน ตรวจสอบความคืบหน้าของงาน เพื่อสรุปรายงานความคืบหน้า ปัญหาและอุปสรรคของงาน ร่วมกับทีมงาน และนำเสนอต่อผู้บังคับบัญชา ประสานงานกับผู้เกี่ยวข้อง ในการแก้ไขปัญหาในการออกแบบ ก่อสร้าง และการเดินเครื่อง ให้สามารถใช้งาน หรือเดินเครื่องได้ตามเป้าหมาย รวบรวม ดูแล เอกสาร คู่มือ ข้อกำหนด แบบแปลน หรือเอกสารอื่นๆ ที่จำเป็นของโครงการในการปฏิบัติงาน และการเดินเครื่องรวมทั้งข้อมูลการดำเนินงานโครงการตั้งแต่เริ่มต้นจนเริ่มเดินเครื่องใช้งาน ควบคุม ดูแลงบประมาณในการดำเนินงานในส่วนที่เกี่ยวข้องในเป็นไปตามเป้าหมายและมีประสิทธิภาพมากที่สุด ทำงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา

Position: SALES ENGINEER – Plastic Injection Molding Machine Salary: THB 50,000 – 60,000 Location: Bangkok Responsibilities: Develop and establish sales network as well as increase the market share in Thailand's market. Promote and sell plastic injection molding machine and robot for plastic injection molding process. Increase sales volume and achieving the given sales target. Maintain good relationship with customers. Conduct and participate in sales and marketing activities including trial works, trainings, seminars, roadshow and exhibitions. Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Plastic Engineering, Polymer Engineering, Plastic Mold and Die Engineering 3 years of experiences in Plastic Injection Machine. Good command in English, TOEIC scores more than 700 is preferred. Good presentation and negotiation skills. Own car with valid license, able to travel on frequent business trips. Experience in selling products for plastic industry would be a plus. Thitiya Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website : https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

Job_Title: Technician - (สัญญาจ้าง 1 ปี)/ช่างซ่อมบำรุงงานระบบ
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ 1.ทำการ Preventive Maintenance (PM) อุปกรณ์ สาขาในกรุงเทพมหานคร และสาขาต่างจังหวัดโดยมีอุปกรณ์ดังนี้ - เตาทอดในส่วน Cook และเตาทอด F/F - ตู้ Combi Oven - ตู้ HCW 5 - ตู้ Upright HC 900 HC 902 2.จัดหาอะไหล่ สเปคที่ใช้กับอุปกรณ์ ในราคาถูกกว่า Supplier 3.ทำการ Overhaul อุปกรณ์เพื่อประหยัดงบประมาณโดยมีรายการดังนี้ - เตาทอดในส่วน Cook และเตาทอด F/F 4.ตรวจเช็ค Work Order งานซ่อมและดำเนินการแก้ไขอุปกรณ์ที่สามารถดำเนินการได้โดยไม่ผ่าน Supplier 5.ตรวจเช็คงานระบบ (ระบบไฟฟ้า ระบบน้ำ) รวมถึงโครงสร้าง ของสาขา พร้อมแก้ไขเบื้องต้น 6. ให้คำแนะนำ การใช้อุปกรณ์ และ การซ่อมบำรุงเบื้องต้นให้กับทีมหัวหน้างานหน้าร้าน 7. ติดตามงานซ่อมกับ ฝ่ายก่อสร้าง ในกรณีเร่งด่วน รวมถึง ประสานกับ Supplier ในเรื่องอะไหล่ คุณสมบัติสำหรับตำแหน่งงาน วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปวส. / ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชา สารพัดช่าง หรือ ไฟฟ้า ประสบการณ์ทำงาน 3-5 ปีด้านงานซ่อมบำรุง สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word ได้

Job_Title: !ผู้จัดการด้านวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า (ซีพีรีเทลลิงค์)
Job_Description: ลักษณะงาน : -ลงพื้นที่ ทำการตรวจเช็ค ตรวจสอบการทำงานของช่าง ทั้ง PM/CM ตรวจสอบคุณภาพการเข้าปฏิบัติงานของทีมช่าง -บริหารจัดการทีมวิศวกรรมให้สามารถให้บริการลูกค้าได้ 24 ชั่วโมง และได้ performance ตามที่กำหนด ส่งมอบงานให้ลูกค้าได้ทันตามสัญญา -วิเคราะห์ปัญหาการซ่อมซ้ำ การร้องเรียน สรุปข้อมูลภาพรวมต่าง ๆ รายพื้นที่ เพื่อนำเสนอผลลัพธ์กับผู้บริหาร - เป็น Project Owner งานด้านวิศวกรรมให้กับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง -สนับสนุนกิจกรรมการเพิ่มผลผลิตต่าง ๆ ของบริษัท เช่น 7ส. , Safety เป็นต้น -ประสานงานหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อลดปัญหาการทำงานต่าง ๆ -แก้ไขปัญหา คิดวิเคราะห์งานให้รอบด้าน เพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายที่ตั้งไว้ -พัฒนางานด้านเทคนิค วิเคราะห์ธุรกิจเชิงลึกโดยนำเทคโนโลยีที่หลากหลายเข้ามาช่วยพัฒนาทีมงาน -กำหนดแนวทางการยกระดับการเข้าบริการให้มีคุณภาพมากยิ่งขึ้น -งานอื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ : -ปริญญาตรี-โท วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ สาขาไฟฟ้า , อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง เกรดเฉลี่ยไม่น้อยกว่า 2.5 -มีประสบการณ์ในการซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องเย็น หรือ ระบบไฟฟ้า ไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปี -มีประสบการณ์ในการบริหารทีมงานไม่น้อยกว่า 2 ปี มีใจรักในงานบริการ -มีทักษะในการบริหารจัดการข้อมูล คิดวิเคราะห์ และ แก้ปัญหางานต่าง ๆ ได้ดี -มีใบขับขี่ สามารถขับรถยนต์หรือรถจักรยานยนต์ได้ ปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่ได้ มีความคล่องตัวสูง - สถานที่ปฏิบัติงานหลัก ซอยวิภาวดีรังสิต 62 (ศรีรับสุข)

Job_Title: Project Engineer (Solar Rooftop,Farm)/วิศวกรโครงการ
Job_Description: การควบคุมและดูแลโครงการ : ให้ความช่วยเหลือในการวางแผนและควบคุมโครงการตลอดจนให้บรรลุเป้าหมายตามเวลาและงบประมาณที่กำหนด การประสานงานและสื่อสาร : ปฏิบัติหน้าที่เป็นตัวกลางในการสื่อสารระหว่างทีมงานภายในและกับลูกค้าเพื่อให้โครงการเป็นไปตามแผนที่กำหนด ความสามารถในการแก้ไขปัญหา : ใช้ความเชี่ยวชาญในวิศวกรรมเพื่อแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นระหว่างการดำเนินโครงการ การควบคุมคุณภาพ : ควบคุมและตรวจสอบคุณภาพของงานในโครงการเพื่อให้บรรลุเป้าหมายและมาตรฐานที่กำหนด การดำเนินการตามมาตรฐานและกฎหมาย : ปฏิบัติตามมาตรฐานวิศวกรรมและกฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องในการดำเนินโครงการ การจัดการทรัพยากร : วางแผนและจัดการทรัพยากรที่เกี่ยวข้องในโครงการ เช่น งบประมาณ วัสดุ และบุคลากร การสร้างความเชื่อมั่นและความพึงพอใจให้กับลูกค้า : ให้บริการที่มีคุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพตามความต้องการของลูกค้าอื่น ๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า ทักษะในการวางแผนงาน และมีภาวะความเป็นผู้นำ ประสบการณ์การทำงาน 2 ปีในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถปฏิบัติงานได้ทั้งกรุงเทพฯ และ ต่างจังหวัด มีไหวพริบในการเจรจาต่อรองและแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ มีความกระตือรือร้น ใส่ใจงาน มีใบประกอบวิชาชีพ(กว)จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ใช้คอมพิวเตอร์โปรแกรม Ms.Office และ Auto Cad ได้ดี

Company: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited
Job_Description: Location: โรงงานผลิตอาหารสัตว์น้ำ อ.หนองแค จ.สระบุรี 1. ติดตามสถานการณ์ต่างๆ ทางธุรกิจ ได้แก่ ทิศทางตลาดสัตว์น้ำจืดในประเทศ เทคโนโลยีใหม่ๆ (Sale, Farm) เทคโนโลยีการผลิต คลังสินค้า ตลอดจนนโยบาย กลยุทธ์ และเป้าหมายของธุรกิจ เพื่อเป็นข้อมูลสนับสนุนในการบริหารงานให้บรรลุเป้าหมายธุรกิจและสร้างความได้เปรียบในการแข่งขัน 2. บริหารงานด้านวิศวกรรม การบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักรและอุปกรณ์ต่างๆ ในการผลิต งานซ่อม/สร้างเกี่ยวกับเครื่องจักรและอะไหล่ ระบบสาธารณูปโภค ระบบเครือข่ายคอมพิวเตอร์ ภายในโรงงานระบบพลังงานที่ใช้ในโรงงาน ระบบควบคุมมลพิษต่างๆ รวมถึงการปรับปรุงเครื่องจักรเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพ 3.ควบคุม ติดตาม แก้ไขปัญหา ให้คำปรึกษา ถึงแนวทางการทำงาน ผลการดำเนินงานของผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาให้เป็นไปแผนการดำเนินงานและเป้าหมายที่กำหนด รวมถึงการพัฒนาเพื่อเพิ่มขีดความสามารถของผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา 4.ผลักดัน สนับสนุนกิจกรรมทางด้านการตลาด ตลอดจนการออกเยี่ยมลูกค้าและเกษตรกรเพื่อสร้างความสัมพันธ์อันดีและภาพลักษณ์ที่ดีให้กับบริษัท 5.การควบคุมดูแลการปฎิบัติงานให้เป็นไปตามมาตรฐานสากลต่างๆ เช่น ระบบคุณภาพ ระบบการจัดการสิ่งแวดล้อม และระบบการผลิตอาหารสัตว์ที่ปลอดภัย มาตรฐานแรงงานไทย และระบบมาตรฐานอื่นๆ Requirements - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ (ไฟฟ้า เครื่องกล และอุตสาหการ) - หากมีประสบการณ์ในโรงงานผลิตอาหารสัตว์ มากกว่า 5-10 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ - ความรอบรู้ในธุรกิจธุรกิจสัตว์น้ำจืดตลอด Supply Chain (ฟาร์ม , โรงงานผลิตอาหารสัตว์น้ำ , การขาย) - ความรู้ด้านการบริหาร และความรู้ด้านการบริหารค่าใช้จ่าย - ความรู้ด้านการผลิตอาหารสัตว์น้ำ ด้านวิศวกรรม ด้านการจัดการคลังสินค้าและวัตถุดิบ - ประสบการณ์ทำงานด้านการบริหารหรือการคุมทีมอย่างน้อย 3-5 ปี (Management and Leadership Skill) - สามารถปฏิบัติงาน 6 วันต่อสัปดาห์ (วันจันทร์-วันเสาร์) ได้

Job_Title: Value Stream Quality Engineer (1 Year Contract) / Salary Up To 35K / Si Racha...
Company: PERSOLKELLY HR Services Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Business: Medical Device, Optical Products Manufacturer Position: Value Stream Quality Engineer Employment Type: 1 Year Contract (Renewable) Salary: Up to 35K Based Upon Experience Benefits: Group insurance, SSO, annual leave Location: WHA Chonburi Industrial Estate, Si Racha, Chonburi Working Hours: Mon - Fri / 08:30 - 17:30 Job Description: Be a focal point for all quality issues in production, leading a treatment of quality issues, investigations, non-conformances, SCARs, internal communication, coordination, and trend analysis. Supervise ongoing quality requirements such as PFMEA, control plan, DMR/DHR, COC, COT, etc. Support equipment qualification for any HW/SW change. Ensuring production activities comply with GMP principles and satisfy quality standards such as 21 CFR Part 820, ISO 13485 etc. Ensuring all applicable worldwide regulatory requirements as included in the scope of company’s quality manual related to production and process control. Provide employee training on quality issues regarding production processes. Provide input to applicable entities (Management, R&D, Logistic, customer success, etc.) derived from accumulated lessons learned from production processes. Drive Quality routine improvements that reduce failures rate, minimize failed-on Arrival/Install issues (DOA/RMA) and field failures, through in-depth evaluation of production processes. Assure Corrective and Preventive Action plans are developed and executed as a result of non-conformities and production processes analysis when applicable. Routinely Supervise production processes in all departments (such as assembly line, SMT lines, IQC) and follow up over corrective action and effectiveness verification. Interact positively in the most fruitful way with stakeholders regarding production processes. Among them are Production, Engineering, R&D, RA, complaints investigators, etc. Leading ongoing readiness for external audits. Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Electronics of Mechanical Engineering Minimum 2 years of QC engineering environment Knowledge of ISO, FDA Working knowledge in Statistical Tools (Measurement Systems Analysis, Process Capability and Statistical Process Control) Effective problem solving, root-cause analytical skills Self motivation, leadership skill Good command in English Experience with PLM and CAD system e.g. SolidWorks All applications will be treated in strict confidence. All material submitted in connection with your application will become part of our confidential recruitment files. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. The Role: Tesla Motors is seeking a Field Support Engineer in Thailand. This role is at a key connection point between our worldwide service centers and the development and production base in Silicon Valley, California and Shanghai, China. The responsibility is to keep our vehicles on the road through proactive analyses of the vehicle fleet and to reduce their time spent in service centers by effective remote/on-site diagnostic work. This engineer needs to be able to efficiently work with large amounts of data in order to process information and make the correct conclusions in a timely manner. A strong technical background in diagnosing complex electromechanical systems with heavy software content and deployed in safety-critical applications is required. This engineer must be passionate about diagnostics, must be a strong critical thinker with great fluency understanding technical system-level architecture and issues. Additional training expertise and proven ability in supporting technicians/workshop staff. Field Support Objectives: Get failed vehicles properly diagnosed, properly repaired, and back in the hands of customers quickly by providing engineering support to aftersales teams (service, customer support). Responsibilities: Debug systems and perform diagnostics on field failures both remotely - looking at data logged by the vehicle, and directly in the field Provide technical support in order to minimize vehicle downtime, through day to day coverage of internationally distributed service cases Regular collaboration with Regional Technical Support Specialists to ensure consistent and stable global service operations Provide Technical information/support to the Regional Technical Specialist network Provide assistance to the training team on developing advanced Technician training courses Support technicians in the field with troubleshooting techniques and remote diagnosis, travel to perform field diagnosis or repair. The position may sit within a certain region and require daily support Recognize trends and patterns in field failures and provide written feedback to Product Support Engineers to drive future designs Assist Product Support Engineers to ensure new issues are fully investigated and that countermeasures are in place Assist and support Product Support Engineers, Product Excellence, and Failure Analysis team members to perform further root cause analysis on field failures by component/subsystem owners where necessary Assist projects and support Product Support Engineers to evaluate vehicle new design features/fixes and perform regional testing Assist improving service diagnostic tooling and equipment. Both at a Software and Hardware level Support with high level Incident response requests Availability for occasional off-hours work and traveling Support market specific feature and homologation verification activities Skills: Strong ability to work and communicate effectively with her/ his team and peers within the service engineering organization Strong ability to be self-directed and work independently, with strong organization and documentation skills Exceptional capacity for managing simultaneous activities and challenges Strong analytical problem solving skills and hands-on experience with hardware, tools, instruments, CAN or similar protocol analysis Experience with complex automotive and electromechanical systems, preferably electric vehicles or high voltage DC systems such as DC storage or DC-DC converters Skilled with common workplace and database software (MS Word, Excel, Visio, Access, etc.) Able to read and interpret mechanical drawings and electrical schematics, experience with CAD systems such as CATIA a plus Experience with Service Engineering teams and working practice with Engineers within certain subsystems Experience with environmental and safety requirements a plus Experience with OEM Diagnostic equipment, tooling and advance troubleshooting methods. Using Python, C++, Qt, UDS is preferred Qualifications: Bachelor degree or higher in automotive or mechanical engineering preferred Minimum 2 years’ experience as diagnostic/master technician or field support engineer Be able to communicate in Thai and English (additional foreign languages a plus) Broad Automotive experience preferred

Our client is a world global automotive manufacturer. Responsibilities Supporting the region in the development and implementation of logistics concepts and tools to realize and continuously develop logistics operations in the plants. Planning, coordinating and implementing concepts for inbound and outbound Logistics. Realizing economic calculation and cost optimization of Logistics concepts and processes. Planning, developing and procuring logistic equipment. Implementing KPI reporting standards for Logistics within all company locations in the region, including the collection of data from plants, consistency checks, data tracking & consolidation as well as reporting. Running logistic supplier development within the region for all chassis systems locations, including the organization, participation and implementation of logistics audits at the suppliers’ plants. Defining, tracking and supporting action plans to optimize the suppliers’ performance within the supply base and initiate countermeasures in case of escalation. Supporting the logistic development in the region, including the field of professional development and the implementation of improvement activities for the plants as well as within the supply chain. Participating actively in the acquisition and implementation of projects. Supporting the cross-departmental / cross-functional coordination of activities (e.g. Internal Logistics, Sales, Purchasing and IT) to ensure effective and efficient interaction in project work as well as on the shop-floor level. Job Specification Degree in Logistics, Engineering, or equivalent. At least 2 years of experience in the field of Logistics Improvement Engineering from automotive manufacturing. Solid experience in using AutoCAD and SAP experience is an advantage. Proven intercultural understanding. Flexible to travel within a region. Ref: RLE:116251

Develop and implement supplier quality improvement initiatives. Work closely with cross-functional teams to drive overall product quality and compliance. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field. Proven experience in Supplier Quality Engineering within the electronic manufacturing industry will be advantage Strong understanding of quality standards, processes, and methodologies. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Effective communication and interpersonal abilities.

Job_Title: Mechanical Engineer/วิศวกรเครื่องกล
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Collaborate with the core team (including those from the HQ) to understand, develop and update the datacenter mechanical designs, starting from basis of design (BOD) to issue for constructions (IFC) documents, for new data center project build-outs and major infrastructure upgrades to all levels of testing and commissioning works. Manage power system issues during concept design, detailed design, procurement, bidding, manufacturing, delivery and installation on site. Identify and resolve issues raised by the cross-functional teams. Update and maintain the internal design specifications, drawings and standards in accordance with the latest configurations and including all 'lessons learned' in relation to all equipment. Provide and prepare all types of documents, including: statement of work, engineering reports, design documents, feasibility report, total cost of ownership analysis, drawing markup, budget, schedule, commissioning documents, relevant RFx and tender bidding documents including but not exclusive to E&M projects. Develop next generation mechanical system products to meet company long term strategies. Provide on-site technical support and verification. Handling overall design & technical support for job operation, co-ordination and administration. Other relevant assignments as specified by manager. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in related Mechanicals Engineer. Preferably with 10 years of experience in bidding, designing, operating and commissioning mechanical systems; Experience working in a design/build environment for mission critical facilities; Experience in the design, operation and commissioning of industrial cooling systems; Knowledge of large-scale mission critical facility’s mechanical infrastructure systems; Demonstrated knowledge of electrical and control systems; Self-motivated, self-disciplined, organized, detail-oriented and responsible; Able to work under pressure and tight schedules; Good communication, interpersonal and problem-solving skills; Proficient in MS office, MS Project, AutoCAD skills or related knowledge preferable; BIM & CFD skills will be in advantage; Good command of spoken and written English.

Qualifications: Bachelor degree or above; Be familiar with English terms of car body, be able to communicate in spoken English and understand the technical requirements of 2D drawings; More than 5 years experience in body design and development and production management.

Job_Title: วิศวกรโยธา
Company: United Flour Mill Public Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: ตำแหน่ง วิศวกรโยธา ดูแลงานโยธาสุขาภิบาล ก่อสร้าง และงานโครงการ ต่างๆของบริษัท พัฒนา และปรับปรุงระบบงานโยธาในโรงงาน อาทิ งานซ่อมสร้าง งานโครงสร้างโรงงาน เป็นต้น ปฏิบัติงานด้านวิศวกรรมโยธาในโรงงานให้เป็นไปตามแผนงานที่กำหนด รายงานความคืบหน้าให้ผู้บังคับบัญชารับทราบ รวมทั้งปัญหาและอุปสรรค พร้อมแนวทางแก้ไข งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ การศึกษา สาขาวิศวกรรมโยธา หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์การทำงาน 2 ปีขึ้นไป ด้านโยธา มีใบประกอบวิชาชีพ(กว.) มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีความรับผิดชอบ ระยะเวลาทำงาน จันทร์-เสาร์ 8.00-17.00 น. สถานที่ทำงาน โรงงานยูไนเต็ดฟลาวมิลล์ ถ. ปู่เจ้าสมิงพราย ต. บางหญ้าแพรกอ.พระประแดง จ. สมุทรปราการ

Job_Title: Supervisor Quality  - Automotive Plant, Gateway City, Chachoengsao
Job_Description: Responsibilities Execute APQP activities for new product development / sustaining product with new tooling by establishing Quality Assurance Plan, Inspection plan, QC jigs/gauges design & measurement method development, Module Qualification (Tooling/Fixture, Assembly, Material, Operator, Measurement System), Parts Run Evaluation, Parts Release & Open Issues list follow-up to closure. As Quality representative core team member in Project Management Team meeting, execute tightened LEANPD processes in each project gate & ensure all deliverables completion on time project schedule. Responsible for First Article Inspection, capability study evaluation, part release and PPAP submission. Participate in PRD feasibility study/design review in all project phases (Concept, Design, Industrialize) Actively involves in DFMEA/PFMEA review to provide input from past Lesson Learn to identify potential risks for review, assessment and preventive/detective action plan. Involve in EP (Error Proofing) concept review discussion and conduct RFMEA to verify and stress test EP. Capture all defects from development, qualification and realization phase into lesson learn database for future project improvement. Escalate projects with high complexity and projects with high risk to meet APQP elements or customer requirement in the APQP Escalation Report. Ensure customer specific requirements are documented and executed to fulfill customer requirement. Form cross functional team and drive 8D response to customer complaints, and follow up to closure. Safe Launch production monitoring, regular review performance criteria and drive all open issues list to closure for safe launch exit on time. Propose budget for new inspection / test equipment & customized jigs/gauges required for new product. Any other assignments delegated by Superiors. Qualifications Degree/Diploma in Quality Management/Engineering discipline. Preferably with 7 years of working experience in Quality Assurance role of any manufacturing industry. Knowledge and experience in ISO9001/IATF16949/ISO14001 standards, Quality Management System Audit, Manufacturing Process Audit, Failure Mode Effects Analysis (FMEA), Measurement System Analysis (MSA), Statistical Process Control (SPC), Advance Product Quality Planning (APQP), Production Part Approval Process (PPAP), 8-Discipline Methodology, 5-Why Analysis, Ishikawa Diagram Analysis and Design of Experiment (DOE) preferred. If have work experience and knowledge of connector manufacturing processes (stamping, molding, mechanical assembly) and cable assembly process will get prior consideration. Good English speaking and writing skills. Strong analytical, communication and presentation skills. Positive mindset with good interpersonal skills to interact with all levels and able to work as a team. Strong management skills of priority and independent of working style. Innovative and creative thinking, with openness to change and diverse perspectives. Uphold high standards of ethics, integrity, and accountability value. Willing to work beyond own core responsibility for the benefits of functional/departmental goal. Work Location: Gateway City IE, Chachoengsao

Tasks and Responsibilities: Installing and commissioning filling and packaging equipment at customer sites Troubleshooting, inspecting and identifying equipment issues Providing technical support for part sales, service and maintenance work for internal staff and customers Able to perform preventive maintenance Communicate and update appropriate customer operation on maintenance activities and other technical issues to maintain good relationship with customers Qualifications: Bachelor`s Degree in Mechanical, Mechatronics, or Electrical Engineering A minimum of 2 years of experience is preferred Willingness to travel extensively in Thailand and overseas Prior experience in working in multinational teams is preferred Proficiency in English Interested applicants please click “APPLY NOW” Human Resources Department Krones - Thailand 39th Floor, Interlink Tower 1858/138 Bangna-Trad Rd. Bangna Bangkok 10260 For more information please visit http://www.krones.com [link removed]

Job responsibilities: Perform corrective and preventive maintenance program and ensures the readiness of all the plant equipment in order to meet the production volume and OEE target requirement. Perform daily management following PDCA & SDCA principle Conduct weekly root cause analysis for machine breakdown and minimize down time via BDA. Summary machine breakdown via BDR (Breakdown report) and finding root cause with BDA (Breakdown analysis) using 4M analysis, why-why analysis and fish bone analysis. Perform machine breakdown versus actions to ensure that all roots cause was analyzed with actions verified. Initiates machine improvement and corrective action in the processing line and production process to eliminate or prevent repeated machine breakdown Motivates personnel through periodic dialogue, counseling and coaching, recognition of exemplary performances and encouraging high-level performance. Take lead and perform quarterly machine inspection and yearly overhaul. Build up LET (Local Expert Trainer), technical team and production operators’ capabilities. Provide solution to reduce Mean Time To Repair (MTTR) and increase Mean Time Between Failure (MTBF) of wet part machines. Skill and Experience: Bachelor's degree or higher in Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering and other related fields. Working knowledge of Beverage PET manufacturing process Good technical basic maintenance for dry/wet part machines Good understanding of Preventive Maintenance, Corrective Maintenance, Spare Part Management, and People plan. Good knowledge and computer skill such as MS-Office, Drawing, SAP and E-CAD for Krones etc. Good command of spoken, written English and communication in Thai as well.

Your Responsibilities Motivating and monitoring internal and external resources to accomplish all tasks and milestones. Leading and collaborating with team allocated to the project Identifying, qualifying, quantifying, managing project risk and ensuring that all opportunities are identified and pursued. Effectively monitoring and controlling project progress and efficient resource utilization. Monitoring and controlling project financials, overseeing project invoicing status, cost, expenses, and cash flow. Ensuring that the project consistently applies contract and claims management, in accordance with ABB policies and contractual agreements. Applying immediate recovery actions for schedule delays and cost overruns, under guidance and coaching if required. Defining and applying basic project scheduling techniques to manage schedule risks proactively to avoid possible future schedule deviations with OTD impact Identifying and planning all document deliverables required by the contractual scope of work and incorporates this plan into the overall project plan/schedule. A collaborative, solution-focused approach and strong written and spoken communication skills.

Job_Title: (Urgent) Safety Department Manager //Salary Up to 120k //Location Minburi
Job_Description: Industry: Food manufacturing Job Description -To manage, support and advise on the safety point of view in the company. -Plan operations to reduce risks in the company's work and monitor the operations to ensure continuity. -Set a safety annual target & plan. -Prescribe suggestions for preventing danger from accidents and emergencies. To reduce and control risks in the company. -Set up a manual of safety standards in the workplace of the company. -Determine types and personal protective equipment suitable for the risks within the company. -To manage, support, and disseminate academic safety information to various departments within the company. -Control schedule training on basic safety knowledge and rules, regulations, and practices in the workplace for new employees and employees who transfer workstations. -Set up a stem for coordinating safety operations with internal and external agencies. Including relevant government agencies properly and appropriately. -Inspect and evaluate the overall performance of the company on safety. -Collect the performance of safety officers at all levels of work and follow up on the performance of work safety by the company's policies and plans Required work experience - Bachelor's Degree or higher in Occupational Health & Safety, Safety Engineering, Safety Science, or related field. - Minimum 10 years of experience in occupational health and safety. - Knowledgeable with Thai safety law regulations concerning occupational safety and health and knowledgeable with Thai environmental law. - Good interpersonal and communication skills to communicate with management and employees at all levels regarding Company HSE guidelines, rules, policies, and procedures. - Knowledge of ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and ISO 45001 systems. - Experienced in food manufacturing. - Good presentation and communication skills in English. - Developing safety skills programs and safety behavior. - Root cause analysis method. Working Hour : Mon - Fri (8.00 - 17.00)

Company: Kruger Ventilation Industries Asia Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Product Manager with a background in Filtration System design, specifically within the engineering team of a well-known filtration company such as Donaldson and Nederman. The successful candidate will be responsible for promoting our Industrial Fans in the Filtration market, including factory filtration systems and process filtration applications such as cement, pharmaceuticals, electronics, wet scrubbers, air pollution control system , and other related areas. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of Filtration System design and knowledge of Industrial Fans, as well as existing contacts with factory owners and project teams within the industry. They will work closely with the sales team and engineering team to develop and execute strategic plans to increase market share and profitability. Responsibilities: Develop and execute strategies to promote Industrial Fans in the Filtration market, including factory filtration systems and process filtration applications. Build and maintain relationships with factory owners and project teams to increase sales and market share. Work closely with the local sales team to identify new opportunities and develop sales plans. Provide technical support to customers and local sales team on Industrial Fans and Filtration System design. Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, customer needs, and competitor activity. Manage product pricing and profitability to achieve sales goals. Provide training and support to the sales team on product features and benefits. Attend industry events, trade shows, and conferences to promote Industrial Fans and Filtration Systems. Develop marketing materials and campaigns to support sales efforts. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or a related field. At least 5 years of experience in Product Management, Sales, or Engineering in the Filtration industry. Experience in Filtration System design, preferably . Solid understanding of Industrial Fans and Filtration System design. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Proven track record of developing and executing successful sales strategies. Existing contacts with factory owners and project teams within the industry. Knowledge of filtration systems in the cement industry, pharmaceuticals, electronics, wet scrubbers, air pollution control systems, and other related industries. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Willingness to travel frequently around the Kruger addressable market. Fluent in Speaking and writing English If you have a passion for Industrial Fans and Filtration System design and are looking for a challenging and rewarding career, we encourage you to apply for this position.

Company: Cargill Group Thailand (กลุ่มบริษัทคาร์กิลล์ ประเทศไทย)
Job_Description: This position is flexible for base location depend on candidate Nakhon Pathom Nakon Ratchasima (Korat) Chachengsao Prachinburi Pitsanulok Nakhon Pathom JOB PURPOSE AND IMPACT The Capex & Reliability Excellence Manager will perform complex capex investment project ,maintenance practices, resource management and tools and processes controls to maintain and improve capacity utilization and quality standards realized through a focus on the engineering and technical operations for our organization. In this role, you will execute the work as selected and needed by the production team through the application of principles, concepts and standards, solving complex problems to improve the organizations products and services. KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES CAPEX monitoring, develop plans, control schedule, budget and oversee and evaluate the construction, installation and renovation of new build equipment. Execute specific equipment maintenance for each asset involved with containing, controlling or safeguarding a high hazard process to ensure the ongoing mechanical, electrical and structural integrity of plant equipment. Deploy complex reliability excellence activities and identify and prioritize reliability engineering value creation opportunities. Implement, monitor and maintain best practices to improve operational effectiveness through continuous improvement and reliability excellence methods and tools. Complete risk analysis of new designs and processes and maintain the mechanical and electrical integrity of new installations and existing systems. Monitor capitalized repair and replacement projects, mitigate complex risk issues and removes barriers to ensure completion of milestones within budget. Complete testing and analysis on failures, proposing changes in design or formulation to improve system and or process reliability. Recommend design or test methods and statistical process control procedures for achieving required levels of product reliability. Identify emerging license needs and complex assets integrity issues to comply with legal requirements and the organization's asset integrity program and strategy and ensure smooth integration of the organization's asset integrity model. Lead cost and budget process to provide asset condition information and comply with business continuity requirements. Participate in the development, design and installation of predictive maintenance programs and technology applications to identify and eliminate defects. Other duties as assigned MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical / Industrial Engineering or related field Minimum of four years of related work experience Other minimum qualifications may apply Excellent in English communications skills PRIOR BENEFICIAL EXPERIENCES Ensure the ongoing mechanical, electrical and structural integrity of plant equipment. Partner with vendors and handle contracts related to asset improvements and new asset project activities. KEY BEHAVIORS Make sense of complex, high-quantity, and sometimes contradictory, information to effectively solve problems Hold self and others accountable to meet commitments. Know the most effective and efficient processes to get things done, focusing on continuous improvement. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES TO BE GAINED Managing and supervision of internal crafts resources including personnel safety, efficiency and effectiveness of work performance. Experience evaluating, analyzing and improving craft utilization and quality workmanship. Experience providing input on budget schedules and project costs.

Our client is the leading manufacturer in Thailand. They are currently looking for a highly competent candidate to fill the position of Safety Manager to support their growing business. Job Description Overseeing the comprehensive SHE documentation procedures to align with policy standards and guidelines. Assuming responsibility for the Policy, SHE Improvement Plan, and the strategy to achieve 100% compliance with manufacturing SHE guidelines. These will be submitted to the Operations Manager and approved by the Managing Director. Coordinating with various departments, the SHE Committee, safety teams, and government officers to ensure a cohesive approach to safety and environmental compliance. Ensuring that all employees comprehend and adhere to the SHE regulations and procedures at the site. Receiving and formulating SHE targets and implementing them through the line functions to achieve set objectives. Managing and overseeing the SHE Improvement Plan, with each subordinate reporting directly to the job holder. Serving as a support figure for safety, health, environment, and security within the line functions to align with policy and targets. Guaranteeing that all activities align with company standards concerning Health, Safety, etc. Ensuring the company's obligations and policies in these areas fully comply with local laws, business requirements, and standards such as ISO9001, ISO14001, TIS18001, TLS (Thai Labour Standards), and other relevant regulations. Managing security and emergency resources to minimize risks to company employees and property. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or higher in Occupational Health and Safety / Environmental Engineering / Engineering or related field. At least 5 years of experience in Occupational Health and Safety and management level. Strong experience in QMR, EMR, OH & SMR. Familiarity with ISO 9001, ISO 14000, TIS18001, and TLS (Thai Labor Standards), requirements must be certified as a professional-level Safety Officer. Understanding of Safety and Environmental Laws, Labor Laws, and relevant legislation. Proficient in English and computer skills.

More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550 dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in Southeast Asia. Position Details Lead person to oversee and manage all product, process, and manufacturing equipment resources of the company working in close relationships with all members of the local and global management team to enhance and maintain the competitive market. Led and managed the daily operation of the process engineering team and senior setter team including IE, Mechanic and Electrical. Handling new technology improvement launches projects. Ensuring that machine capabilities and capacities are aligned with current and future market demands at the highest quality level by following up on new machine and tooling developments of vendors globally and integrating those into the manufacturing system. Maintaining and enhancing the advantage of special manufacturing capabilities by initiating and implementing in-house developments where appropriate. Leading and managing the daily operation of the process engineering team, supporting all KPIs. Developing focused efficiency improvement projects with lean / Six Sigma methodology on Black Belt level or IWS certification (Integrated Work System) and PMO. Leading and coaching subordinates, People Management and driving the manpower performance KPI. Coordinating with internal department and external departments for any project improvement. Ensuring that the HSE-, fire safety- and hygiene rules are kept, and the relevant personal protective equipment is in the respective area. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in industrial, mechanical engineering, or similar fields. 10 years of experience as an Engineering Manager in MNC manufacturing, preferably in Mass Production. Proficiency in MS Office and ERP software. Good English communication. Knowledge of LEAN Manufacturing or WCM. Strong project management skills. Good communication, systematic, and good decision-making skills. Strong leadership skills with the ability to manage subordinates. IWS certification (Integrated Work System) and knowledge is an advantage.

What awaits you? Lead of analysis/maintain/modify/backup the PLC & Robot program including all automations for support the production. Perform root course analysis in case of machine breakdown then find out temporary and permanent solution Propose require material, tools, spare part management to perform troubleshooting maintenance in timely manner Monitor shop floor operation to ensure readiness of all equipment. Perform continuous improvement of all equipment to increase efficiency or eliminate any risks Support new machine , equipment installation, trial by off  and coordinate with equipment vendor Preparation machine/Production document (e.g.PM Plan, SAP Inventory, Frame contract, CP, WI, Test instructions etc.) Develop production to support line balancing simulation or predictive maintenance(Programing coding skill is advantage) Assure all operation process is according to ISO9001/ISO14001/OHAS1800 Support Project implement at plant. What should you bring along? Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering or relate field. Minimum 5 years working experience on maintenance function of bodyshop, Car assembly business. Experience in OEM Manufacturing of bodyshop maintenance  field would be advantage. Good knowledge in Siemen PLC, Robot automation and computer skills Knowledge in Productivity improvement tools. Fluent in English communication, with TOEIC score 600 Understands the technical specifications/changes, be able to search the technical information from various sources in BMW system and prepare correct information for the assembly line. Conflict Management Skills. Strong commitment to targets and schedules. Presentation and Communication skills to management level as well as shop floor. Strong Preventive Maintenance & Corrective Maintenance. Proactive, flexible, good attitude, Teamwork, Positive Thinking. Flexible to work at Rayong.

Main Accountabilities: Working phases: Defines the working phase sequence of a new production process in order to achieve the targeted product cost and equipment investment budget. Ensures appropriate production methods, cycle-time, equipment performance, and materials/components in support of production targets. Improvement projects: Identifies and recommends improvement opportunities and implements improvement projects, ensuring adherence to timeframe, quality and cost requirements. Production process: Ensures the production process complies with the project targets. Approves the design for processes developed internally or externally, and performs final tests with respect to the project. Production support: Provides support to Production during the internal/external process/equipment start-up, defining action plans and training relevant maintenance and production resources. Process technologies: Evaluates new process technologies to improve productivity, quality and cost reduction, defining and leading testing activities, approval criteria and external provider choices. Qualification Bachelor’s degree of Industrial Engineering or in any field Able to work at night shift (shift 1-2-3) , but each will swap one a week Min. 5 years’ Experience in productions planning and shop-floor control and/or productions improvement and process improvement. Experience in Transformer Manufacturing will be advantage. Good command of Thai, English communication. Computer skill in SAP-PP module will be advantage. Good Knowledge in computer engineering applications (PLC, Auto CAD). Reporting to Production Manager

Job_Title: Security Management Senior Manager(70-90K) Shopping Mall
Job_Description: Position: Security Management Senior Manager(70-90K) Shopping Mall Base:  Bangkok Contact Recruiter: Ramida 086-378-4056 ramida(at)mriww.co.th We are seeking a highly capable and experienced Security Maintenance Senior Manager to oversee and manage security operations within the security management department and its affiliated companies. The successful candidate will be responsible for planning and managing disaster prevention, traffic management, security maintenance, and closed-circuit television (CCTV) systems, as well as supervising the security of stores and administrative security operations. Job Responsibilities: Supervising and managing the internal operations of the security management department and affiliated companies. Planning and managing disaster prevention, traffic management, security maintenance, CCTV systems, and store security, as well as administrative security operations. Developing training plans for disaster prevention, traffic management, security maintenance, and CCTV systems. Developing strategies and budgets for the security management department and affiliated companies. Planning and developing security and traffic management systems for all companies within the group. Coordinating with internal and external stakeholders on security management matters. Analyzing, planning, and improving processes to address complaints and issues related to security operations. Establishing and maintaining ISO documentation for the entire system. Possessing a fundamental knowledge of laws and regulations. Demonstrating the ability to plan, control, and resolve issues related to security and service. Ability to work under pressure. Qualifications: A Bachelor's degree in any related field 5-10 years of management experience in security management. Proficiency in security management and capacity planning. Experienced working in shopping malls / commercial buildings If you meet the qualifications and are interested in joining our security management team, we encourage you to apply now. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package along with opportunities for growth and development within our organization. Interested candidates should submit their resume referring to the position to ramida(at)mriww.co.th If you think you are the right candidate, Please call Ramida now!! 086-378-4056

MAIN DUTIES Responsible for the following tasks: Product Specification creation;  all new products supplied to customers to have associated Product Specification published and approved for external distribution. Product Specification amendments; update existing Product Specifications and related older records with new information and documents. To upload and maintain all documents in accordance with Datamars Quality and Document Control procedures. Responsible for training and supporting other Datamars staff members to understand how documents are updated, stored, sorted and how to easily access information. In conjunction with the Pre-Sales team, the Associate Applications Engineer will work closely with sales team members to develop detailed product requirements and specifications. In conjunction with the Pre-Sales team, the Associate Applications Engineer will work cross-functionally with individuals and project teams in Marketing, Operations, and Development to support the process of new device customisation and development. Support creation and assessment of product configurations and samples to meet customer requirements, technical and commercial feasibility. Scope includes the range of AHDS devices customised for animal health company customers and distribution via Datamars regional entities Management of AHDS Sample Requests & Tool Trials, including sales samples, configuration samples, new colour tool trials, and test samples for functional or compatibility testing. Management of technical requests with our R&D group, including the raising of requests, facilitation & support of approved requests with the supply of parts, samples and applications expertise, and critical reviewing of reports to provide feedback. For Animal Health Delivery Systems Datamars Innovation Process & Change Request Projects, collaborate between Project Managers and Datamars Thailand Product & Process and/or R&D Engineers. Support for rapid evaluation and resolution for minor quality & complaint issues. o Low volume replacement parts for faulty devices. o Track & monitor via JIRA CR process. Update and publish Simcro Colour Device and Speciality Packaging (approved colours). Management of KIT Image Collection and supporting library. REQUIREMENTS Mechanical Engineering qualification (or equivalent) Excellent written and oral communication in English Expertise and understanding of animal health industry, animal health formulations and animal health delivery systems not essential but an advantage Experience in the plastic’s industry, including plastic product design and manufacturing processes Good track record in people and process skills Having a balanced mix of technical and business skills Experience in commercialization of new product developments an advantage. Experience with product assessment, material & test specs generation, and AHDS product design and development Skill in Quality system and BOM Personal Attributes: Excellent communication & collaboration skills Investigative individuals, meaning inquisitive, curious & analytical with attention to detail Strong problem solving, risk assessment, and commercial viability skills. Must be capable of working on multiple projects in a deadline driven environment Project and resource management skills Self-motivated, proactive and goal oriented

Job_Title: Project Manager/ผู้จัดการโครงการ
Job_Description: วัตถุประสงค์หลักของงาน (Main Objectives) รับผิดชอบการวางแผนและบริหารโครงการ เพื่อให้โครงการที่รับผิดชอบเป็นไปตามแผนมีคุณภาพตามหลักวิศวกรรมและเป็นไปตามแผนงาน และงบประมาณ หน้าที่หลักของงาน (Key Result Areas) ติดต่อประสานงานกับหน่วยงานราชการและเอกชนภายนอกที่เกี่ยวข้องในการดำเนินงานโครงการ วางแผนโครงการก่อสร้าง ทั้งแผนงาน งบประมาณ อุปกรณ์ ทีมงานและผู้รับเหมาให้ตรงตามเวลาที่กำหนด ควบคุมตรวจสอบการทำงานของผู้รับเหมาให้ได้ตามรูปแบบ คุณภาพตามมาตรฐาน ปฏิบัติการตามสัญญาอย่างเคร่งครัด บริหารต้นทุน เวลาและงบประมานของโครงการให้ได้ตามเป้าหมายของผู้บริหาร ประสานงานกับฝ่ายต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น ฝ่ายออกแบบ จัดซื้อ การเงินและบัญชี การตลาดและขาย เจ้าหน้าที่ธนาคาร หน่วยงานราชการในเรื่องที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการก่อสร้าง มอบหมายหน้าที่งานแก่ผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา พร้อมติดตามการดูแลการปฏิบัติงาน และ ประเมินผลงานการทำงานของพนักงานในระบบ OKRs และอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมาย บริหารงานสำนักงาน เช่น ตรวจสอบแผนก่อสร้าง ยอดรายได้ ยอดโอน, ตรวจสอบรายงานความคืบหน้าโครงการ ฯลฯ จัดทำตรวจสอบเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับงานก่อสร้างและผู้รับเหมาต่างๆ ตามระบบบริหารคุณภาพ ISO ทบทวนและตรวจสอบ อนุมัติแผนงานหลัก และแผนงานย่อย แผนงานประจำเดือนของผู้รับเหมาต่างๆให้เป็นไปตามสัญญาว่าจ้าง อนุมัติและตรวจสอบแบบ SHOP DRAWING เพื่อให้งานไม่ติดขัด และเกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด นำเสนอแนวคิดและนวัตกรรมใหม่ในเชิงการก่อสร้างให้แก่ทางผู้บริหาร และนำมาประยุกต์ใช้กับองค์กรได้ ประสานงาน และควบคุมการตรวจสอบคุณภาพงานก่อสร้าง (QC) และการเก็บงาน defect รับผิดชอบในขั้นตอนการตรวจรับบ้านของลูกค้าเพื่อรับโอน งานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติของผู้ดำรงตำแหน่ง (Job Specification) การศึกษา/สาขา   ปริญญาตรี - โท ด้านวิศวกรรมโยธา ประสบการ์ณ 5-7ปี หากผ่านงานอสังหาริมทรัพย์ที่อยู่ในตลาดหลักทรัพย์ จะพิจารณเป็นพิเศษ สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน Head Quarter : 1624 ถนนเพชรบุรีตัดใหม่ เขตราชเทวี แขวงมักกะสัน กรุงเทพฯ https://g.page/aestimaasset?share [link removed] Site : โครงการ ARTHA พหล-อารีย์ ซอย อินทามระ 4 แขวง สามเสนใน เขตพญาไท กรุงเทพมหานคร ARTHA PHAHOL-ARI [link removed] :โครงการ ARKIN V84  ซอยวิภาวดี 84 ถนนวิภาวดีรังสิต แขวงสีกัน(ดอนเมือง) เขตดอนเมือง(บางเขน) กรุงเทพมหานคร ARKIN [link removed] สวัสดิการ ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี ต่างประเทศ หรือในประเทศ โบนัสประจำปี ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี ประกันสังคม ประกันสุขภาพ ประกันชีวิต ประกันอุบัติเหตุ Work from home สลับวันหยุด งานเลี้ยงต้อนรับพนักงานใหม่ งานเลี้ยงวันเกิดพนักงาน กิจกรรมเดือนละ 1 ครั้ง งานสังสรรค์เดือนละ 1 ครั้ง ค่าเดินทาง วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปีสามารถใช้ได้หลังจากผ่านทดลองงาน ขั้นต่ำ 10 วัน ลากิจ 3 วัน ลาป่วย 30 วัน ลาทำหมันตามใบรับรองแพทย์ ที่อยู่บริษัท เอสติม่า แอสเสท จำกัด [link removed]

Job_Title: Manufacturing Engieer (2-5yrs+ in Manufacturing/ Required Technomatix &...
Job_Description: Company Summary: International Leading Information Technology Company Location:  Bangkok, BTS - MRT Lines Reference:  BSM 50284 JOB SUMMARY: This role involves supporting Technomatix Plant Simulation and OpsCenter APS software, requiring an understanding of process flows to construct simulation models for bottleneck analysis, throughput analysis, and logistics optimization. Additionally, responsibilities include product presentations, demonstrations, training, customer support, software installation, configuration, customization, and problem-solving. JOB DESCRIPTION: Develop simulation models to analyze bottlenecks, optimize throughput, and enhance logistics efficiency. Conduct product presentations, demonstrations, and customer training sessions. Offer comprehensive support, including software installation, configuration, customization, and troubleshooting assistance. You will be discussing more in-depth descriptions with our consultant in the interview session. QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing or related field. Experience 2-5 years in backgro Manufacturing und Experience in discrete event simulation for bottleneck analysis, throughput analysis, and logistics optimization is advantageous. Proficiency in manufacturing process, production improvement, and supply chains Technomatix Plant Simulation and OpsCenter APS software certificate is required Computer literacy; MS Office Good command of English Salary      : THB 25,000 - 45,000 (Based on qualifications & experiences) Benefit     : Bonus, Group Insurance (OPD/IPD), Provident Fund, and other attractive benefits. Employee Type: Full Time/ Permanent **Only Shortlisted Candidates will be Considered** If you are interested, please do not hesitate to send your full English resume by clicking Apply. SMARTCRUIT CONSULTANT COMPANY LIMITED Contact person: K.Sirapatsorn (Chilli) Amarin Tower, Unit A, 5th Floor, 496-502, Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 (BTS Chitlom) Tel: 063 323 5079 (Working hour : Mon - Fri 9.00 - 18.00) WEBSITE: smartcruit.co [link removed] LINE: @SMARTCRUIT [link removed] FACEBOOK: Smartcruit [link removed] (Salaryland: Mindset l Attitude l How To l Work-Life เพื่อวัยทำงานให้ประสิทธิภาพเพิ่มขึ้น 99%)

WE ARE EXPANDING OUR FACTORY IN THAILAND ! Are you bored with your current job? Wanna challenge yourself? We are looking for energetic talents to join our growing factory - Maintenance Engineer is in charge of machine troubleshooting and preventive maintenance for both production equipment and facilities. Work with teams to support NPI build, take charge of line layout verification and line setup. Facility and equipment application and spare part management. DUTIES & ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS Responsible for machine downtime and take corrective and preventive actions. Troubleshooting equipment malfunctions. Work with teams to improve machines’ stability and reliability. Identify and implement safety rules for all facilities and machines, including newly introduced ones. Work with teams to support NPI build. Take charge of line setup, equipment setup and stations & lines qualification. Responsible for spare part management and setup safety stock. Train and coach technicians to fulfil job requirement QUALIFICATIONS Degree in Electrical Engineering/Automation At least 5 years working experience in facilities, equipment maintenance. Experience in laser machine is preferred. Special for facilities, at least 3 years electric HVAC project implement and management. Familiar with laser or CNC program and troubleshooting. Great experience in factory facilities setup. Good knowledge and Practical in PLC (Programmable Logic Control) would be an advantage. Good knowledge in electric circuit diagram, Electrician license preferred. Good knowledge in pneumatics and hydraulics system. Good knowledge in TPM Principle. Good command in English ** Able to work at Amata City I.E. , Chonburi**

Job_Title: Sr. / Sales Engineer of Liquid analysis
Job_Description: To sell Endress+Hauser products and services; and to be a consulting business partner to customers to determine current and future needs. People in this position become technically competent with the application of products, and gain a general understanding of process conditions. This position helps customers by providing the correct solutions to their problems; being a problem-solver, a trusted advisor, and a technical expert in applying our products; and being a liaison between the customer and the company. Moreover, people in the position build relationships and rapport with customers (they become more than just a point of contact); and also understand the customer’s processes. Responsibilities : Achieve sales objectives within product range. Respond market and present & promote secure new sales for the full rang of E & H. product or exceed sales and profit targets for your account. Have Products Knowledge of Instrumentation. Ensure & Accuracy and Completely - PO. (Purchasing Order) and Order Processing for customers. Promote customer appropriate products and service. Analyze, prepare and assist on proposal offer to the customer. Support project team to conclude order. Coordinator during project team & customer for project execution. Coordinator with oversea specialist for customer special requirement. Solution assessment and coordinate service support for customer. Responsibility for on-site visit. Coordinate & Follow up on-time delivery products with logistics. Provide input of sales forecast. Pursue sales leads. Maintaining and building up relationship with customer. Responsibility for Sales reports and Activities reports. Cooperate with other departments. Special assignment at per attachment. Qualifications : Good command in English (Written, Spoken, Listened). Graduated Bachelor's or Master's Engineering of Instrumentation, Control & Instrumentation and related field - with GPA 2.5 up People who's experience in business market -Local people will be advantage. Work experience at least 2 years(up) in Instrumentation / Control instrumentation, Automation and 5 years experience in related field. Knowledge Basic Instrument Engineering. Ability to recognize key decision makers within a customer’s organization. Have a good understanding of general process operations (e.g. recognize limitations of technologies, recognize competitive limitations, and recognize potential problems at a customer’s plant). Recognize sales opportunities beyond what the customer called you out for. Ability to be persistent and determined, and to handle rejection. Ability to build and sustain relationships with customers. High responsibilities and able work under pressured and work in aggressively. Proficiency in Microsoft office, Lotus Note, SAP. etc. Personal attributes : (Must have) Analytical Interpersonal Skills Service Mind Dependability Detail Oriented Work Ethic Able to travel up - country As an innovative company we offer you the long-term opportunity to advance in your career and build on your qualifications. Working in a motivated and committed team, you will input with interesting ideas and help us shape the future together. Your personality counts! Please send your application by click "Apply Now" or send documents to: Endress+Hauser (Thailand) Ltd. As the Power Plant Director, you will be responsible for the overall management, operation and strategic direction of the power plant facility. This role requires a strong leader with extensive experience in power generation, project management and a proven track record of ensuring operational efficiency while maintaining the highest safety and quality standards. Job Description: Lead, manage and oversee all aspects of power plant operations to ensure the efficient and reliable generation of electricity. Develop and implement strategic plans, policies, and procedures to optimize plant performance, including production efficiency, maintenance schedules and cost management. Direct and coordinate activities related to plant maintenance, outage planning and equipment upgrades to ensure minimal downtime and maximum output. Ensure compliance with industry regulations, environmental standards, and safety protocols, fostering a culture of safety and environmental stewardship. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineering, maintenance, finance and regulatory affairs to achieve operational objectives and resolve issues. Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess plant performance and implement continuous improvement initiatives. Prepare budgets, forecasts, and reports related to plant operations and provide regular updates to senior management. Qualification: Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, or related field). Advanced degree or relevant certifications are advantageous. Minimum of 8-10 years of progressive experience in power plant operations with at least 5 years in a managerial or leadership role. Comprehensive knowledge of power generation processes, equipment and technologies. Strong leadership and people management skills with the ability to inspire and lead a diverse team. Proven track record in project management, operational efficiency and cost control . Excellent communication, problem-solving and decision-making abilities. Familiarity with company frameworks and regulations is preferred. English is preferred Able to relocate If you interested in this role and want to contribute to the growth and success  Apply now!

Job Summary Responsible for manpower management to ensure sub ordinates are working 24/7 as operation plan. And machine management for Mechanical and Electrical maintenance system to maintain, improve the machine in the manufacturing of Safety, Quality, Food Safety required and performs in processing line and always keep production run. Job Description Manpower management to manage team in Maintenance Shift support for operator 24/7. Perform corrective and preventive maintenance program and ensures the readiness of all the plant equipment in order to meet the production volume and OEE target requirement. Perform daily management following PDCA & SDCA principle Conduct weekly root cause analysis for machine breakdown and minimize down time via BDA. Summary machine breakdown via BDR (Breakdown report) and finding root cause with BDA (Breakdown analysis) using 4M analysis, why-why analysis and fish bone analysis. Perform machine breakdown versus actions to ensure that all roots cause was analyzed with actions verified. Initiates machine improvement and corrective action in the processing line and production process to eliminate or prevent repeated machine breakdown. Motivates personnel through periodic dialogue, counseling and coaching, recognition of exemplary performances and encouraging high-level performance. Take lead and perform quarterly machine inspection and yearly overhaul. Coach Technician work on shop floor to perform good performance and achieve AOP. Follow QFS Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that Product without Quality Food Safety Issue. Follow Safety Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that machine and equipment without safety Issue Performs other tasks / duties in support company goals and objective Perform task assignment by Senior Engineers / Repair and Maintenance manager. Understand and communicate compliance requirements, risks, and best practices. Identify and control hazards and risks by near miss report and MOC process. Monitor compliance status and develop/recommend plans to close gaps. Educate and coach direct report on HSE topics and their responsibilities. Demonstrate safety behavior and environmental awareness of maintenance activity. Facilitate a culture that promotes safe work behaviors/correct environmental focus as a way of business. Institutionalize HSE activities as necessary elements of the business. Manage HSE-related records Interface with regulatory agencies during inspection and enforcement activities. Demonstrate safe behavior and work procedures. Support all ISO and AIB external audit. Job Qualification Bachelor’s degree or higher of Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics or other related Engineering Profession. Working knowledge of CSD/NCB manufacturing process is advantage. Experience in Instrument field and PLC in advantage. Experience in Food and Beverage in advantage More advantage fort possesses technical knowledge in the following fields with at least 3 years’ experience: Mechanical Engineering Fields. Industrial process & control Packaging or manufacturing technology. Good understanding engineering tools such as MTTR, MTBF, PDCA, Root Cause Analysis. Good knowledge and computer skill such as MS-office, AutoCAD, MS-Project, etc. Good command of spoken, written English and Good communication in Thai as well. Good Leadership and motivate with teamwork. Be able to work on Saturday.

Job_Title: QA Assistant Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการแผนก QA
Job_Description: Main Goal of job : Responsible for overall site Risk Management and PMS process compliance for company, Ensuring compliance to all regulatory/standards requirements per Quality Manual. JOB RESPONSIBILITY: Manage the site Risk Management process with full adherence to requirements of ISO14971. Ensure timely review and update of Risk Management files linked to changes identified through MOC or CAPA process. Ensure updates are addressed to stakeholders in a timely manner. Actively participate in all department discussions pertaining to review and update of Risk Management files. Report to QA Manager on the performance of the Risk Management and Post Market Surveillance status, including the need for process improvement. Manage site Post market Surveillance (PMS) Process with QMR. Coordinate the PMS Data Collection and complete the PMS Data Analysis. This may include communicating with global contact personals. Coordinate the review of PMS Data Analysis with QMR,PRRC and stake holders not limited to RA, R&D and Production. Prepare PSUR report and obtain approval before uploading it into EUDAMED. Conduct periodic floor audit to ensure real time compliance on process and quality control documentation, especially the Device History Record Maintain high standard of internal and external customer service to include investigation and issue resolution. Develop quality-related training programs for the team. Other job functions within the QA scope of work to be assigned by the superior. Qualifications. Bachelor's Degree or higher in Science, Engineering, or related field. Minimum 5 years of experience in Regulatory or QA. 3 years of experience in quality assurance in high volume manufacturing environment, preferable in Medical Device manufacturing. Experience in managing PMS for Medical Device manufacturing is an advantage. Knowledge in ISO13485:2016 or ISO14971:2019 and MHLW or MDR or 21CFR820 or MDSAP is required. Good command in English both writing and speaking. Proficiency in Microsoft office. (Word / Excel / Power point) is required.

Job_Description: Role & Responsibility วางแผนการทำงาน กำกับดูแล ตรวจสอบ ควบคุมคุณภาพหน้างานรวมทั้งความถูกต้องในการทำงานของทีมติดตั้งให้เป็นไปตามแผนที่กำหนด รวมถึงการพัฒนาทักษะฝีมือทีมงาน ติดตั้ง ให้มีคุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพในการแข่งขันในตลาดได้ อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ มียอดผู้เข้ามาใช้บริการเพิ่มขึ้นตามเป้าหมายที่กำหนดในแต่ละปี ทั้งในส่วนงานที่เป็นติดตั้งและงานปรับปรุงอาคาร ส่งเสริมภาพลักษณ์ที่ดีให้กับองค์กรหรือแบรนด์ vFIX หน้าที่รับผิดชอบหลัก 1) สำรวจและส่งผลสำรวจ ตรวจสอบความถูกต้องแบบ พร้อมทำใบเสนอราคา 2) วางแผนงานและกำหนดรูปแบบหน้างานให้ถูกต้องตามหลักวิศวกรรมและวิชาการ และควบคุมงานให้เป็นไปตามแผนงานที่วางไว้ 3) เข้าเปิดงานการติดตั้งงาน Renovate ติดตามความคืบหน้า ตรวจสอบความถูกต้องตามหลักวิศวกรรมประสานงานลูกค้าพร้อมทั้งชี้แจงถึงขอบข่ายการทำงาน 4) ตรวจสอบแก้ไขปัญหาหน้างานหรือข้อร้องเรียนในงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายหรือพื้นที่รับผิดชอบ เข้าประสานงานลูกค้าและแก้ไขปัญหาอย่างทันท่วงที พร้อมทั้งรายงานปัญหาตามลำดับขั้นบริหาร 5) สรุป OH Renovate (Tracking2) และ ตารางสรุปยอดงานสำรวจ QT QC (Tracking1) Report ในส่วนงานที่รับผิดชอบ หรือเอกสารอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อเพิ่มหรือส่งเสริมประสิทธิภาพการทำงานและการขายงานติดตั้ง งานปรับปรุงพื้นที่ Qualifications : 1.) ปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมศาสตร์/ครุศาสตร์บันฑิต ทางด้านโยธา, ก่อสร้าง หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง 2.) ประสบการณ์ทำงานอย่างน้อย 2-3 ปี ผ่านการควบคุมงานควบคุมงานการก่อสร้าง งานโยธาสถาปัตย์ ตกแต่ง งานระบบไฟฟ้า ประปา สุขาภิบาล, งานตรวจสอบคุณภาพบ้านก่อนส่งมอบลูกค้า, สามารถคำนวณหาปริมาณวัสดุ, คำนวณ โครงสร้างคอนกรีตเสริมเหล็ก โครงสร้างเหล็ก 3.) สามารถใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์พื้นฐาน MS office, Auto cad เป็นต้น 4.) สามารถขับขี่รถยนต์หรือจักรยานยนต์ พร้อมใบขับขี่ส่วนบุคคล 5.) ได้รับใบอนุญาตประกอบวิชาชีวิศวกรรมควบคุม จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ *** พื้นที่ในความรับผิดชอบกรุงเทพฯและปริมณฑล (สามารถปรับเปลี่ยนพื้นที่รับผิดชอบได้ตามความเหมาะสม)*** ควบคุม พนักงานใน Zone ที่รับผิดชอบ ( แยกกันตามโซน ) 1.บางบัวทอง บางกรวย บางใหญ่ ปทุมธานี นนทบุรี 2. อ้อมน้อย มหาชัย บางขุนเทียน บางบอน จอมทอง พระประแดง 3. บางนา บางพลี ประเวศ อ่อนนุช ลาดกระบัง สำโรง ปากน้ำ บางปู

Job_Description: คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมศาสตร์(วศ.บ.)สาขาเครื่องกลและอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์0-3ปี ยินดีรับผู้สมัครที่จบใหม่ สามารถอ่านแบ เขียนแบบ2D AutoCAD , 3D SOLID work มีความรู้ ความสามารถด้านงานออกแบบ ปรับปรุง  แก้ไขระบบ สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ มีทักษะในการแก้ไขปัญหา การประสานงาน การตัดสินใจ มีความรับผิดชอบ พร้อมเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ มีสุขภาพแข็งแรงสมบูรณ์ไม่เป็นโรคติดต่อร้ายแรง สามารถเดินทางมาทำงานเองได้ หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ควบคุม ดูแลออกแบบ เขียนแบบ การติดตั้งของโครงการที่ได้รับมอบหมาย วางแผน คอบคุมจัดเตรียม ปฏิบัติงาน Spare Part  และ งานจ้างต่างๆ ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องให้บรรลุเป้าหมาย งานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับหมอบหมาย สวัสดิการ การฝึกอบรบและพัฒนาพนักงาน ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา เงินช่วยเหลือค่าครองชีพ ค่าน้ำมันรถ/กรณีนำรถปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่ ประกันสังคม เครื่องแบบพนักงาน โบนัสประจำปี ลากิจ/ลาป่วย วันหยุดตามประเพณี สถานที : บริษัท พีเคซี เอ็นจิเนียริ่ง แอนด์ ซัพพลาย จำกัด 136/19 หมู่ 11 ต.บางพระ อ.ศรีราชา จ.ชลบุรี

‘CONNECT ENERGY (THAILAND) CO., LTD. is an internationally accredited recruitment solutions and services consultancy. Now we're looking for Petroleum Engineer as detail below; Location: Bangkok Condition: Permanent Responsibilities: The main duty to Perform well/reservoir performance analysis to optimize the production and maximize hydrocarbon recovery at cost effective manner while maintaining a strong emphasis on reducing environmental impact. This position needs to work with Geoscientist to increase the sub-surface understanding and reduce uncertainty in dealing with sub-surface work plan, identify the workover opportunity and lead the maturation process and perform Yearly Reserve Assessment exercise and update the reserve status accordingly. Maintained the production/well/zone and reservoir database according to the well intervention sequent with the production performance accordingly. Co-ordinate with Well Engineers for all Workover Programs, Workover Reports & revised Well Schematics Responsible to communicate with DMF and other Government bodies as required, this should be to assist in DMF information requests and company support issues Actively review the well/reservoir performance for production optimization and organize the sub-surface review, collaborate and work together with Geoscientist in the team Identify the surface and process system and address the de-bottle-necking elements to maximize the production Perform PE duties including Well pressure surveys and fluid analysis and data plots, this should include Oil / Gas analysis Reports / third part liaison. Field monitoring and advise production operation on the physical constraint applicable to the reservoir characteristic, give solution or other reservoir management to increase well potential and development Perform hydrocarbon accountant, finalize production profile, incorporate identified opportunities to improve production potential or availability Actively search for improvement, reservoir study and initiate new technology and incorporating it where applicable to improve or enhance crude oil recovery Prepare the short-term and long-term production forecast to generate the long-term revenue forecast as part of Business Planning exercise Coordinate the Work Program and Budget especially for Workover and well intervention program Prepare the well conversion if applicable to support water flood/water disposal requirement Advise Operations department on the physical constraints applicable to well / reservoir / field production (e.g. sand, water, gas production, scaling potential, corrosion potential, etc.) Qualification: Bachelor's degree in Petroleum Engineering 5-10 years of experience as Petroleum Engineer Professional engineering license preferred Proven experience working as an engineer in the petroleum industry Knowledgeable in engineering drilling techniques and methods Strong industrial knowledge and understanding of market conditions Excellent verbal and written communication skills Good reporting and presentation skills Skilled in computer technology and Microsoft applications For interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary by email. Email: varisa.sangsuwan @ connect-energy.com (ติดกันหมด) All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality.

URGENTLY REQUIRED !!! Job_Title: Maintenance Engineer (Can work for night shift)
Job_Description: Job Description: Performing preventive maintenance at the factory. Recommending preventive and curative scheduled maintenance to ensure optimum operation and a minimum of downtime. Referring preventive maintenance programs during day–to–day operations as necessary. Providing documentation relating to all functions performed by completing forms, reports, records. Troubleshooting equipment and machines. Summarizing daily, weekly, and monthly reports for the Manager. Cooperate with production and planning department to achieve overall project. Developing and searching opportunities to improve production performance. Monitor and control the Preventive and Corrective Maintenance activities to achieve the company objectives. Provide and develop the effective preventive maintenance plan to match with the production schedules Support to install and commissioning the new machines and equipment into the factory Leader and support to improve the plant OEE to achieve the KPIs target in term of Availability rate . Leader and support to reduce the cost of maintenance such as repairing cost , optimize the spare parts stock level, Kaizen maintenance and energy saving Improve MTBF and MTTR for all machinery and equipment. Lead to implement the TPM activities in plant to support the AMS strategic plan Manage, coach and mentor to Technicians to achieve of their development skill planning . Cultivate and improve the 5S, Safety & environment and Kaizen culture to the team. Set up the cutting or shaping tools or dies needed in machines or presses for precision work Test run machines, make adjustments as required, advise or instruct operators and watch the first operations. Periodically check product sizes and report and problems or readjust machines using precision measuring instruments to check accuracy of work. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree is required in Mechanical Engineering or a related field Strong knowledge in TPM & PM (especially in Preventive and Autonomous Maintenance) Mechanical, OEE, Kaizen, Energy saving, analytical, problem solving skill and service mind Requires setup experience in relation to fabrication; stamping, bending, press manufacturing at least 5 years of experience Requires good hand-eye coordination Requires patient, quality conscious work ethic regarding detail of work. Requires technical background experience and training. Ability to use machine tools and precision measuring equipment required to perform set up procedures. Proactive, focus on results oriented and good attitude of works Leader ship to provide training to technicians to upgrade on technician skill. Knows Predictive Maintenance Some Evidence on problem solving skill.

Responsibilities: New model implementation – Pursuing component and process approval for all aspects of new model process. Implementing procedures: Interpreting Design change request and reviewing drawings before planning and overseeing implementation. Developing and implementing robust processes which achieve the company’s top level targets for Safety, Quality and Volume. Investigating concerns in production with current processes and equipment and implementing robust solutions to ensure quality and efficiency objectives are maintained. Evaluating and selecting manufacturing equipment to fulfill the company’s goals and improve existing processes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical, Industrial Engineering or related fields. At least 2- 3 years’ experience in Paint Processes, Project management & Engineering skills. New graduated is welcome. Experience with electrostatic painting. Experience in new factory start up or factory or complicated process implementation. Ability to use CAD. Very good English communication skills. High level of competency in project management Able to operate computer: Microsoft Office (Words, Excel and Outlook). Working day: Monday – Friday 08.00 – 17.00 The company will provide very good salary and fringe benefits to the right candidate. If you would like to join a dynamic British company that is firmly established in Thailand, please send your application to:- Human Resources Department Triumph Motorcycles (Thailand) Ltd. Amata City Chonburi Industrial Estate, 700/801, Moo 1, Tambol Panthong, Amphur Panthong, Chonburi 20160 Tel: 038-469800 ext. 5446
