Able to read 2D,3D CAD and solid work. Have strong knowledge of ECN (Engineering Change Notice) Advance conversation middle level in English Languages skills English : Conversational Japanese : None Workplace Area: Pinthong Industrial Estate Working Hour : 8:00-17:00 (Mon-Fri) About the Benefit Salary: 25,000–30,000THB Social Insurance Uniform IPD/OPD About the allowance Gasoline fee About the company Business Type: Manufacturing Products: Electronics Manufacturing Service (EMS) HOW TO APPLY *** Please submit your resume with recent photo, your current & expected salary, and reference: Processing Engineer (25K – 30K) (SDG-101886) *** Any query regarding this Job or application method, please call Tel. 033-154-333 4/222 Harbor Office Building, 5th Floor, Unit 5A04, Moo.10 Sukhumvit Road, Tungsukla, Siracha, Chonburi 20230   (ใบอนุญาตเลขที่ น.ชบ 03/2561) Website: www.rgf-hragent.asia [link removed] and find us on Facebook: RGF Thailand [link removed]

Company Overview: Our client is a leading energy storage company known for its flow batteries, designed for various applications, including renewable energy storage, telecommunications, and industrial use. This job required a skilled and experienced Maintenance Manager to lead our maintenance team and ensure the continuous and efficient operation of our manufacturing equipment. Location: WHA Chonburi Industrial Estate 1, Bowin Job Description: Equipment Maintenance: Oversee the maintenance of all machinery and equipment in the manufacturing facility. Ensure preventive maintenance schedules are adhered to, minimizing downtime and maximizing operational efficiency. Troubleshoot and repair complex machinery, with a particular focus on PLC and Hydraulic Press systems . Technical Expertise: Possess in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with PLC and Hydraulic Press systems . Familiarity with pneumatic and sensor technologies; preference given to those with expertise in these areas. Injection molding knowledge and experience is a strong advantage. Familiarity with Hydraulic Press 200-300 Ton or above is preferred . Root Cause Analysis: Proactively identify and address the root causes of equipment failures to prevent recurring issues. Implement strategies to improve Mean Time to Detect (MTTD) and Mean Time to Fix (MTTF) metrics. Communication Skills: Effectively communicate with team members and other departments in English. Provide clear and concise reports on maintenance activities and equipment status. Team Leadership: Lead and manage the maintenance team, providing guidance and support. Foster a culture of safety, collaboration, and continuous improvement within the maintenance department. Problem-Solving: Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve issues promptly. Implement and manage maintenance solutions to enhance overall equipment reliability. Benefits: 5-day work; Mon - Fri Provident Fund Health Insurance Bonus House Allowance (1,000 Baht / Month) Funeral Allowance Marriage Allowance

Responsibility - Daily monitoring and optimization of plant utility parameters to improve process efficiency / productivity. - Prepare plant performance reports/equipment trouble shooting & failure analysis, debottleneck studies & HAZOP studies. - Preparation of management of plant change documents for modification activities, review basic and details engineering documents. - Perform other related duties as assigned. Qualifications - Bachelor's degree in chemical engineering or equivalent experiences -  Minimum 5 years of experience in process engineering in Petrochemical plants & Utilities i.e. Boiler, Water & Wastewater treatment plant -  Good knowledge of fundamentals in chemical engineering especially unit operations, software simulation i.e. Aspen/Hysys and engineering design - Good communication skills in English -  Hand on experience with MS offices and knowledge in SAP is advantage. Interested applicants may send their application strictly in English with full resume of work experience, educational background, salary expected, recent photograph and contact details to

Job_Title: Facility Management Supervisor (Retail Industry)/หัวหน้าวิศวกรรมอาคาร
Company: CP Future City Development Corporation Ltd.
Job_Description: Responsibilities : สามารถเป็นหัวหน้าทีมในกะ เพื่อดูแล การปฎิบัติการของระบบอาคาร (Operations)  การบำรุงรักษาเชิงป้องกัน (Preventive Maintenances) และการแก้ไขซ่อมแซม (Corrective Maintenances) รวมทั้งควบคุมดูแลผู้รับเหมาในงานซ่อมแซมและบำรุงรักษาได้ มีความเข้าใจในเรื่องความปลอดภัยและมาตรฐานการทำงาน รวมทั้งสามารถตรวจสอบการทำงานของเครื่องจักรได้ สามารถจัดทำรายงานต่างๆ เช่น การจดมิเตอร์ การเก็บข้อมูลเครื่องจักรต่างๆ ได้ สามารถดูแลงานเตรียมพื้นที่และตกแต่งร้านค้า (Tenant Alteration) และงานเตรียมพื้นที่เพื่อจัดกิจกรรมส่งเสริมการตลาดได้ สามารถดูแลรักษาอุปกรณ์ต่างๆ และการจัดเก็บอุปกรณ์รวมทั้งอะไหล่ในห้องสโตร์ได้ Qualifications : การศึกษาระดับ ปวช หรือสูงขึ้นไป ในสายงานช่างด้านต่างๆ ประสบการณ์ทำงานช่างอาคารอย่างน้อย 12 ปี มีทัศนคติที่ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นกะได้ มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดี หากสามารถใช้งานโปรแกรม AutoCAD ได้ จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สถานที่ทำงาน เดินทางสะดวกใกล้ BTS ปุณณวิถี *** All positions requited strong creativity, human relation and team working spirit. *** Prior experience in Real Estate or Retail business will be an advantage. The company offers successful candidate vary competitive remuneration and opportunity for growth. Please send your full English with a recent photo and expected salary: CP Future City Development Corporation (CPFC) (Applications will be held in strict confidence.) Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

Job_Title: วิศวกรไฟฟ้า
Job_Description: Siam Flour Trading Co., Ltd สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: อ.พระประแดง จ.สมุทรปราการ รายละเอียดงาน ปฏิบัติงานด้านวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้าในโรงงานให้เป็นไปตามแผนที่กำหนด พัฒนา และปรับปรุงระบบวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้าในโรงงานให้สามารถทำงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ปลอดภัย และเพียงพอต่อความต้องการ กำหนดวิธีการและขั้นตอนการปฏิบัติงานของฝ่ายวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า ประสานงานผู้ให้บริการภายนอกในการออกแบบและปรับปรุงระบบไฟฟ้าร่วมกับฝ่ายวิศวกรรมและซ่อมบำรุง ควบคุมการติดตั้ง ปรับปรุง ซ่อมแซม ระบบไฟฟ้าของผู้ให้บริการจากภายนอก ทดสอบการทำงานของระบบไฟฟ้าภายหลังการติดตั้ง ปรับปรุง แก้ไข จัดทำเอกสารรายงานเกี่ยวกับงานวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร การศึกษา สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ไฟฟ้า มีประสบการณ์ในด้านวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า 3 ปี ขึ้นไป หากมีประสบการณ์บริหารทีมงานอย่างน้อย 3 ปี จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ได้ มีประสบการณ์สายงานเครื่องจักรอุตสาหกรรม จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

RESPONSIBILITIES Oversee the comprehensive design and development of plant equipment, and specialized tools. Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including production members, mechanical engineers, and/or architects to ensure cohesive and innovative product solutions. Utilize your deep understanding of FEA simulation skills to create designs that meet technical requirements and industry standards. Conduct feasibility studies and risk assessments to validate design concepts and iterate as necessary. Perform structural, thermal, and other relevant analyses using engineering software to ensure product reliability and performance. Create and maintain detailed design documentation, including drawings, specifications, and reports. Ensure products comply with relevant industry standards and regulations. Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and design trends in the field. Mentor and guide junior engineers, providing technical expertise, feedback, and fostering a culture of continuous learning. QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering. 3+ years of experience in product design engineering, with a strong portfolio demonstrating successful product launches and innovative design solutions. Excellent in Solidworks Simulation, Solidworks modeling and drawing, AutoCAD, and other design-related technologies. Solid understanding of FEA Analysis , including Structure Analysis and others. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively and analytically. Strong communication skills in English. Interested candidates please send your update resume, current and expected salary with contact details to: ManpowerGroup Thailand - Eastern Seaboard Branch 44/59 Room no.302 Moo 11, T.Nong-prue, A.Banglamung Chonburi 20150 Contact Khun Nisarat Kusumayuth (Recruitment Consultant) Telephone no. 081 104 8841 Nisarat.k @manpower.co.th Manpower Recruitment License No.Chobor.03/2554 Ref: BH44985

Responsibilities: Determine cost estimate targets during the pitching stage process and be able to recommend cost effective solutions. Gather information by liaising with stakeholders in order to convert building specifications to cost estimates. Utilize cost methodologies and tools to prepare and maintain reliable and accurate data. Pre-qualify the contractor with the recommendation. Prepare bill of quantity template (BOQ) for prepare cost estimation including direct and indirect cost with estimation condition. Develop the tender documents. Coordinate the meeting, conduct the meeting, and write the minutes of meetings. Prepare cost comparison with the analysis and negotiation. Investigate and identify cost reduction opportunities through cost analysis review. Conduct cost review and make VE cost proposal. Prepare the presentation slide to seek management for CAPEX approval. Assist for construction contract execution including preparing the scope of work, bill of quantities and other related document to the project. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical / Mechanical Engineering. Minimum 5 years proven experience in QS, cost estimation and procurement. Good communication skills with the ability to form and maintain good relationships internally and externally. Strong interpersonal, negation & presentation skills. Good communication in English language. Good Microsoft skills. Strong technical mindset and able to read and interpret data and drawing to cost estimation. Knowledge of estimating and procurement techniques. Results orientated and organized with the ability to deliver against deadlines. Strong attention to detail and accuracy skills. Good presentation skills. Proactive and adaptable.

Analog Devices (NASDAQ: ADI) designs and manufactures semiconductor products and solutions. We enable our customers to interpret the world around us by intelligently bridging the physical and digital worlds with unmatched technologies that sense, measure and connect. Analog Device's Failure Analysis team in Chonburi Thailand is looking for Failure Analysis Engineers. Job Description Responsibilities and Duties include but not limited to: Analyze root cause of RMA returns Investigate new product Failures Determine cause of yield excursions Meet ADI's failure analysis cycle time and quality commitments Develop new techniques for analyzingfailures Work with Design, Application, Process, Product and Package engineering teams to identify the failure root cause and propose corrective actions Take ownership of a piece of failure analysis equipment; train new users and keep it running Minimum Qualifications: Electronics/Mechatronics/Electrical Engineering degree with semiconductor emphasis. Masters degree is a plus. Strong knowledge in circuit analysis and in data analysis. Strong technical understanding of how a diode and transistor work Strong technical understanding of Analog and Mixed signal circuit analysis and layout Strong working knowledge of several lab equipment ( Oscilloscopes, function generators, Source meter, power supplies, DMMs etc.) to perform IC characterization at bench level. Capable of interpreting datasheet specifications and translating these into working bench setups.Good English oral and written communication skills Good troubleshooting skills Fab and/or assembly process experience a plus Chemistry lab experience is a plus Has a sense of continuous improvement by identifying and working on gaps from existing processes to achieve goals.

“Lead all the Plant Operations” to provide world-class product, manufacturing solutions and service support to customers.  Develop and drive strategy for continuous improvement of the Plant performance to ensure satisfaction of customers, shareholder, employee and external community.  “supply chain to me is confusing as we also have strategic supply elsewhere. Provide leadership and direction to plant continuous improvement process to ensure total conformance to customers’ requirements Collaborate with regional Sales and Marketing, Supply Chain and Engineering leaders in demand planning, customer engagement, product strategy and cost reduction. Develop manufacturing solution to support Launch for New Products in growth funnels. Maintain highest standard of Environmental, Health and Safety in the Plant. Develop and retain the necessary skilled talents to sustain long term profitable growth. Foster an environment that all employee in the site embrace and pursue the company’s core value, purpose and mission that enable the success of company and employee. Responsible for safety and environmental Strong Background to Manage in manufacturing , Engineering/NPI (R&D) , Supply chain , Purchase , warehouse shipping, QA, Maintenance &Facility, Finance, HR, Material sourcing. Good track record of performance with solid achievement to the organization Strong leadership experience and interpersonal skills Ambitious, hands-on, hard-working and strong problem-solving capability and stand for adversity. Ready to accept new challenge outside personal comfort zone Work around the clock with the global team in critical projects is required Work in weekend for emergency issue Regional Travel for supplier & customer visit  %MCEPASTEBIN%

Job_Title: Painting Process Engineer/วิศวกรกระบวนการพ่นสี

Job_Description: Job description : 1. Participated in product synchronization engineering analysis (SE), process adaptability analysis, and technical plans of product launching; 2. Responsible for the design of painting production line workstations, completing the design of workstation equipment, workstation layout, and other related content in the painting workshop, and promoting lean optimization of each process section. 3. Analyze and solve process and quality issues during the coating production process, completing problem analysis, and plan development & verification. 4. Participated in the experimental certification and application of body accessories in the painting workshop. Job requirements: 1. At least 5 years experience in painting process. 2. Have experience in automotive industrial. 3. Good communication skills in English and Thai, and being able to communicate in Chinese daily is a plus. 4. Be familiar with the IATF 16949 quality system, proficient in using APQP/PPAP/FMEA/SPC/MSA. 5. Bachelor's degree or above 6. Be proficient in softwires such as MS Office, CAD, CATIA, etc.

Job Purpose This role is to lead CAB project of Asia Pet Centre and innovation CAB projects in Pakchong and Chonburi plants, which included future Asia Pilot Plant and Regional Lab in Chonburi. Additionally, this capital investment would help build integrated R&D capability to support Asia growth, leveraging synergies of the Development team, AICE, Wet GIC and the Global Deployment team. The key activities of Asia R&D hub is to support Regional projects of new product (Dry/C&T/Wet), raw material development, product performance program, sustainability program as well as global deployment. Responsibilities Lead Overall Project management of CAB Project. Role Model the 5Ps as a Leader on the Project, with a clear focus on the impact to the product and the consumer. Champion for R&D and work collaboratively with all project team members to achieve the best final outcomes. Responsible for deliverables in different phases Collect all requirements from key stakeholders including PPG members, Global R&D, Global Lab team, and Global Engineering, and Write the R&D General Brief to capture the project scope and frame the requirements for R&D. Incorporate requirements from related functions into the design. Ensure R&D teams provide necessary inputs on design requirements, and facilitate risk assessment procedures. Escalate issues in the design to the PCG that may result in project impacts. Design includes building layout, equipment selection, process flow, control systems (including SAP, MOM, PCS (Mars and OEM), product design, and operator procedures. Accountable for the Completion of the Process Specifications, and responsible for bringing these documents to the PCG and managing the approval process Lead Value Engineering Session with engineering Provide inputs to MPAR preparation and facilitate MPAR approval process with IE. Execution for detailed design with support from engineering Facilitate stakeholder review of detailed design ▪ Be on site to support construction engineer during construction phase Own specification of equipment and purchasing of process related equipment including FAT plan at OEM or other Mars site Management of work streams to ensure accurate distribution of responsibilities within the team Escalation of issues to PCG as they arise. Manage overall requirements for Validation including timeline, resources, and raw/pack materials Management of Validation planning Mitigation of Issues related to Product Quality and adherence to Process Specification. Accountable for ensuring the process, packaging and product validation reports are completed On top of Pet Center Project Leader, this individual will hold responsibility of Process Development role to lead and execute the R&D process development/ deployment to support Asia business growth. Qualifications 10 years' working experience in R&D At least 3 years experiences in a Business CAB Project environment as key technical contributor on behalf of R&D Project manager experience is beneficial Multi-year experience in Process technology development An equivalent technical application (such as technology deployment) and/or similar in Engineering Development will be beneficial A sound understanding of Petcare manufacturing technologies and Petcare Global Equipment Standards in technology fields (process food technology) will be preferred

Job Overview: As the QC Assistance Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the high standard of ISO Tanks cleaning and repair services provided by the company. You will be responsible for assisting the Quality Manager in implementing and maintaining quality control processes, procedures, and standards to meet regulatory requirements and uphold the company's commitment to environmental friendliness and high technology. *Urgently* Working hours: Monday - Friday (08.00 - 17.00) Knowledge of ISO Tank Key Responsibilities: Overseeing and implementing quality control measures throughout the ISO Tanks cleaning and repair processes. Conduct regular inspections and audits to ensure compliance with established quality standards and procedures. Collaborate with different departments to address and rectify any quality-related issues promptly. Ensure adherence to environmental regulations and standards in all aspects of the cleaning and repair operations. Provide training and guidance to staff regarding quality control processes and environmental best practices. Collect, analyze, and interpret quality-related data to identify trends and areas for improvement. Documentation and Record Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of quality control activities, inspections, and compliance documentation. Job_Title: Environmental, Occupational Health and Safety Manager
Job_Description: Principle Accountabilities: Manage EHS activities to ensure compliance with external EHS regulations, standards, internal environmental policies, and management systems in ISO14001 and ISO45001 for EHSMR. Lead, direct, and evaluate a team of EHS professionals to ensure EHS strategy is implemented effectively within established budgets which complies with all relevant regulations, law, and standards. Investigate EHS incidents; prepare reports and recommendations; overall EHS performance to identify recurring problems; research, evaluate, and recommend changes to technology, equipment; systems, or processes that will improve the EHS responsibilities. Liaise and coordinate with contractors to ensure appropriate safety plans are in place and being adhered to. Reduce Total case incident rate (TCIR), Lost workday case rate (LWCIR), Lost workday Incident rate (LWDIR) to meet the cooperate ’s objective. Undertake risk management and hazard reduction procedures to anticipate and prevent site safety problems. Conduct regular safety audits on site and produce the monthly safety report. Liaise with relevant government authorities regarding site safety and environment as required such as Head of Safety Section, Environment Manager follow law. Ensure awareness of all site workers and contractors of safety standards, including but not limited to, running toolbox talks regarding safety. Management for wastewater treatment system and recycle water to supply manufacturing. Qualifications : Bachelor / Master’s in safety, Occupational Health from accredit university or Environment with get Professional Safety Officer License by Thai law. 8 years’ experience in Safety & EHS Management. At least 5 years’ experience in a management role in manufacturing environment. Professional in English communication skills (writing & speaking). Knowledge and management in Wastewater Treatment System and Engineering skill. Knowledge and management in 5S, ISO14001 and ISO45001 management system.

Job Responsibilities: Communicate ESG risk management and strategy initiatives to internal and external stakeholders. Prepare reports and presentations for the Board of Directors, management teams, and external parties as required. Stay informed on global sustainability trends and regulatory changes to ensure compliance and strategic alignment. 1. ESG Risk Assessment and Integration Integrate ESG-related risks into the enterprise risk management system, ensuring comprehensive risk assessment and mitigation strategies. Identify and analyze emerging ESG risks, advising on potential impacts and response strategies. Develop and oversee the governance of new and emerging non-HSEC (Health, Safety, Environment, and Community) issues, such as human rights. 2. Strategic Analysis and Development Conduct gap analyses against ESG raters’ requirements and industry peers to identify areas for improvement and strategic opportunities. Collaborate with various functions to develop a cohesive ESG strategy that aligns with the organization's overall objectives. Govern the setting of long-term targets for material ESG topics, ensuring they are ambitious, measurable, and aligned with industry best practices. 3. Supplier Lifecycle Management Embed ESG factors into the supplier selection process, performance reviews, and ongoing monitoring procedures. Conduct thorough ESG risk assessments for tier-1 suppliers, ensuring alignment with the company’s sustainability standards and objectives. Develop and refine criteria for supplier engagement and evaluation, focusing on sustainability performance and risk mitigation. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in engineering, Environmental Science, Business Administration, Risk Management, or a related field. Advanced degree or professional certification in sustainability, risk management, or a related field. Strong understanding of global sustainability trends, standards, and reporting frameworks. A minimum of 5 years of experience in sustainability, ESG risk management, or a related field, preferably in the electric utilities, metals & mining, or oil & gas industries. Experience in working with international sustainability standards and frameworks such as GRI, SASB, TCFD, IFRS etc. Proven experience in integrating ESG practices into business strategies and supply chain management. Experience in leading cross-functional teams and projects. Excellent analytical, strategic thinking, and communication skills. Excellent command of English (TOEIC 750+)

At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 74,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars. Could you be the full-time Project Engineering Manager in Bangkok we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll lead, manage and control all engineering-related activities in the project to deliver on requirements, budget and schedule. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business support project manager/director in all technical aspects in the project including incoming bids and much more. You’ll specifically be technical representative to the project core team, supplier, customer and any external party We’ll look to you for: Technical support and discussion duties to the Project Core Team Technical design and review engineering-related works of the project External discussion duties to the Project Core Team Resource, budget and schedule control and reporting Ensure the engineering deliverables are on-time and in alignment with the product team in term of plan and solution All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Degree in Engineer, Electrical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Industrial Engineering or related field Minimum 5 years of experience in Project management, requirement management level System interface and project delivery experience Knowledge of signalling system Basic MS Office tools, plus Project Management Tools Good communication skills in English Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues Contribute to innovative projects Utilise our hybrid working environment Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

Job_Description: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Management Manage the effective achievement of HSSE department objectives through leadership of the HSSE department. The goal is to maximize the performance of both subordinates and the HSSE department. This involves encouraging the reporting and investigation of HSSE issues in an open manner, with the aim of achieving the best performance for the organization. Manage and monitor department budget and actual expenses. HSSE Operations Develop an operational HSSE Management System in order to ensure that all company and contractor staff implement Key Processes and Procedures and standard operating procedures in line with the management system Ensure Safe System Of Work (SSOW) is implemented and maintained Develop and execute an Emergency Response Plans (ERPs) in line with best practice and international standards Develop an HSSE internal and external audit plan for each division in order to ensure that corporate HSSE standards, KPPs and SOPs are implemented and recommendations reviewed to pursue policies of continuous improvement Occupational Health and Safety Management Ensure advanced Safety/Risk Management measures and precautions are implemented within the organization in accord with internal safety standards Ensure compliance with all local and international regulations and legislation Advise management on any aspect of a safety and occupational health/risk management program Formulate and provide recommendations to management on hazard control and abatement Recommend to management safety program changes and modifications to existing safety and occupational health programs Conduct surveillance of employees both company and contractors through regular health checks to ensure compliance with all health regulations Risk Management Assess the risks associated with implementation of HSSE policies and procedures and recommend corrective action to mitigate the risks in line with best practice and local regulations Key Performance Indicators HSSE risks have been assessed and risk mitigation measures are in place Up to date company risks and opportunities register Effective risk controls resulting from the audits Environment Management Direct the development and maintenance of Environment standards, processes and practices across the sites in line with local regulations, company sustainability policy and recognized international standards Ensure all Environment Impact Assessment (EIA) for company activities are approved by Government agencies before starting the activities Develop environmental reports as per local regulations, ISO14001 requirements Identify significant environmental aspects and implement best practices to minimize impacts Security Direct the assurance of safety and security of people, assets, property and information at all times in order to protect the company's interests and peoples lives and ensure continuity of business Business Continuity Management Provide overall strategic direction. Assess, invoke, and escalate the responses to disruptive event(s) based on predefined criteria. Direct the BC responses during the disruptive event(s) Manage the recovery efforts of the Country Response Team (CRT), Communications Support Team, IT DR Team and the BC Recovery Teams. Adjudicate competing demands for recovering priorities. Direct and authorize internal and external communications. Decide the stand down and return to normal business; and Initiate post-incident review and communicate key lessons learned Asset Integrity Develop and implement Al assurance plan to ensure related process, practices and procedures are implemented across all assets following AIM standard Verify Al assessment of all company facilities to demonstrate fit for service. QUALIFICATIONS: Knowledge & Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Engineering / Science or Occupational Health and Safety or an equivalent qualification. Skills: Interpersonal skills, good communication and presentation skills, Technical writing skills, Advanced computer skills, instructional skills, Negotiation skills, Management skills including planning and organization Ability to conduct accident and fire investigations Strong proficiency in Thai and English both in Speaking and Writing. Job_Description: วางแผนงานดูแลงานซ่อมบํารุง จัดแผนพัฒนาบุคคลกร ขยายจุดให้บริการตามเป้าหมายองค์กร ควบคุมงบการใช้จ่ายในแผนก ประสานงานแต่ละแผนก วางแผนซ่อมบํารุงเครื่องมือเครื่องจักร คุณสมบัติ ระดับการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี - ปริญญาเอก ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 5 ปีขึ้นไป คุณสมบัติด้านความรู้และความสามารถ จบ วิศวะเครื่องกล หรือ อุตสาหการ ป.ตรี(ไม่จำกัดสถาบัน) มีความรู้อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ในระดับกลาง สามารถเข้าใจวงจร controller ต่างๆ เคยทำงานโรงงาน หรือบริษัทที่มีงานต้องซ่อมบำรุง มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5 ปี เคยทำงานเป็น ผู้จัดการแผนก ผ่านงานคุมช่าง, โฟรแมน ทำรายงานนำเสนอผู้บริหารได้ เดินทางต่างจังหวัดได้ มีทักษะด้านภาษาอังกฤษในระดับกลาง-ดี

Job Description: จัดทำรายละเอียดงานและประมาณราคางาน งานโครงสร้าง งานปรับปรุง งานซ่อมแซม งานเพิ่ม-ลด จัดทำ BOQ, Shop Drawing, As-built Drawing, Material Approve, Cost Control วางแผน กำหนดมาตรฐาน กำกับดูแล และประเมินผลการจ้างบริษัทภายนอก (Outsource) ที่ให้บริการงานควบคุม งานก่อสร้างปรับปรุง ในโครงการก่อสร้าง และการปรับปรุงอาคาร ในเชิงประสิทธิภาพ ต้นทุน คุณภาพ และความพร้อมใช้งาน ควบคุมงานโครงการก่อสร้างและปรับปรุงอาคาร รวมทั้งงานระบบสาธารณูปโภค ระบบโทรศัพท์และงานติดตั้งเครื่องอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ให้เป็นไปตามแผนธุรกิจที่กำหนดไว้ วิเคราะห์และประเมินราคาที่บริษัทภายนอก (Outsource) จัดทำมา เพื่อให้มีความเหมาะสมและ อยู่ภายใต้งบประมาณที่กำหนด ตรวจสอบราคาวัสดุ, รายละเอียดและข้อกำหนดของวัสดุ จัดทำเอกสารรายงาน Weekly, Monthly Report, ตรวจ Payment ของผู้รับเหมา Qualification: ปริญญาตรีหรือโท ด้านวิศวกรรมศาสตร์โยธา การบริหารการก่อสร้าง หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง และมีใบประกอบวิชาชีพด้านวิศวกรรม มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 1 ปี ด้านอาคารและระบบสาธารณูปโภค หรือส่วนอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความสามารถและหรือมีประสบการณ์ออกแบบและตรวจแบบปรับปรุงก่อสร้าง มีความสามารถและหรือมีประสบการณ์ถอดราคา (ตรวจสอบราคา) ค่าปรับปรุงตกแต่งได้ มีทักษะประสบการณ์ทั้งภาคสนาม และมีความรู้ทฤษฎีเกี่ยวกับงานก่อสร้าง สามารถทำ Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint และ Auto CAD ได้เป็นอย่างดี เพื่อใช้ในการจัดทำข้อมูลของทีม และนำเสนอต่อผู้บริหาร มีทักษะในการสื่อสารและมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องได้ดี มีความชอบในการปฏิบัติงานภาคสนาม (สามารถทำงานต่างจังหวัดได้) มีทักษะรอบรู้ในการแก้ไขปัญหา อุปสรรค ด้วยเหตุผล สามารถทนแรงกดดันของสภาพงานได้ มีวิสัยทัศน์รอบรู้ มองการไกล และคาดการณ์ถึงผลสำเร็จ หรือผลเสียที่อาจเกิดขึ้น มีความรอบรู้ก้าวทันวิชาการและเทคนิคการก่อสร้างอยู่เสมอ

Project Engineer 1 position ' QA/QC Manager 1 position รายละเอียดงาน Overview: As a Project/Production Engineer, you will play a critical role in planning, executing, and managing engineering projects and production processes within the organization. Your responsibilities will include coordinating project activities, ensuring efficient production operations, monitoring project timelines and budgets, and maintaining quality standards. This position requires strong technical skills, project management expertise, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Responsibilities: 1.Project Planning and Execution: •Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project scope, objectives, and deliverables. •Develop project plans, including timelines, budgets, resource allocation, and risk assessment. •Coordinate project activities, ensuring adherence to project milestones and deadlines. •Conduct regular project meetings to review progress, resolve issues, and communicate updates. •Monitor project costs and take appropriate measures to stay within budget. 2.Production Process Management: •Develop and optimize production processes to maximize efficiency, productivity, and quality. •Conduct time and motion studies to identify opportunities for process improvement. •Collaborate with production teams to implement best practices and standard operating procedures. •Monitor production performance, analyze data, and implement corrective actions as needed. •Ensure compliance with safety regulations and quality standards. 3.Technical Support and Troubleshooting: •Provide technical expertise and support to production teams during the manufacturing process. •Troubleshoot equipment or process issues, identify root causes, and implement solutions. •Collaborate with maintenance and engineering teams to ensure equipment reliability and uptime. •Continuously evaluate and recommend equipment upgrades or replacements for improved efficiency and productivity. 4.Quality Control: •Develop and implement quality control processes to ensure product conformance to specifications. •Conduct inspections and audits to monitor product quality and identify non-conformities. •Collaborate with quality assurance teams to implement corrective and preventive actions. •Implement and maintain quality management systems, such as ISO 9001, to ensure compliance. 5.Documentation and Reporting: •Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including technical specifications, drawings, and reports. •Prepare regular progress reports and present project updates to stakeholders. •Generate production reports, including key performance indicators and metrics. •Contribute to the development of engineering documentation and standard operating procedures. คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร Bachelor's degree in engineering (mechanical, industrial, or related field). Proven experience in project management and production process optimization. Strong technical knowledge and understanding of manufacturing processes. Proficiency in project management tools and software. Familiarity with quality management systems and standards (e.g., ISO 9001). Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment. Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Good Command of Spoken and Written English Newly graduated are also welcome QA/QC Manager Job Description Requirements: Proven experience in quality control for pressure vessels, heat exchangers, and static parts. In-depth knowledge and familiarity with ISO 9001, ACME, BS/EN, CWB standards, and other relevant industry regulations. Strong leadership and management skills, with the ability to effectively lead a team and drive quality initiatives. Attention to detail and exceptional problem-solving abilities. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and effectively communicate quality requirements. Proficiency in using quality management software and tools. Bachelor's degree in engineering, quality management, or a related field (preferred). Quality management certifications (e.g., Six Sigma, ASQ) are a plus. As a QA/QC Manager, your expertise in quality control for pressure vessels, heat exchangers, and static parts, coupled with your knowledge of ISO 9001, ACME, BS/EN, and CWB standards, will be invaluable in ensuring compliance and maintaining high-quality standards. By implementing effective quality control and assurance processes, you will contribute to the success and reputation of the organization, ensuring customer satisfaction and driving continuous improvement in product quality and processes. Quality Assurance:Develop and implement quality assurance policies and procedures to ensure product reliability and customer satisfaction.Establish and maintain quality documentation, including quality manuals, standard operating procedures, and work instructions.Conduct internal audits and assessments to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.Coordinate external audits and certifications, ensuring compliance with customer requirements and industry regulations.Provide training and support to employees on quality standards and best practices.3. Supplier Quality Management:Collaborate with procurement and supplier management teams to establish and maintain supplier quality requirements.Conduct supplier audits and evaluations to assess compliance with quality standards and specifications.Monitor and address supplier performance issues and implement appropriate corrective actions.Collaborate with suppliers to resolve quality-related concerns and improve overall supplier quality.4. Continuous Improvement:Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance product quality, process efficiency, and customer satisfaction.Utilize quality tools and methodologies, such as root cause analysis and statistical process control, to identify and address quality issues.Facilitate cross-functional teams to implement corrective and preventive actions. Job_Description: คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี สาขาอุตสาหการ , เครื่องกล , แมคคาทรอนิคส์ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ ด้านการออกแบบ /เขียนแบบ 2 ปี ขึ้นไป (เงินเดือนตามตกลง หรือ ขึ้นอยู่กับประสบการณ์) สามารถใช้โปรแกรมเขียนแบบ 3มิติ ได้ดี มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ Pneumatic , Sensor , PLC จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ++ สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาได้ สามารถออกทำงานนอกพื้นที่ได้ สวัสดิการของบริษัท โบนัสและปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ และท่องเที่ยวประจำปี ค่าล่วงเวลา , เงินตอบแทนพิเศษ , ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม สวัสดิการประกันสังคม วันลาตามกฎหมาย , วันลาพักร้อน โครงการคนละครึ่ง : ซื้ออุปกรณ์เพื่อการทำงานคนละครึ่งกับบริษัท ครบเงื่อนไข เป็นกรรมสิทธิ์ของพนักงาน 100% ทุกตำแหน่งเน้นทำงานเป็นทีม มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี และสามารถยอมรับการทำงานแนวใหม่ๆ ติดต่อสอบถามและส่งประวัติแนะนำตัว ( Resume ) และผลงาน (ถ้ามี) พร้อมรูปถ่ายปัจจุบันไม่เกิน 6 เดือน บริษัท เอเอ ออโตเมชั่น ซิสเต็ม จำกัด เลขที่ 184 หมู่ 4 บ้านหนองมูล ซอย 4 ตำบลประตูป่า อำเภอเมือง จังหวัดลำพูน 51000 มือถือ 081-8845794 ,080 -4998709

Job_Title: Site Manager/ผู้บริหารโครงการ
Job_Description: ดูแลภาพรวมทุกด้านของโครงการตั้งแต่การวางแผนจนถึงงานทั้งหมดจนแล้วเสร็จ จัดสรรทรัพยากรสำหรับโครงการที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ดูแลบุคลากรและผู้รับเหมาช่วงในสถานที่และให้คำปรึกษาอบรมความรู้ (Engineer, Foreman, Operator) เจรจาต่อรอง การเบิกจ่ายงวดงาน บริหารต้นทุนโครงการ ค่าใช้จ่ายโครงการ ซื้อของ ผู้รับเหมา เพื่อการจัดซื้อจัดจ้างที่เหมาะสม รักษามาตรฐานการทำงานและให้เป็นไปตามแผนและข้อกำหนดของโครงการ บริหารจัดการเวลา ทีมงานให้เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพและประสิทธิผล ติดตาม รายงานความคืบหน้าของโครงการ และสั่งซื้ออุปกรณ์ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับงาน งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมเครื่องกล วิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า หรือในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง งานก่อสร้าง งานระบบ งานด้านภาคสนามในโครงการ อย่างน้อย 7 ปี มีความรู้เรื่องระบบปรับอากาศ HVAC System มีภาวะการเป็นผู้นำสูง มีความรับผิดชอบ ทำงานได้หลากหลาย และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ มีทักษะในการแก้ปัญหา เจรจาต่อรอง สามารถเดินทางไปทำงานต่างจังหวัดได้ สามารถพูดและเขียนภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี

Product Engineer- Thailand Make Your Mark. Shape Your Future. It takes great people to achieve greatness. People with a sense of purpose and integrity. People with a relentless pursuit of excellence. People who care about making things better For Those Who Make The World™. Sound like you? Join our top-notch team of nearly 60,000 professionals globally who are making their mark on some of the world’s most beloved brands, including DEWALT®, CRAFTSMAN®, CUB CADET®, STANLEY® and BLACK+DECKER® What You’ll Do As a R&D Engineer , you’ll be part of our HTAS Engineering team located in Bang Pakong , Chachoengsao, Thailand . You’ll get to: Works with global team for NPD, Productivity and Quality issue. Works with vendor for making sure all the NPD, VAVE quality issue could process smoothly. CAD modeling skills needed, such like 2D/3D creating, engineering layout and documentation maintaining. Evaluate new and existing manufacturing processes for NPD and productivity project. Providing concise and accurate solution with vendor and global team during project development stage. Who You Are You always strive to do a good job…but wouldn’t it be great if you could do your job and do a world of good? You care about quality – at every level. You love to learn and grow and be acknowledged for your valuable contributions. You’re not intimidated by innovation. In fact, you embrace it. You also have: Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering. 2-3 year working experience in manufacturing Engineering or Product engineering. English language fluency, 70% spoken, +90% written or with TOEIC 700. Familiar with materials applications such as thermoplastics by injection mold, metals, heat treatment, metal casting, plating metal stamping. Ho w You’ll Feel We want our company to be a place you’ll want to be – and stay. Being part of our team means you’ll get to: Grow: Be part of our global company with 20+ brands to grow and develop your skills along multiple career paths. Learn: Have access to a wealth of learning resources, including our Lean Academy, Coursera® and online university. Belong: Experience an awesome place to work, where we have mutual respect and a great appreciation for diversity, equity and inclusion. Give Back: Help us continue to make positive changes locally and globally through volunteerism, giving back and sustainable business practices. What’s more, you’ll get that pride that comes from empowering makers, doers, protectors, and everyday heroes all over the world. We’re more than the #1 tools company. More than a driving force in outdoor power equipment. More than a global leader in industrial. We’re visionaries and innovators. As successful as we’ve been in the past, we have so much further to go. That’s where you come in. Join us!

Our client looking for potential who can fulfill their requirement as following: Position: Research Engineer Salary : 60,000 - 70,000 Baht / mth Location : Chonburi Job description: Responsible for all process of domestic/ oversea innovation research in terms of design product. Work closely with engineering and product management team to source idea for products / Electrical & Mechanical components. Conducts research/ benchmarking to identify new sources, evaluate current solutions, analysis and validate the appropriate idea/ innovation. Ensure that new design is in comply with commercial, legal, and valid patents. Close cooperate with patent office. Devise, implement and oversee engineering strategies to meet cost saving targets. Compare products specification on the product / parts level and price. Facilitates cross-functional work groups (especially with engineering) to benchmark competitors product using cost-based and design-based methods. Analyze technical data and specifications to determine the part needed for projects to complete according to specifications. Benchmarks best in class procurement and strategic sourcing practices, monitoring technical level of the similar products and key components. Conducting research to identify solutions for industry problems. Develop concepts for existing or new products, processes, or equipment relevant to laundry industry. Design relevant products, equipment’s or technology base on concepts and ensuring functionality. Building products and system prototypes for testing purpose Using statistical processes to assess data. Manage and lead team of the design or research team. Coordinate timelines, Resources, and tasks to achieve project goals – support project leader. Writing research and grant proposal. Qualification: Bachelor’s degree in any related field (Mechanical Engineering/ Electrical Engineer/ Mechatronics is preferable). Knowledge of Research system, metrology commercial in electronic industry. At least 2-5 years’ experience in research engineering and/or development. Ability to analyze products design, cost, technical documentation of the products to understand key requirements. Ability to observe, research and interpret concepts. Using analytical skills enables you to develop complex ideas, solutions, and improvements, which is a crucial responsibility of research engineers. Proficient computer skills, including Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook), 3D CAD is advantage. Good Command of English both spoken & written. Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by E-mail JAC Personnel Eastern Seaboard Recruitment Ltd. 4/222, 5th Floor, Harbor Mall, Moo 10, Sukhumvit Road, T. Job_Title: Unit Supervisor (equivalent to Boardman for a new Lactic acid plant)
Job_Description: The Unit Supervisor (equivalent to Shift Supervisor or Boardman for our New Lactic Acid Plant) is responsible for controlling and monitoring production processes including activities in the processes and process parameters via Distributed Control System (DCS) or at process areas to achieve output targets set i.e. safety, quality and costs. The Unit Supervisor reports directly to a Shift Manager of Operations team. Prime role and responsibilities shall include: Production Processes Control Control and monitor production process parameters via DCS or at process areas to ensure that all parameters are complied with regulations, SOP and Instructions. Analyze and provide solution against a problem occurred in responsible unit to prevent reoccurrence or impact to other processes. Supervise team member working in field relating to production activities to ensure that process parameters in responsible area are controlled. Record process data and operation parameters. Prepares shift report and communicate necessary information to next shift on duty in effectively manner. Productivity and production support activities Ensure responsible field area kept clean and dry in accordance with  required procedures and standards. Participate in production support activities such as Skill Block training & development program, TPM, etc. Qualifications and Justifications Diploma and above in Engineering discipline. Minimum 8 years' experience in controlling production process for petrochemical/chemical or oil & gas business. Experience in commissioning and start-up is preferred. Knowledge and solid skill of DCS for process. Good communicative English. Good skill of computer esp. MS Office programs. Possess functional competency set e.g. Drive for Result, Process Management, Safety Awareness, Problem Solving, Teamwork, Compliance and Communication. Our offer We offer competitive remuneration and benefits as well as an internal growth opportunity for talented performers. What makes Corbion special is how we consciously create that connection between the product of our work and our individual lives and use it to shape our choices and priorities as a company. We have a great company made up of talented, dedicated people who share a purpose and a vision. When we all understand how we intend to get there in the same way, there's no telling how far we can go. We offer you the chance to join a company with a: Culture to empower people and where your initiatives and ideas make a real difference International focus with truly diverse teams Unique possibility to be trained by our internal expertise in the world of bio-based products Lastly, we offer a friendly, informal culture in a demanding professional environment Besides, we actively embrace diversity in working together and contributing toward our shared objectives and values. By joining Corbion, you will become an employee in a company where you can feel pride in your achievements and develop your career with global prospects.

Material Management Executive (F&B), Thailand Global Food ingredients manufacturer opens for  Material Management Executive position, you will be responsible to focus on forecasting, material purchasing and inventories management within Thailand, working closely with key stakeholders in the region. Additionally, you will be required to seek continuous process improvement opportunities. This role reports directly to Operations Manager, Thailand. The Position: • Responsible for Forecast of all selling products (both trading products and local seasonings) in Thailand, in co-ordination with Account Managers and Manufacturing Sites. • Conduct S&OP with Account Managers to update and calibrate stockholding in Thailand & overall forecast. • Propose and maintain optimum safety stock for trading products, in alignment with Account Managers for stock-keeping agreements with customers. • Maintain appropriate stock level for intermediates and raw materials for toll manufacturing based on forecast of finished seasonings. • Implement, seek, and ensure proper approval process for stockholding of trading products, intermediaries, and raw materials, based on impact to stocking value and working capital. • Responsible to initiate and propose possible stock recovery plan to Account Managers for SLOB to reduce write-off of materials. • Issue Purchase Orders for Intermediaries, Raw Materials and Trading Products for safety stock and stock-holding vis-à-vis forecast to both external vendors and Symrise Manufacturing sites. • Ensure confirmations of sales orders of products that are under stock-holding and stock agreements for customers. • Analyse, propose & implement periodically on Raw Materials from Tollers to be purchased directly from an identified vendor with Regional Sourcing Team. The Ideal Candidate: • Bachelor’s degree, preferably Business Administration/Management or Supply Chain/Operation Management Work. • Minimum 5 years in planning and purchasing role, preferably in Food Manufacturing Industry • Have exposure in SAP & ERP system and strong competency in data analysis and excel modelling. • Detailed-oriented with strong communication skills to brief and seek alignment different stakeholders. • Able to work with cross-functional and -cultural teams. • Thrive in a fast-paced environment. • Strong leadership competency and strive for excellence.

Participate in the development and implementation of safety, Environment, and quality and assure workforce compliance with ISO45001, ISO14001, and ISO9001 Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering, energy engineering or related field. 3- 5 years of experience in facility management from an international manufacturing environment with a combination of people management experience License of the energy conservation program is an advantage. Strong experience in running efficient facility systems and continuous improvement for power supply, NG supply, LPG supply, water supply, air compressed supply. Experience in Waste Management and security Management, Service Contract, Construction Management, and ESG activities. Job_Title: Product Development Engineer/วิศวกรฝ่ายออกแบบและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์
Job_Description: Who is Fisher & Paykel Appliances? Maybe you don’t know about our company yet?  We design luxury premium household appliances with people in mind. We aim to create moments of delight together in the heart of the home, sustainably enhancing the quality of people's lives, now and for future generations. Our values drive us: Trusted, sustainably minded, innovative, generous, and curious. What is the role? As we build a new Product Development team in Rayong Thailand, we need the best design and development engineers to bring their experience and skills to work alongside our NZ-based experts. Design and improve current and new cooking, dishwashing and refrigeration appliances, parts and technologies always thinking about the customer needs Different product lines and projects will give you lots of challenge Research up-to-date trends, technology and general information that effectively influence current and future functional plans Test and analyse a variety of concepts to learn and inform decision making Problem solve with your team and others and independently Achieve outcomes as project plans. Qualifications and experience Tertiary qualification (Mechanical, Electrical or Mechatronics Engineering) At least 4 years product design experience ideally in appliances, electronics or automotive Good written and verbal English. Our Thailand team… Our working environment allows people to thrive and work at their best. We want our engineers to grow and develop. You will have opportunities for technical growth and leadership within a global organization. We offer true work/life balance, competitive remuneration and superannuation scheme. Fisher & Paykel is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, or other characteristics protected by law. We are interviewing now for several positions in different teams, so please apply now to start a conversation for 2024. Fisher & Paykel Appliances (Thailand) Co., Ltd. Amata City Industrial Estates7/252, 7/282 Moo 6 Mabyangporn Pluakdaeng, Rayong 21140 Tel: 038 - 640400 or 063-3249962

Job_Title: Project Engineer/วิศวกรโครงการ
Job_Description: คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรี หรือเทียบเท่า สาขาวิศวกรรมเครื่องกล/วิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า มีประสบการณ์ควบคุมงานโครงการอย่างน้อย 1 - 2 ปี มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ในการออกแบบ และสนับสนุนงานเทคนิค งานระบบวิศวกรรม มีประสบการณ์การควบคุมงานโครงการ ระบบไฟฟ้า ระบบเครื่องกล ระบบปรับอากาศ และระบบดับเพลิงอัตโนมัติ หากมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ด้านระบบดับเพลิงอัตโนมัติ (Fire Protection) จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ประเมินและจัดทำ BOQ งานติดตั้งระบบด้านวิศวกรรมได้ มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานออกแบบและก่อสร้าง Data Center จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Ms. Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี, อ่าน-เขียนแบบ และใช้โปรแกรม Auto CAD ได้ หากมีใบอนุญาตประกอบวิชาชีพวิศวกรรม (*พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ) สามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ เพื่อให้งานเสร็จตามเป้าหมาย หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ ออกแบบและสนับสนุนงานด้านเทคนิค งานระบบวิศวกรรม ควบคุมงานก่อสร้างโครงการ ตั้งแต่เริ่มต้นและสิ้นสุดโครงการ รวมไปถึงจัดเตรียมเอกสารต่างๆ เกี่ยวกับงานบริหารโครงการ ควบคุมงานโครงการ งานติดตั้งระบบ/อุปกรณ์ และดูแลผู้รับเหมาในการดำเนินงาน สนับสนุนงานขาย (ตรวจสอบ TOR, BOQ) วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับระบบ,ประสานงานกับลูกค้า พร้อมจัดทำรายงานสรุป อื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย

Position: QA/QC Manager (Injection Molding) Salary: Total package 50,000 THB Welfares: Bonus 3 months Location: Bowin, Sriracha, Chonburi Working Day: Monday to Saturday Responsibilities: Oversee the inspection and testing of raw materials, in-process components, and finished products to ensure compliance with specifications and quality standards. Collaborate with production and engineering teams to address quality issues and implement corrective and preventive actions. Evaluate and qualify suppliers through audits and ongoing monitoring to ensure the quality of incoming materials and components. Work closely with suppliers to address quality concerns and drive improvements in their processes. Provide training to employees on quality policies, procedures, and best practices. Foster a quality-focused culture within the organization through training and awareness programs. Stay abreast of industry regulations and standards, ensuring that the organization remains compliant with relevant requirements. Interface with regulatory agencies and customers during audits and inspections. Collect and analyze quality data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement. Prepare and present reports to management on key performance indicators and quality metrics. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., engineering, quality management, industrial technology). Proven experience in quality management and quality control, with a focus on Injection Molding process. Previous experience in a managerial or supervisory role is often required. Strong analytical thinking, technical skill and leadership skill. Able to work under pressure and work every Saturday. Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by E-mail JAC Personnel Eastern Seaboard Recruitment Ltd. 4/222, 5th Floor, Harbor Mall, Moo 10, Sukhumvit Road, T. Job Purpose for Engineering Manager Plan, organize, lead and manage the product line staff to continually improve yields, quality, return rates and scrap for products in volume production and new products. Support the organizational goals in achieving total custom satisfaction. Key Responsibilities Manages and achieve set goals set by management and translate goals into specific, measurable objectives for implementation. Yield improvement projects that are on time. Makes judgments quality rate issues and clearing actions to maximize outputs and communication with customers. Plans/Executes initiatives for continuous improvements to reduce the return rates. Develops talents within the PLE organization for engineering continuity. Ensures process control by utilizing statistical process control. Coordinates with design centers and recording head groups for product, process changes and transfer of technology by providing inputs and appropriate resources. Plans budget and control within the product line management. Knows your customer's expectations and drive actions to meet them Job Qualifications 13 + years of working experience, at least 7 years of management experience in Process Engineering. Background experience with OEMs, CM, EMS or electronics manufacturing business is required. Systematic problem solving, ISO requirement and Continuous Improvement Good command of English. Communicate factory issues to customer/ customer issues to factory. Coordinates customer visits. Background experience with OEMs, CM, EMS or electronics manufacturing business is required. Interpersonal and communication skills, Presentation skills Good command of English. Job_Title: Safety Health & Environment Manager/Safety Health & Environment Manager
Job_Description: HSE Manager As the HSE Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the health, safety, and environmental compliance of our operations. Your responsibilities will include: Developing, implementing, and maintaining HSE policies and procedures that align with Thai regulations. Conducting regular safety and environmental audits, inspections, and risk assessments throughout the hospitals and clinics and all companies. Managing and overseeing incident investigations, including root cause analysis, and maintaining accurate records of safety incidents. Collaborating with hospital leadership and department heads to promote a culture of safety and environmental responsibility. Overseeing emergency response and evacuation procedures, ensuring readiness for any critical situations. Providing HSE training, education, and awareness programs for hospital staff and ensuring ongoing compliance. Liaising with local healthcare regulatory bodies and maintaining compliance with all relevant laws and standards in the healthcare sector. Qualifications A Bachelor's degree in Occupational Health and Safety, Environmental Science, or a related field. Substantial experience in HSE management. Experience in the healthcare sector or Certification in HSE (e.g., OSHA) is highly advantageous. Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in crisis management and problem-solving related to healthcare safety and environmental issues.

Company: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Provide technical support and maintenance for IT systems and infrastructure within the CBM business unit in Saraburi. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to understand their IT needs and develop solutions to improve operational efficiency and productivity. Enhance IT process by AI and Machine Learning for business opportunity. Monitor and maintain server, network, and security systems to ensure optimal performance and availability. Implement and enforce IT digital platform for effectiveness. Act as a liaison between CBM business unit and central IT departments for coordination and implementation of IT projects. Provide technical support and maintenance for IT systems and infrastructure within the CBM business unit in Saraburi. Support and train end-users on software applications and systems. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. (new graduates are welcome) Achieve a minimum GPA of 2.70 for a bachelor's degree and 3.30 for a master's degree. TOEIC at least 550/IELTS at least 4.0/TOEFL at least 31/BULATS at least 40. Proven experience as an IT Engineer or similar role, preferably in the manufacturing or industrial sector. Strong knowledge of hardware, software, networking, and server administration. Good communication and interpersonal skills. Be able to work in Saraburi. (house allowance provided)

Primary Function: This role is responsible for the continuous running of equipment and machinery in factory, oversee routine maintenance and organize repairs, control and monitoring devices, Improve & Sustain Maintenance Activity  and related equipment’s performance to meet KPI commitments and work closely with other Maintenance staffs to achieve the above. As a maintenance engineer, you will be required to install new equipment, conduct routine maintenance, and troubleshoot equipment faults on site. You may also be required to remove old equipment and train staff on equipment operating procedures. Your role is vital to the efficiency, development and progress of manufacturing and processing industries. Working with Maintenance Manager and other professionals, you'll improve production facilities, reduce the incidence of costly breakdowns and develop strategies to improve overall reliability and safety of plant, personnel and production processes.. Essential Functions”: Organizes and maintain of all existing PM and TPM of infrastructure and equipment. Plan and manage the plant’s resources to fulfill the activities have to be done to complete the preventive maintenance schedules as well as maintenance budget has been provided. Monitor Equipment performance, initiate activities using Lean & Six Sigma techniques to improve their performance to achieve good Quality and Reliability. Schedule Machine PM & maintain records of the Maintenance activity – through implemented documents, ensure ISO requirements are met. Designing and overseeing the implementation of facility expansion, layout, various systems, and quality controls. Evaluating operational systems and facility infrastructure to ascertain and improve operational efficiencies. Handle with emergencies, unplanned problems and repairs, troubleshooting equipment malfunctions. Proper and Timely feedback to immediate superior on performance & improvements Initiate and follow up corrective actions on Quality Issues, Process & design Improvements related to Maintenances. Proving technical support and training on new equipment. Ordering and tracking spare parts and equipment. Coordinate with crossed functional departments, customers and other engineering and production colleagues. Improve Working Methods, 5S+ House Keeping and Discipline in the Shop Floor. Basic Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical engineering, electrical and electronic engineering or related field 3-5 years’ experience in maintenance services for plant facilities . Good communication and training skills Able to work at Nakhonratchasima. Able to accommodate flexible work schedule. Preferred Master’s Degree in mechanical engineering, electrical and electronic engineering or related field Knowledge in Energy Management Experiences in engineering design skill for automation machine will be advantage. Good English communication in written and verbal. Technical knowledge TPM/PM Activity Statistical analysis skill (SPC, DOE, FMEA, six sigma) Programmable logic controllers (PLC) Soft skills The capacity to understand a range of engineering functions and procedures. Basic Business understanding for managing budgets, leading a team, and liaising with suppliers. The ability to lead and motivate others. Good diagnostic and problem-solving skills Teamworking skills to work cooperatively and liaise with people at all levels. People-management skills. We offer attractive remuneration packages and career opportunities to successful candidate. Interested applicants are invited to apply in person or send application with full resume Indicating qualifications and experience to HR Department via " Apply Now " or more information please contact the phone number 044 233 100-3 Eaton Industries (Thailand) Ltd. 156 Moo 3 Ratchasima-Chockchai Road Tumbol Nongbuasala, Amphur Muang, Nakhonratchasima 30000 Tel: 04-4233-100 Fax: 04-4212-164

Who You Are You always strive to do a good job…but wouldn’t it be great if you could do your job and do a world of good? You care about quality – at every level. What’s more, you’ll get that pride that comes from empowering makers, doers, protectors and everyday heroes all over the world. We’re more than the #1 tools company. More than a driving force in outdoor power equipment. More than a global leader in industrial. We’re visionaries and innovators. As successful as we’ve been in the past, we have so much further to go. That’s where you come in. Join us!
