Job_Title: Senior Customer Quality Engineer (ERNI Electronics Plant/ Lamphun)
Job_Description: Job Description: Senior Customer Quality Engineer Responsibilities Manage high level customer quality concerns with large corporations and companies globally, review and communicate technical information and corrective actions, proactively implement improvement plans with the customer, engineering and manufacturing sites within TE. Participate in Customer Scorecard Reviews and customer focus team meetings. Prepare, organise and facilitate customer audit/visits for A and strategic accounts follow up on potential corrective actions. Manage High impact warranty and liability claims for manufactured product. Review relevant quality and TEOA KPI's to track performance and take appropriate action. Obtain regular VOC/VOB and functional follow up where required. Block / unblock production processes (stock and deliveries) where required. Report and advise on customer claims to key stakeholders including Legal Counsel and Finance. Work on planned and ad-hoc projects as required. Maintain a high level of integrity and uphold TE values of integrity, teamwork, accountability and innovation. Qualifications Bachelor degree in Engineering or equivalent is preferable. 8+ years in quality or manufacturing engineering. 3+ years in a customer facing role. Excellent problem solving skills, analytical skills, and communication skills Ability to demonstrate strong customer focus and continues improvement attitude Strong project management skills and ability to multi-task Understanding and practice of quality tools such as 8D, FMEA, MSA, Minitab. Fluent in English including reviewing technical contract. Assertive negotiating and discussion skills. Able to gain and maintain customer intimacy.

Working with our Team during the pre‐construction phase to build Shop Drawings, As‐Built and Submittal drawings Requirement: Graduate Diploma or Bachelor in Mechanical Engineer. Have experience in business construction Can use Auto CAD Benefit: House Allowance Other welfare OT (if any) Social Insurance Business leave Sick leave OT

Job Description: Provide technical leadership to site operations, establish technology roadmap and work closely with corporate and regional technical team pertaining to test development roadmap and improvements to achieve lower cost and higher manufacturing return. To develop high performance and motivated team with the right competencies and capability proactively to support continuous flawless execution and business growth. To lead and drive test-engineering excellence by working with various functional leads, to ensure test capability meets/exceeds manufacturing requirements/standard in order to deliver quality products. Support the development of test and inspection strategies, failure analysis, and customer requested DFT analysis. To interfaces with customers and render support to Program Management initiatives and activities, to meet/exceed customers' expectation. To lead and drive test engineering activities in line with Plexus values and Leadership Behaviors to ensure compliance to industry standard, regulatory and customer requirements. Accountable to execute on Plexus’ Best People strategy, leaders will focus on evaluating potential, driving succession planning and ensuring that their employees receive the development and coaching required to realize their full potential. Manage Test Equipment Calibration and Preventive Maintenance programs. Maintain or gain knowledge of industries standards and new technologies through industry conference, training classes, and internal Plexus teams. Manage technical resource training. Manage long-term capacity planning and technical resource allocation. Ensure engineering change activity that impacts test and inspection is properly implemented. Support Users Group activity to drive standardization and change in standard processes, methods, and tools and empower the site Users Group participants. Manage the test transition and Test acceptance process at the site ensuring that procedures and processes are being followed. Monitor Efficiency and Effectiveness metrics for the test processes and insure test procedures (SOP, WI, EOI, etc.) are being followed. Travel may be required to meet the needs of the business. Job Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Science or Engineering fields. 10 + years of related experience in Electronics Manufacturing Services is preferred (PCBA, Semiconductor, etc.) Knowledgeable in the area of electronic product testing. Experience with Lean/Six Sigma concepts. Problem solving and continuous improvement skills. Proven leadership skills and experience in managing team members. Excellent verbal and written communication as well as presentation skills required.

Plan and oversee implementation of Machining maintenance management system, ensure high-quality maintenance tasks, manage inventory and procurement of spare parts, and support safety and quality standards. Responsibilities Plan and oversee implementation of Machining maintenance management system Ensure maintenance tasks (preventive, corrective and breakdown maintenance) and calibrations are carried out with high quality within target and suitable time Provide maintenance breakdown support for production machines and try as much as possible to reduce machine failure duration Identify new work as a consequence of breakdown repairs and complete work Manage and control the inventory management and procurement of spare parts, consumables and tools Propose improvement or development work, implement once work has been approved Ensure safety of machines, equipment's and conditions of working area Establishes preventive maintenance programs for all Machining, new equipment and manages current preventive maintenance program Support Quality Standard which related Aerospace and Semiconductor industry Lead, train and motivate the subordinates to provide proper preventive maintenance, work under safe condition and housekeeping Participate and support cost reductions, continuous improvement activities Quality Management Systems Requirements Bachelor's Degree or higher in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering or related field Experience 5-8 years in 3-axis & 5-AIXS Machining Maintenance function with strengths in PM schedules and maintenance activities Strong trouble shooting and good knowledge in CNC, PLC, power drives, hydraulic, pneumatic Well understanding of Machining drawings and principles Strong on problem solving, analytical skill, and service mind Good command in English Exhibits a strong regard for organizing and prioritizing, as well as an ability to meet deadlines Compensation & Benefits Salary range : 45-55K Working day: Mon-Fri Provident Fund Fixed allowance Bonus

Job_Title: Power Business Development Assistant Manager (New S-Curve Business)
Company: WHA Utilities & Power Public Company Limited
Job_Description: Create proper strategic business plan for company New S-Curve Business (EV, H2, Renewable and Etc) and then coordinate with associates of WHA group to approach to the Thai market effectively. Develop private and public EV charging stations to support Transportation Sectors and WHA business direction in Thailand Conduct attractive business model for private and public EV charging projects including company’s investment and partners’ investment projects (including payback period simulation, offer competitive benefits proposal, etc.) Develop Renewable Energy and Smart Energy Platform to support company and partners EV charging projects (Including Solar rooftop, Battery Energy Storage, Energy Management Software, Etc.) Establishing and implementing short and long-term investment and Go to Market strategies to promote the products of New Energy such as EV, Solar PPA, Energy Storage and others products to new customers and/or partners. Develop Renewable projects in Thailand for both Feed in Tariff scheme (Green Field) and M&A scheme. Support for new business models and opportunities along the New S-Curve power business value chain to create new area of opportunities for sustainable expansion in Thailand. Conduct market research to identify new energy trends and opportunities To Support and assist the team in undertaking initial screening and preliminary analysis of the assigned projects and opportunities, including but not limited to technical, commercial, contractual, and financing aspects Planning and coordinating the implementation of business plans, develop GTM plan and the penetration of new markets Other works related to New S-Curve project development Qualifications: Bachelor’s and/or Master’s Degrees in Electrical Engineering or related filed 3 – 5 years in Power Business Development experience Knowledgeable in Renewable Project Development, FiT project related is a plus Knowledgeable in Electric Vehicles (EV) and its ecosystem especially EV Charger is a plus Knowledgeable in Hydrogen (H2) and its ecosystem is a plus but not mandatory Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing strategies Good communication and presentation skills in both English and Thai Familiarity with Thai power industry and electricity grid code Familiarity with Thai Transportation Industry Project management capabilities High level of self-motivation, energetic, fast-learner and adaptability Working Location: WHA Tower, Bangna KM7, Close to Mega Bangna

Company: CP ALL PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED (Head Quarter)
Job_Description: Responsibilities 1. ศึกษางานนวัตกรรมและเทคโนโลยีใหม่ๆ รับ Requirements มาพัฒนาปรับปรุงระบบหรือกระบวนการทำงานของสายร้านและสายสำนักงาน 2. ออกแบบและวางแผนกระบวนการทำงาน/ระบบ เพื่อให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพและประสิทธิผล 3. ติดตาม/ประสานงานกับทางหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง (Cross Functional) เพื่อร่วมกันวิเคราะห์และแก้ไขปัญหา 4. สรุปผลหลังสิ้นสุดกระบวนการ พร้อมนำเสนอต่อผู้บริหาร Requirements - ปริญญาตรี-โท สาขา วิศวกรรมอุตสาหการ (Industrial Engineer) - มีทักษะและประสบการณ์การทำงานด้าน วางแผน / ออกแบบ / พัฒนา / ประเมินผล / วิเคราะห์ผล ระบบและกระบวนการที่เกี่ยวข้อง - มีทักษะในการใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office เช่น Excel, Power Point เป็นต้น - มีความสามารถในการแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี - ยินดีพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่

Accountabilities: Best value solutions whilst mitigating supply chain risk to the organization. New supply chains including effective identification, assessment and mitigation of potential risks of our sourcing strategies domestically and internationally. Effective & Efficient procurement solutions and processes to minimize transactional processing and leverage available technologies to drive automation. Develop and drive the implementation of supplier performance management targets. Provide fit for purpose procurement operations services from the establishment and prequalification of suppliers, the source to contract process and efficient procure to pay operations. Managing supplier performance against contracted cost and service levels including the administration of any claims on our suppliers Promote the effective management of suppliers through the application of performance assessments to sustain value through the lifecycle of the supplier Identify opportunities to reduce total cost through off book inventory, in-source Vs outsource supply chain options Establish new processes and systems for effective procurement across Schenck Process Thailand. As an ideal applicant, you must possess the following: Must have an Engineering Degree (preferred), Science, or similar. Business degree or Masters in Business Administration is a plus. Formal qualifications in supply management or procurement. Must have a relevant tertiary qualifications in Engineering (preferred), Science, or similar Formal qualifications in supply management or procurement. Proven success in negotiating major contracts with suppliers. Proven track record in procurement / supply management  (ideally in a fabrication or heavy engineering environment). 2 years+ relevant operational and industrial experience. Ability to operationalize strategy In return, we offer you: A diverse and inclusive workplace providing equal opportunities for everyone. A friendly, fun, and flexible environment where we work collaboratively and celebrate our achievements. Opportunity to build a long-term career with strong support for continuous learning and professional development. We at Schenck Process stand by our company values. We openly welcome and support inclusion and diversity. If you desire to be part of a culture of excellence and growth, please apply. Schenck Process provides equal opportunities without discrimination in all our recruitment. We are committed to an inclusive workplace, where all employees are given the opportunity to develop and contribute to their full potential. Our corporate culture is characterised by an openness to new ideas, comprehensive thinking, self-responsibility and flat hierarchies, which our employees experience and implement on a daily basis around the globe. We are driven by new technical challenges day after day. No matter whether you join us as someone with plenty of experience, a new recruit with emerging experience, a student, graduate or intern – the future looks bright for you! Contact Schenck Process (Thailand) Ltd 595/35-36 Unit No.C8 Project TIP 9 Moo 4, Sukhumvit Road Bang Pu Mai, Muang, Samutprakarn 10280 THAILAND

Provide, review and finalize scope of requirement and work closely with Contractor until completion of the project Coordinate and manage relevant parties to gather requirement, summarize the scope, clarify all comments/issues to match the business workflow to SAP EPPM software Facilitate the data gathering, data cleansing, and support data migration from existing legacy systems to the new SAP system Where requires, responsible for Offshore&Onshore brownfield modification projects and coordinate with cross-function teams e.g. Project Engineer, Discipline Engineer, Planner, offshore operation, etc. to support construction work Define project scopes and plans, work programs and budgets, and project development strategies in compliance with the Company’s policy and objectives Monitor and manage stakeholders to ensure the project’s performance and compliance in terms of schedule, QA/QC policies, safety requirements, cost control, and applicable codes and standards are aligned with the defined strategies and approved plans. Professional Knowledge & Experiences Bachelor’s degree Engineering. 7 years of experiences work of oil and gas or petrochemical or refinery industries. Job_Title: Maintenance Engineer/วิศวกรซ่อมบำรุง
Job_Description: Responsibilities Set up maintenance plans for machines. Perform routine maintenance checks according check sheet and schedule. Set up predictive maintenance system with implementation of sensors and data analysis. Perform repairs on machines if needed (electrically/mechanically). Work closely together with external contractors and machine suppliers. Participate in the new set up of machines and production lines. Work closely together with production foremen and supervisor for improvement projects. Work project based for CIP projects. Organize the documentation of maintenance documents on server. Communicate with German HQ and external machine suppliers for help at machine repairs. Work closely together and help German colleagues for changes and set ups of machines. Lead a maintenance team for repairs. Monitor external contractors when performing jobs at the building or at machines. Perform maintenance tasks on the building and facilities if required. Spare part sourcing together with purchasing engineer. Jig and fixture design, build up and repair/improve. Education Bachelor degree or higher in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering Experience At least 2-3 year-experience in maintenance operation. Qualification Leadership skills Able to work independently Strong problem solving Solving , decision making and analytical skills Technical understanding and knowledge of electrical Computer literacy (Word, Excel, Outlook, CAD) Basic English, able to communicate in English Basic PLC knowledge is of an advantage CNC programming is of an advantage Reading and understanding of electrical circuit diagrams

Job_Description: รับผิดชอบงานต่อเติม,จัดสร้าง-จัดหาหรือออกแบบเครื่องจักร/อุปกรณ์ใหม่ รับผิดชอบงาน PM อาคาร/สถานที่,เครื่องจักร/อุปกรณ์ระบบ AD รับผิดชอบงานพัฒนา-ปรับปรุงเครื่องจักร-อุปกรณ์การผลิต ในส่วนของโรงงานให้สามารถใช้งานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ หรือทดแทนการใช้แรงงานคน รับผิดชอบจัดการของเสียจากโรงงาน รวมที้งดูแลเรื่องการลดปริมาณ,การนำกลับมาใช้ซ้ำ รับผิดชอบงานเอกสารระบบคุณภาพ และงานสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัด ควบคุมดูแลการใช้พลังงานและทรัพยากร รวมทั้งจัดทำแผนและข้อเสนอแนะ ควบคุม/ดูแลการจัดเก็บแบบเครื่องมือ/เครื่องจักร และแบบแปลนอาคารให้อยู่ในสภาพที่พร้อมใช้งาน คุณสมบัติ การศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศกรรมไฟฟ้า / วิศวกรเครื่องกล มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักรไลน์ผลิตอย่างน้อย 1 ปี มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานระบบเครื่องจักรในอุตสาหกรรรม

Responsibilities: Perform reliability testing. Write test reports and provide analysis of the test data, prepare documentation and recommendations. Familiar with test equipment such as HALT and Environmental chambers, Power supplies, DMMs, Data loggers, ThermocouplesIR cameras, Oscilloscopes etc. Lead meetings with customers to update the Reliability activities status Work with the cross-functional team to ensure the products can meet the design specification and reliability goals. Conduct failure analysis (FA). Ensure that the Reliability issues have been resolved in the prompt and timely manner. Direct and coordinate engineering activities concerned with development, procurement, installation, maintenance and calibration of instruments, equipment, and control devices required to test, record, and reduce test data. May provide training in new procedures to testing staff or technicians. Perform moderately complex assignments of the engineering test function Qualifications; BS in Electrical or Mechanical engineering or related field. Minimum 5 years working experience in hands-on testing of electronic products (Communication, Enterprise products, etc.) Ability to read schematics. Knowledge of product and component failure modes and mechanisms. Effective communication skills and can do attitude. Good verbal and written communication skills in English

The Specifier Engineer reports to Market Specifier Manage for Thailand and is based in Spring Tower-Ratchathewi, Bangkok. This role primarily exists to strengthen the product specification by developing relationships and providing product value to all specifiers and key influencer in the project. Key Responsibilities Planning customer visit by weekly, prioritize on focus customer as architect, engineer, owner, developer, and consultant. Develop strong and trusted relationships with key influencers and customers based on product knowledge, value to use and long-term benefits. Increase product specification in the project. Generate marketing activities to key account customers e.g., lunch and learn, seminar, association sponsorship etc. Coordinate with marketing, project, or another team to drive company’s product to be sold in the project. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in civil engineer /Architecture/ or related field 3-5 years relevant experiences in specifications for construction materials Proven success in project specification with architects, designers, consultants, owners, developers and/or government Familiarity with CRM, Salesforce Fast learning, able to search for market opportunity and able to manage project. Good experience in dealing with clients in M&E and structure products would be an advantage. Good experience in government projects would be an advantage. Good command English and computer literacy Good interpersonal, communication, presentation skill and project management Personal own car and a valid driving license Able to travel up-country as required for work. Able to use engineering software for designing structure and drafting would be an advantage. At NS BlueScope our success comes from our people. We choose to treat each other with trust and respect. We understand that the range of perspectives that result from having a diverse and inclusive workplace will strengthen NS BlueScope’s capability for continued and sustained business success. Plans general plant activities and coordinates all departments activities toward the efficient execution of assigned tasks. Plans, organizes and directs the manufacturing operation to ensure the most effective return on assets and obtainment of production schedules and overall business objectives. Sets specific objectives for all staff personnel necessary to direct the staff to the highest possible degree of overall plant efficiency. Conducts weekly and monthly meetings of staff personnel to evaluate levels of plant performance and directs changes in methods, planning, processing, and maintenance, as may be required to meet or exceed forecasts and control cost of manufacturer. Consults with members of staff regarding specific and individual progress toward assigned objectives. Motivates staff personnel through direct supervision to realize maximum potential and attain high level performance. Serve as champion of company manufacturing systems within the facility. Establishes and ensures achievement of all Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) while ensuring continuous improvement for all areas. Participating in the business planning and budget process by developing short and long-term cost containment/reduction strategies. Assure that the plant is managed following business operation system, IATF-16949, ISO-14001 & OSHAS 18001 requirements. Comply with layered process audits per the schedule produced by the business operation system coordinator. Comply with all business operation system, IATF-16949 and customer specific requirements. Responsibilities matrix for all requirements related to this job title. Ensures that legal requirements are identified and achieved. Participates in establishing policy, objectives and targets for the Health, Safety and Environment program, such as exceeding regulatory and other requirements. Participates in the Health, Safety and Environmental programs by following all policies, procedures and work instructions that may include safety rules, safety observation audits, regulatory compliance, environmental awareness and audits, and continuous improvement. Ensure continuous improvement activities are planned, implemented, measured, reported and reviewed in plant area. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Manufacturing, management and/or business. Minimum of 15 years experience in manufacturing environment especially in Automotive business, 5 years in Manager level is preferred. Well knowledge of financial reporting (Income statements / Balance sheets, P&L) Able to communicate effectively with each other at all levels of the organization. Demonstrate the right attitude aligned with company values. Good decision maker, strong people management and problem solving skill. Proficient in English skills (Business level). Interested candidates please send your update resume, current and expected salary with contact details to: ManpowerGroup Thailand - Eastern Seaboard Branch 44/59 Room no.302 Moo 11, T.Nong-prue, A.Banglamung Chonburi 20150 Contact Khun Jaru Sritin (Professional and Executive Consultant) Telephone no. 033-049599 ext.3405 or 089-273-9854 Manpower recruitment license No.Chobor.03/2554 Ref: BH44638

Job_Title: Chief of QA Incoming/หัวหน้าแผนก QA Incoming
Job_Description: Qualification Graduated : Bachelor Degree or higher Major : industrial or related filed Able to reading DRAWING model Have experience in Quality Assurance at least 2 years Able to writing, reading and speaking in English well Have knowledge about  quality system ISO9001:2008, ISO14001:2004 well Able to work under pressure Location : Chachoengsao, Bang Nam Priao Working on Mon - Sat 08.00 -17.00 Responsibility & authority Description Follow the procedures for inspection and quality testing of incoming products (PD-QA-01) and update them. Plan and train IQA employees annually to have the ability to inspect all types of raw materials. Plan random sampling or 100% inspection of IQA employees every month. Control IQA employees to inspect according to the specified plan every day. Verify the accuracy of the results of indicating signs indicating raw materials that do not conform to specifications every day. Review and summarize the list of raw materials that do not conform to specifications to be accurate and up-to-date every day. Contact and coordinate with purchasing officers, warehouses, and suppliers to receive raw materials back within 3 days (only within the country). Contact and coordinate with purchasing, warehouse, production, and supplier staff to resolve raw material quality problems. Prepare the DMR document correctly before sending it to the purchasing officer and follow up until the document is closed Prepare a supplier assessment plan together with purchasing officials and related agencies every year. Conduct supplier assessments together with purchasing officials and related agencies. Prepare a report summarizing the monthly raw material inspection results and present it to the Quality Assurance Manager no later than the 5th of every month.

Job Summary : As a security consultant, applicant will be responsible for performing all kinds of security assessments for the company, including Secure Code Review Penetration Testing Red Teaming Exercise Patch Management Scanning Data Secure Assessment ETC. Responsibilities : Conduct project kickoff meetings with application development team and perform project scoping. Breakdown assessment tasks and estimate effort for each task. Perform assessment on the application with a proper methodology, which can vary, depending on the assessment type. Clarify the findings and provide practical recommendations to the application development team. Provide a complete assessment report to the application development team. Manage the assessment project performed by the vendor. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree in IT fields. Knowledge on one or more programming languages. Top Urgent! : Maintenance & Engineering Introduction We are a multinational company with several manufacturing locations including Rayong and Chonburi, Thailand. We are urgently seeking an experienced Maintenance & Engineering Supervisor to join our team in achieving all KPIs in operations which aligning the company objectives, goals and timeframe. General Requirements The successful candidate will work as superintendent in production area and manage all aspects of the operation shop floor (production to logistics area) for two facilities and will be working closely with the Production Manager and subordinates to provide and ensure all production outputs meet both internal and external customer requirements in terms of productivity, quality, safety, and on time in full delivery. If you are energetic, systematic, result and detailed oriented, and skillful in resources management in order to provide optimum performance. You always strive for efficiency and improvement. Excellent in analyzing performance metrics and using KPI to measure and evaluate productivity. You pay high attention to detail & accuracy, and you are a very well-organized person. You are a dedicated and inspirational leader with excellent communication & interpersonal skills. Problem-solving and decision-making will take up a great part of your day. We welcome and would like to talk with you in more details in initiating a strong team together. Responsibilities Understand well and oversee all issues regarding Maintenance & Engineering (M&E) to support production lines Plan, direct, and monitor all M&E activities to maximize production efficiency. Prepare and utilize all required resources to support production activity and delivery schedule. Control day-to-day production to ensure optimum performance and productivity, provide suggestions and support to personnel, and to resolve any issues that may happen. Monitor and control daily progress of M&E works in all processes to ensure the production is proceeding well in-line with the committed schedules. Run daily/weekly/monthly meetings with subordinates, the Production Manager and all relevant parties to find out gaps and root causes and set counter measures and action plan and have a daily follow up until all troubles are resolved. Support the Production Manager in driving Continuous Improvement based on Lean manufacturing and Six Sigma approach with a good foundation through TPM and TQM. In collaboration with others to make best practice in supporting all requirements based on ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18001 or ISO45001, 5S, etc. Drive all operations achieving KPIs in terms of SHE (FAC, MTC,LTA), Quality (DPMO, %CCOR), Productivity (%OEE, MTBF, MTTR, Cost) Qualifications and Skills Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Mechatronics or related fields with minimum 5 years working experience, or High vocational or Diploma in Industrial Technology or related fields with minimum 10 years working experience. Preferred experienced in Maintenance & Engineering : Supervisor, Engineer, Assistant Manager, or similar roles or Proficient in TPM such as AM, PM pillar, Maintenance (BD & PM) Cost and Expenses Control as weekly, monthly or yearly based activities. In-depth knowledge of Electrical power supply, PLC, P&ID, CNC & LASER is an advantage. Proficient in CMMS, MS-Office, Advanced MS-Excel, AutoCAD, CAM, CAE, SketchUp, Power BI and other software. Intermediate or excellent professional communication, written & spoken, in English and Thai language is a must. Good knowledge of ISO9001, ISO14001, OHSAS18001, or ISO45001 Able to travel between our plants in Rayong and Chonburi and to stay overnight when required. Please click the Apply button above to submit a CV with an application letter stating expected salary and your earliest availability. We look forward to receiving your application!

Knowledge of Structural Detailed Design. Job_Title: Safety, Health and Environment - Site Manager (Chiangmai)
Company: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited
Job_Description: Job Responsibilities: Developing and maintaining Safety & Health Management program, for all operational sites and across GULF group, in compliance with the law and occupational health requirements as well as related international standards. Ensuring continuous development of Occupational Health Management system including audit program, safety activities, awareness campaign, illness & injury prevention plan, reporting, investigating, analyzing and documenting all near misses, incidents/accident database and regulatory compliances. Providing Safety & Health resource for management decision-making to prevent hazard from business operation, through risk assessment, potential environmental and social impacts, including issues related to the health and safety of employees, local communities and other relevant stakeholders. Coaching the team of SH&E in execution of risk inventories & evaluations, risk assessments and incident investigations and ensuring action closure. Leading the SH&E due diligence for new acquired projects and facilitating project team to achieve excellent construction SH&E performance. Communicating and making a relationship with government and regulatory agencies. Travelling to site visit and supporting all operational locations and new construction projects when required. Job Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Occupational Health and Safety or related fields. Minimum 8 years’ experience in Safety Management and Occupational Health System, with minimum 3 years’ managerial level in leading multi sites simultaneously. Knowledge of multi-site ISO 14001, ISO 45001 and ISO 9001 management systems standards and certifications, as well as country legislation and standards within HSE. Experience of advanced incident investigation and prevention and managing positive changes in HSE performance. Knowledge of federal, state and local health and safety, and environmental regulations, and direct experience dealing with regulatory agencies and/or compliance officers. Strong leadership with a good interpersonal skills and excellent communications. Fluent in English both written and verbal Ability to travel/ work upcountry. Ability to work 6 days per week Goal–Oriented, Unity, Learning, Flexible. Interested person, please submit your resume via online system or click "APPLY NOW" All applications will be strictly confidential, and will be kept for at least 1 year. Only shortlist candidates will be notified. Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited 11th Fl., M Thai Tower, All Seasons Place, 87 Wireless Rd., Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Website: www.gulf.co.th

Job_Title: Terminal Safety Operation Manager for Chemical Tank ( 6 months contract...
Company: PERSOLKELLY HR Services Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Bonus:  Approx. 4 Months Duties: o  Oversee all day to day/monthly deliverables of terminal operations, including receiving, storage, handling, equipment maintenance, and distribution of sulfuric acid/chemicals. o  Ensure compliance with all relevant safety, environmental, security and regulatory requirements for Terminal operations. o  Develop and implement standard operating procedures for terminal operations and ensure adherence. o  Monitor and maintain terminal equipment and infrastructure ensuring zero incidents through utilization of the Company’s preventative maintenance program. o  Conduct regular safety meetings, training sessions for terminal personnel. o  Provide leadership and guidance to tank terminal employees, fostering a positive productive work environmental. o  Promote a strong safety culture among the terminal staff through training, communications and leading by examples. o  Build and maintain strong relationships with carriers/customers, ensuring their needs and expectations are met. o  Collaborate with Sulfuric Acid Distribution team to identify and pursue opportunities for business growth. o  Manage Terminal budget. o  Management of capital projects in alignment with the Company’s project/engineering manager. o  Ensure all documentation requirements for Terminal Operations is maintained and updated. o  Other duties as assigned. Qualifications: o  Strong knowledge of safety regulations, environmental compliance and industry best practices related to sulfuric acid (Chemical) handling, storage and shipment. o  Excellent management skills, with the ability to motivate and develop high performing team. o  Solid understanding of terminal operations, logistics and supply chain management. o  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with the capability to make informed decisions under pressure. o  Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, to interact with internal and external stakeholders. Location : Changwattana - Ngam Wong Wan, Lat Phrao, Din Daeng/Vibhavadi/Don Muang, Sai Mai, Lak Si, Pathumthani Salary : 150,000 THB ~ 200,000 THB Industry : Construction Job Description วางแผนและบริหารฝ่ายก่อสร้างในเชิงนโยบาย ให้หน่วยงานก่อสร้างสามารถทำงานได้อย่างมีคุณภาพ อยู่ในงบประมาณและทันตามเวลาที่กำหนด วางแผนและบริหารบุคลากรในฝ่ายก่อสร้างให้ทำงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด พัฒนาและปรับปรุงรูปแบบการทำงานในฝ่ายก่อสร้างให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด เป็นที่ปรึกษาและดูแลแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ สอดคล้องกับนโยบายบริษัท ให้คำปรึกษาแก่ผู้บริหาร/ลูกค้า/ผู้เกี่ยวข้อง ในขั้นตอนและกระบวนการทำงานที่ถูกต้องได้ รวมถึงแผนงานความคืบหน้าการแก้ปัญหากรณีมีการสอบถามข้อมูล บริหารคู่ค้าและผู้เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการก่อสร้างของบริษัท Requirement ปริญญาตรี หรือโท สาขาวิศวกรรมโยธา หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีภาวะผู้นำ ความซื่อสัตย์ มีความอดทนและมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี มีใบอนุญาติประกอบวิชาชีพ ก.ว. มีประสบการณ์บริหารงานก่อสร้างทั้งแนวดิ่งและแนวราบ โครงการขนาดกลางถึงขนาดใหญ่ ไม่น้อยกว่า 15 ปี มีความรู้ด้านเทคนิคก่อสร้างเป็นอย่างดี มีประสบการณ์ด้านการบริหารจัดการและแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี สามารถปฎิบัติงานได้หลายหน่วยงาน เดินทางดูแล site งานและออกต่างจังหวัดได้ มีความรับผิดชอบ รับแรงกดดันได้ดี มีประสบการณ์งานก่อสร้างแนวสูง is a must English Level Level 4 - Conversation Level Other Language None Benefits ให้เลือกระหว่าง - Company car (Fortuner) + fleet card or (Car + Gas) 12k per month Working Hour 8:00 AM ~ 5:00 PM Holiday จันทร์ - เสาร์ 08.00 - 17.00 (Flexible Time),ใน 1 เดือนสามารถเลือกหยุดได้ 2 เสาร์ Contact (ติดต่อ) Time: 8.30 am-5.30pm Office Number: 02-2539800 Website : http://www.reeracoen.co.th [link removed] Instagram : reeracoenthailand Facebook : Reeracoen Recruitment

Job_Title: Engineering Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายวิศวกรรม
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน 1.ร่วมวางแผน ออกแบบ พัฒนา จัดการบริหารงานซ่อมบำรุงซ่อมเครื่องจักรในโรงงานให้มีประสิทธิภาพ เพื่อสนับสนุนการดำเนินงานของฝ่ายต่างๆ 2.ควบคุม ดูแล งานซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักรเชิงป้องกัน เพื่อให้เครื่องจักร สามารถใช้งานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ 3.ร่วมวางแผนและติดตามโครงการด้านวิศวกรรม เพื่อปรับปรุงกระบวนการผลิตให้มีประสิทธิภาพมากยิ่งขึ้น 4.กำกับ ดูแล ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานทั้งภายในและภายนอก เพื่อดำเนินโครงการเป็นไปตามแผนงานหรือความต้องการขององค์กร คุณสมบัติ 1.ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป  สาขาวิศวกรรมเครื่องกล วิศวกรรมอุตสาหกรรม วิศกรรมไฟฟ้า 2.มีประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปี เกี่ยวกับวิศวกรรมในอุตสาหกรรมการเครื่องดื่ม 3.มีประสบการ์ณทำงานด้าน Utility เครื่อง Retort และ ระบบ Boiler 3.สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ในระดับดี

Job_Title: Master Grower (1 Position) / Grower (10 positions)-Chiang Mai/หัวหน้างานปลูก...
Job_Description: Master Grower - หัวหน้างานปลูก (1 Position) Responsibilities: Overseeing the daily operations of a cannabis farm, including the cultivation, maintenance, propagation, harvesting, and drying. Developing a cultivation plan and assigning duties to growers. Organizing the transplanting and cloning processes of plants. Checking existing crops for diseases and resolving any plant health issues. Ensuring that the cannabis plant's growth requirements, such as lighting, nutrients, and environmental parameters, are consistently. Managing the inventory of the farm's cannabis production, such as chemicals, tools, equipment and HVAC systems. Managing the cultivation budget to ensure production targets are met. Developing SOPs and ensuring the procedures are complied with the state cannabis policies. Ensuring the quality of cannabis raw material are met the GACP and PIC/s GMP standard. Reporting the daily work and problems to Head of Cultivation. Grower - พนักงานปลูก ( 2 Positions) Responsibilities: Discusses plant growing activities with Head Grower to plan for growing activities that are consistent with planned production schedules. Prepares space required for planned cultivation Monitors growing conditions and discusses changes in humidity, moisture and temperature and cultivation procedures with head growers to ensure conformance with quality control standards. On a regular basis inspects crop to ascertain conditions such as leaf texture, bloom size and the existence of pests or disease; removing substandard or diseased plants to maintain quality standards. Applies herbicides, pesticides and fungicides as directed. Assists in the development of breeding for new species in product line and new cultivation techniques. Maintains records of growing techniques and production to be used for review to identify trends and to forecast future space needs. Coordinate with Faculty of Pharmacy and Faculty of Medicine in Chiang Mai University for the Organization on the Cannabis Project Qualification A Master’s degree in Agriculture, Horticulture, Plant Physiology, Botany or a related field. A minimum of 3-year-experiences working as a master grower or greenhouse cultivation field. No criminal record. Good knowledge of GACP. Exceptional knowledge of Plant Physiology, Plant Nutrition and Cannabis cultivation. Excellent knowledge of soilless/hydroponic cultivation method as well as ability to calculate the nutrient formula. A solution-driven attitude and good analytical skills. Good command and written in English language. Great leadership with communication skill and problem-solving skill. Ability to do manual labor and work for long hours. Willingness to stay on top of current cannabis farming trends. Work 6 days a week.

Job_Description: Job Descriptions To report management matters to Building Manager on a daily basis, as well as report immediately in the event of building emergencies. To monitor, control and organize all on – site staff and to be responsible for actions of such staff in addition to ensuring that staff rosters and all holidays are adequately covered. Computer literacy ( MS office) is a must. Must be self-motivated, responsible and able to build team. Good skills in communication and team management. Overview The Production Engineer role is responsible for making the production process as efficient as possible and it is a feeder role for future Production Leads and Shift Managers.  To be a successful Production Engineer you need to be an independent thinker and a keen problem solver. Production Engineer is accountable for identifying and analyzing ways to prevent waste and inefficiencies within the manufacturing operations.  This includes implementing solutions to reduce waste, improve yield and increase TRS while maximizing productivity, labor and equipment utilization. Production Engineer is responsible for leading MSE / CI projects on each shift, creating and deploying OPL’s and work instruction, ensuring the FMOS system requirements are followed.  This position is also accountable for measurement and management of shift KPI’s in line with PCH Supply Metrics reporting standards. Responsibilities As a Mars Associate you have an obligation to: Provide for a Safe Workplace Role model the application of Mars Health and Safety standards in order to safeguard our associates and the assets we use through the Lead Safety @ Mars Program Provide a safe workplace for all individuals (associates, contractors and visitors) and ensure safe work practices are always followed Coach, inspire and role model the application of Mars safety standards within the site in order to safeguard our associates and the assets we use Provide for Safe Products Role model the application of Mars Food Safety and Quality Standards in order to ensure safe products to our consumers Coach, inspire and role model the application of the Mars Quality Principle Production Engineer Responsibilities FMOS Compile production information and develop Daily FMOS Meeting inputs Mange and follow up on FMOS meeting outputs Managing the FMOS Tag system for the shift Ensure Crew Map deployment within each shift based on the Crew Maps deployed for each Value Stream  by the Site IE Lead Conduct Line Tours with the Shift Manager and review shift performance against established KPI’s Support Shift Manager to organize team meetings Leading CI Projects Deploy and lead the focused improvement projects in the respective shifts with support from Site CI team Represent Shift Manager and/or Shift at Focused Improvement Team Meetings Develop Safety, Quality and Production OPL’s & Work Instructions Developing LOTO and Minor Intervention instructions for each piece of equipment with input from Operators and HSE Develop CCP, OPRP and other quality assurance work instructions and OPL’s with input from Q&FS Conduct line tours to monitor Daily Safety Compliance in the shift and report any unsafe operations and practices to the Shift Manager Assist Shift Manger to investigate any safety incidents that occur during the shift Develop operating instructions and equipment specifications for process equipment Reduce Waste & NQC Compile, analyze and generate reports of floor waste produced on each shift Lead floor waste / NQC reduction initiatives with support from Site CI Team Supply KPI’s and Metrics Reporting System Compiling, analyzing and reporting of all downtime and production reports for each shift Manage the write off / NQC documentation for each shift Problem Solving Gather data from operators through 5 Why process and assist Operators to define problems that occur during the shift Develop problem statements for priority problems and assist Shift Manager to document Problem Solving sessions Follow up and update on actions that are generated in the Problem Solving sessions. Qualifications Minimum 2 years working experience in equivalent position within manufacturing, preferably within multinational manufacturing / FMCG environment Good understanding of safety policies and procedures – WAH, LOTO, WPT & Hot Work Good understanding of HACCP and Food Safety principles Good understanding of Problem Solving methodologies and tools Proficiency in MS Office Strong analytical and critical thinking skills Good written and verbal communication skills Strict attention to detail mindset An energized, optimistic ‘can do’ attitude and strong team player Good command of spoken and written English

Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, or related field Good command of English both spoken and written. Hard working, good attitude to work and willing to learn new things. Interested candidates are invited to apply your application by sending a letter highlighting the references of the your position you are applying to with a complete curriculum vitae including Transcript, present and expected salary, contact number and a recent non-returnable photograph via APPLY NOW ; HR & Administrative Department TTCL Public Company Limited 159/41-44 Sermmit Tower, 28th Floor, Sukhumvit 21(Asoke) Road,North Klongtoey, Wattana, Bangkok 10110 ThailandTel. 02 260 8505 Ext. 1531 ,1542, Fax. 02 260 8525-26

Job_Title: Feed Mill Sales Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายขาย
Job_Description: Main responsibilities of the position Cooperate with national representatives to develop the feed mill equipment market and maintain the daily relationship between customers; Cooperate with national representatives to develop and maintain feed mill equipment  marketing channels, including agents, customer visits, industry consultants, government, and other marketing channels to explore business opportunities Assist national representatives to track feed mill equipment  clue business opportunities, provide customers with project quotations, and track the completion of new signatures Assist in following up on the progress of contract performance, provide service support to customers, and complete the collection of receivables Assist in planning feed mill equipment market activities, such as media publicity, exhibitions, training meetings, observation meetings, etc., to enhance the brand influence of FAMSUN in the region. Job requirements for the position Bachelor’s degree or above, in food engineering/mechanical design and manufacturing and automation/marketing/national trade and other related majors; Have 3-5 years of work experience in the feed/agriculture and animal husbandry industry, understand feed processing technology, and have a certain sales foundation and customer resources. Work experience in the same industry is preferred. Key competency requirements Master feed processing technology/with feed mills' complete production management and operation capabilities. It has the sales capacity for customer resources and feed projects in the agricultural and animal husbandry industry. Job recruitment direction Main experience: There are successful cases of agricultural and animal husbandry industry/feed factory production management/feed project sales Main target companies: related enterprises in the feed/agriculture and animal husbandry industry, including large and medium-sized feed factories or feed engineering enterprise background is preferred Benefit Annual Holiday Insurance

General purpose of the Role: Manage process and product quality for coating to ensure the quality activity are in the control and serve the company policy Key Accountabilities: ●       Response to manufacturing technical inquires in a proactive, timely and effective manner. ●       Coordinate with internal team to develop the products quality and serve with customer requirement. ●       Lead and supervise the internal team in product testing, analysis and drives the improvement on quality related problems from time to times. ●       Manage the quality activity, review and revise quality document, supervise QA technician to handle quality issue and system, provide quality control plans and lead the program to QA technician and production operator, improve inspection aid and equipment. ●       Manage for product, WIP to serve the company quality ●       Develop and implement of quality system and procedure to communicate and work with concern people to meet quality target. Continual improvement concept is the core concept for quality system implementation ●       Non-conforming products control and disposition part in responsible area. ●       Support Quality system audit and improvement. ●      Carry out special assignments /projects as assigned by direct supervisor/Plant manager from time to time. Qualifications: ●       Bachelor’s degree in Industrial or Chemical Engineering or equivalent preferred. ●       2-3 years experienced in QA field, paper/film/packaging industry is advantaged. ●       Command of English language in reading, written and communication. ●       Good communication and leadership skill. ●       Computer literate in basic business software. ●       Knowledge of 6Sixma, Analytical and Statistical Tool is a plus. Key Competencies: ●       Analyze problem/Issues ●       Lead courageously ●       Manage conflict ●       Drive for results

Job_Title: Marketing & Sales Engineer (เครื่องมือแพทย์)/Marketing & Sales Engineer...
Job_Description: รับผิดชอบในการเตรียม และการนำเสนอยอดขายที่ได้รับมอบหมายตามหมวดผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย รับผิดชอบในการทำการศึกษา โปรโมท และขายผลิตภัณฑ์ในพื้นที่ที่ตนรับผิดชอบ ศึกษาและเข้าใจความต้องการของลูกค้า และเตรียมใบเสนอราคา ยื่นซองประมูล หรือเอกสารการขายให้ลูกค้า   และต้องทำการนำเสนอและเจรจากับลูกค้าเช่นกัน ทำการพัฒนาและปรับปรุงความรู้เกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ตนรับผิดชอบ มีความรู้ในเรื่องของการทำงานของเครื่องมือ เพื่อสามารถให้คำปรึกษาแก่ลูกค้าได้เพื่อการขายที่ประสบความสำเร็จ รับผิดชอบในการยื่นซองประมูล  การทำสัญญา การวางแผน และการออกตารางในโปรแกรมการทำงาน สนับสนุน พัฒนา และติดตามการบริการหลังการขาย และทำงานด้วยมิตรภาพที่ดีกับลูกค้า ประสานงานร่วมกับบุคคลอื่นหรือดำเนินการเองได้ในการทำการเสนอ ขนส่ง และรับผิดชอบงานอันเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ตนดูแลหรือแผนกได้ ช่วยเหลือในการจัดสัมมนาเซลล์ การนำเสนอผลงาน การออกนิทรรศการ และอื่นๆ ทำการส่งรายงานให้หัวหน้างานซึ่งเป็นายงานเกี่ยวกับกิจกรรมการขาย รวมไปถึง การคาดการณ์ ออร์เดอร์สูญ ออร์เดอร์ที่มี กิจกรรมการขายของคู่แข่งปัญหาต่างๆ และ แผนงานในอนาคต ติดตามตารางของผลิตภัณฑ์ เอกสาร การติดตั้งและการส่งมอบสินค้าให้ลูกค้าตามที่ตกลง คุณสมบัติ จบปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมชีวการแพทย์ อุปกรณ์การแพทย์ รังสีเทคนิค วิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า อุตสาหการ เคมี หรือสาขาวิทยาศาสตร์อื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถปฏิบัติงานในพื้นที่รับผิดชอบได้ (เพชรบูรณ์/นครสวรรค์/พิจิตร/อุทัยธานี) มีความมุ่งมั่น รักงานขาย มีความรับผิดชอบ ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่

To finding the long term action to prevent the repeat issue. รายงานการประชุมการผลิตประจำวันโดยนำเสนอยอดการผลิตเปรียบเทียบกับแผนการผลิต และมีส่วนร่วมในกิจกรรมปรับปรุงคุณภาพ (เช่น Fast response และ Defect resolution) โดยตอบสนองอย่างยิ่งต่อปัญหาคุณภาพ การดำเนินการแก้ไขและป้องกัน สามารถบอกถึงปัญหา แนวทาง และวิธีการตรวจติดตามเพื่อให้มั่นใจได้ว่ายอดการผลิตเป็นไปตามแผนการผลิตทั้งกะกลางวันและกะกลางคืนReport Production Manager in daily production meeting to discuss the numbers achieved compared to target, participate in quality improvement activity (i.e. Fast response and Defect resolution) highly response to issues & concern with corrective action, preventive action, do some analysis on the spot, and follow up to re-assure the execution is accomplished as plan for both day shift and night shift. ควบคุมให้ทีมปฏิบัติตาม WI และ Routing ให้สอดคล้องตามแผนการผลิตและมาตรฐานการผลิตEnsure manufacturing processes such as WI and Routing to align with production plan and procedures to maintain high standards of manufacturing operations. มีส่วนร่วมรับผิดชอบใน D-Phase ส่งผ่านความรู้ใหม่จาก Preproduction สู่ฝ่ายผลิต ดำเนินการตรวจยืนยันความถูกต้องของกระบวนการ เช่น Routing, STD time และเงื่อนไขของกระบวนการผลิตต่าง ๆ เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าข้อมูลที่ใช้ในการวางแผนผลิต มีความถูกต้อง ตรงกัน รวมถึงดำเนินการตามขั้นตอนต่าง ๆ ในการรักษามาตรฐานการผลิตในระดับสูงD-phase response and transfer new knowledges from Preproduction to mass production phase. Job_Title: 【2024 GEM Program】 QA Engineer/Sr. Engineer [Chinese Speaking] (Bangpoo)
Job_Description: Like and follow our career page on Facebook: Delta Careers Thailand (www.facebook.com/deltaelectronicscareers) About 【GEM Program】: Delta Global Elite Mingle program (GEM) welcomes professionals to join Delta Family from all over the world. After completing the assessments, the individual will be relocated to designated Delta global regions in Thailand. Working Location: Bangpoo, Samut Prakarn, Thailand Your main role is to: Implementing quality control plans Assisting in maintaining and adjusting quality inspection standards Assisting in handling quality abnormalities and executing tracking of countermeasures Assisting in training and coaching new engineers Customer communication and account management Support reports to customer and managements Interface between customer and production Attend and lead customer teleconference Assisting project planning and coaching execution Who are we looking for? Bachelor of Electronics/Electrical Engineering (EE), Mechanical Engineer, or related fields At least 5-10 years' experiences in Quality Able to communicate in Chinese and English Experience of Automotive product for Automotive Plant IATF16949, PPAP qualification IATF/VDA6.3 certificate will be a plus Measurement System Analysis (MSA) Gauge Repeatability & Reproducibility (GRR) QA in background both process and product analysis will be advantaged English conversation skill to other regions in subject of assurance / claim / complaint Failure analysis background on Electric Charger is advantage Automotive background in assurance / process investigation / 8D report / Problem solving in short time and accurate Electronic / Power Electric in background or graduated in electronic filed Able to work very hard / in high pressure / Leadership skill in Conf. call with customer Able to work with production to resolve quality problems / Leading to improve as commitment Top reasons for joining us? Opportunity to join a diverse and international company where can help create a greener more intelligence-driven future. A number of programs each year to support you in your career journey and our program offering continues to grow annually. Balance life as we have 5-day work week policy We offer comprehensive medical insurance coverage for you and your family. Yearly bonus and quarterly incentive to reward your achievements. We provide a free bus and van shuttle service to many locations around the company. For more details about Delta Electronics please visit  www.deltathailand.com

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Daily Activities: Performs verification, evaluation and/or study of raw material issues and/or potential problem both in the incoming inspection and in the in-process. Reports and updates all issues to all concerned person at DMTH, DM subsidiaries and to direct supplier - both in DMTH data base and company’s intranet, and other DMTH platform. Assists in all facets of the quality program including: root cause investigation, training, statistical process control, control of non-conforming materials, documentation control, and control of quality records. S upplier Control Conducts supplier visits and audits of any local and/or international supplier as per defined plan and schedule, and when the need to visit the supplier arises. This includes Product audit, System audit, Quality meeting, New product support, Initial facility on-site assessment, and other on-site support per assignment. Cooperate across functions to solve any issue as assigned. Review/conduct supplier assessment annually or as required Establish and implement the supplier development programs with clear strategy and business plan alignment. Engage in cross-functional team working activities. New product incoming control Create/update Visual inspection/ Work Instruction according to Datamars procedure Support NPI team for FMEA and Control plan process Monitor and feedback supplier quality Make and get commitment regarding the Supplier Quality Agreement with the supplier Non-conforming and Corrective/ Preventive action Manage QIR process (Supplier failure) according to Datamars procedure Analyze and feedback the primary cause of non-conformance to supplier Coordinate with supplier and concerned department to prevent the non-conformance reoccurrence Track and drive NCR closure according to aging requirement Propose the preventive and corrective actions and ensure that the corrective and preventive actions are effective Update visual inspection and Supplier Quality Agreement to prevent re-occurrence. Audits Supplier audits and/or supplier questionnaires. Perform audits according to ISO/Datamars standards and customer requirements Weekly Report and other report submission Summarize and report the SQE activities in a weekly basis and as per request. Support Lean, Safety & 5S activities. Support in additional tasks when required. REQUIREMENTS BSc /B.Eng or MSc for Electronics/Mechanical/Industrial or Related field. Good communication of English written and spoken Experience for Supplier Quality Engineering and/or Quality engineer is preferred. Skill in PCB (review and verify) is a advancetage At least 2 years of experience in electronics manufacturing Good a team player and Good decision making Good MS-office (Word/Excel/Power point) Good knowledge for ISO9001 and ISO14001 system

Job_Title: Lighting Engineer/วิศวกรแสงสว่าง
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ เรียนรู้สินค้าและนำเสนอต่อทีมขายอย่างเหมาะสมตามความต้องการของลูกค้า ออกแบบแสงสว่างเบื้องต้น ให้คำแนะนำลูกค้าในการ ติดตั้ง เดินสาย และอื่นๆ ตรวจสอบและแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับสินค้า ทั้งในและนอกสถานที่ สนับสนุนทีมขายในด้านเทคนิค และเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้อง เรียนรู้สินค้าและเทคโนโลยีใหม่ งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติหลัก มีความรู้งานไฟฟ้า อิเลคโทรนิคอ่านแบบไฟฟ้าเป็น สามารถทำงานกลางคืนได้ในกรณีจำเป็น สามารถใช้งานเบื้องต้นสำหรับโปรแกรมที่เกี่ยวข้อง (Microsoft Office,AutoCAD, Dialux, etc.) คุณสมบัติเพิ่มเติม มีประสบการณ์งานไฟฟ้า อิเลคโทรนิค 1 ปี ขึ้นไป มียานพาหนะส่วนตัว จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สื่อสารด้วยภาษาอังกฤษได้ Location: อาคารศุภาลัย แกรนด์ทาวเวอร์ พระราม 3 Working Hour: เวลาทำงานปกติ 09.00- 18.00

Company: Frasers Property Management Services (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
Job_Description: Responsibilities: Design Management and project management for MEP Design in One Bangkok including 5 towers during design and construction stage by coordinating with Project Manager, consultants, internal team. Control cost and timeline Review all MEP design matters related to Common Infrastructure, Residential, and Hotel. Manage and Coordinate with consultants and working together with One Bangkok team during design and construction stage. Coordinate with Business development team to ensure that the design meet requirement Discuss with related parties to support information to authority/ permission process Control and management response to request for information (RFI) Review drawing and issue change request (CMR) during construction Check all technical drawing, coordinate with construction team to solve problem on site Review drawing and assess value engineering Review document through Unifier System to review and response Any ad-hoc task related to MEP design during design and construction stage Qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical and Plumbing (MEP) 10-20 years of work experience in related business Management Skills, result oriented, meet deadline, cost & quality Proficiency in computer skills, Powerpoint, Autocad, Word, Excel Good command in English both in spoken and written

Process Safety Establishes reviews and programs to ensure the quality of the HSE&S risk management processes. Establishes personnel and reporting structures to ensure sufficient PSM capability at or above site level. Machine Safety Applies extensive knowledge of machine safety during the scoping and design of new equipment to reduce operational risk. Networks outside the facility to leverage machine guarding design and machine safety best practices. Technical Expertise Challenges status-quo and leads deployment of advanced manufacturing technologies to continuously improves production process efficiency. Monitors the process performance through metrics such as RFT, MME, Waste Indices and act as required to correct adverse trends, performing process investigations. Develops plans to improve the above performance through focused improvement activities (in conjunction with the operations group) along with capital projects. Fully aware of latest trends in the industry and builds the case for upgrading production equipment and implementing state-of-the-art technologies. Production process Leads cross-functional collaboration to reduce product complexities to drive process efficiency. Leverages on best practices through benchmarking and cross-referencing with other sites and actively promotes networking. We are looking for candidates with following experiences: Bachelor’s degree in chemical engineering, mechanical engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in the design, implementation, and optimization of manufacturing process within the manufacturing industry. Experience in liquid paints and coatings industry. Familiarity with liquid and powder handling, dispersion, bead milling, mixing, tinting, packing etc. is desirable. Experience in capacity modelling, manufacturing scale up, new product introduction and project management. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve complex automation-related issues. Knowledge of data science and analyzing data. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, able to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and vendors. Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently and in a team-oriented environment. Willingness to stay updated on the latest advancements in automation and manufacturing technologies. Interested applicants are invited to Apply Now  with full resume indicating qualifications and experience, transcript, expected salary and recent photo. Job_Title: Production Engineer - Carbon Neutral Supervisor/Manager | Salary Up to 50k |...
Job_Description: Work Location: Nearby BTS Sri Iam Work Hour: 8.00 - 17.00 (work some saturdays; AVG 15 sat/year) JOB REQUIREMENTS -Prefer bachelor's degree in engineering or other related field. -Must have at least 3 years of work experience in production control who can support ' carbon neutral activities'. -Intermediate level of English (If have TOEIC Score more than 600 or higher is an advantage. -Able to work on some Saturdays (15 Saturdays/year, depends on company's calendar). JOB DESCRIPTION 1. Promote and support ' carbon neutral activities ' at each production site in ASEAN region. 2. Set policy, target and create roadmap for the achievement of carbon neutrality in ASEAN. 3. Information gathering such as carbon neutrality related laws & regulations, subsidies etc. 4. Promote the studied activities at each production site. 5. Responsible for human resources development on carbon neutrality and CO2 reduction . 6. Create annual budget and monitor plan and activity.

MISSION: Provides the equipment needed to achieve the project objectives at the best performance / cost ratio, using the standards. Lead the pre-study to define the most effective solutions. Manage the design or integration by respecting the best practices of its business (internal, external standards, quality system, capitalization, archiving) in collaboration with all the relevant professions. Pilot the realization, installation and commissioning. QUALIFICATIONS: Graduated Bachelor's Degree or Master's Degree in Automation/Control/Electrical Engineering or related fields. Experience 3-5 years in the field of Automation Design/Project, new graduates are welcome. Native speaker of Thai with good English communication Preferable skills: SIEMENS, Allen Bradley Candidate needs to pass the automation test on the selection day *Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Job Responsibilities: Be responsible for preparation of chassis component development and validation management. Be responsible for chassis parts design quality and after-sales problem solving. Be responsible for chassis parts development technical documentation. Be responsible for the release and change management of 2D3D data of chassis parts. Be responsible for solving the quality problems of chassis parts on site and suppliers. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or above; Be familiar with English terms of chassis, be able to communicate in spoken English and understand the technical requirements of 2D drawings; Be familiar with CAE and KC test and other related analysis tools and verification system test; The driving skills have reached the rating of mainstream automobile enterprises or the rating of test sites; Have solid theoretical knowledge of chassis systems, familiar with the structure of the chassis system, master the chassis system and the performance indicators of the components; More than 7 years management experience in putting chassis parts into production.

Job Purpose This role will handle RM resourcing which including all relate RM and associate with printing and color development. This role needs to work very close with AU R&D and supplier partner to working on RM resourcing development to meeting our quality standard, follow up status, provide problem solve solution. Bullet Primary Responsibilities/Accountabilities Understanding resourcing process and business strategy, able to give briefing RM details to supplier/vendor. Tracking status of RM resourcing development with supplier, provide feedback to boarder team about the progress for R&D RM part. Able to provide Technical advice and support to vendor/supplier, HAA merchandising team. Work directly with RM AU & supplier to problem solve technical issues Arrange RM testing, and maintenance the testing result tracker. Prepare RM specification and upload & update it into PLM Complete RM Sustainability steps eg. traceability, certifications, process flows RMs headers for approval and briefing Maintenance RM resourcing VMB and tracker. Arrange RM payment to supplier if there is cost occurred Train new suppliers in HAA RM processes Order and Maintenance of the Fabric Library as required Successfully maintain product quality and consistency during transition to new supplier/vendor Support business strategy manufacturing and sourcing direction Support the AU RM developer in troubleshooting any Raw Material/ Technical issues. Education & Qualifications Degree or Diploma in textile technology Experience in textile and fashion industry Experience in developing and sourcing fabrics and trims. Experience in Print and color development. Knowledge of clothing manufacture Experience communicating with customer or team in English Minimum 3-4 years relevant work experience Computer skills: word and excel PLM systems Excellent organizational and communication skills Excellent time management skills English skills – written and verbal

Job_Title: ผู้จัดการฝ่ายวิศวกรรม
Job_Description: คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร วุฒิ ปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป สาขา วิศวกรรมเครื่องกล วิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า มีความรู้ความสามารถในงานด้านเครื่องกล, ไฟฟ้า และระบบการบริหารจัดการ สามารถ อ่าน เขียน พูด ภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี มีความรู้เรื่อง PLC, Boiler, Machine Breakdown Analysis มีประสบการณ์ 5 ปี ขึ้นไป มีพื้นฐานการผลิตไม้บอร์ด MDF เคยผ่านงานด้านการบริหารงานโรงงานอุตสาหกรรม หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ คอยรายงานผลการทำงานของฝ่ายให้ผู้จัดการโรงงานทุกๆสัปดาห์ คอยดูแลสอดส่องผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาให้อยู่ในกฎระเบียบขององค์กร วางแผนงานการซ่อมเครื่องจักรในช่วง Shut Dow หรือ Break Down รายงานความเคลื่อนไหวการทำงานของทุกๆแผนกภายใต้ผู้บังคับบัญชาให้เจ้าขององค์กรได้รับทราบ ให้พนักงานอยู่ในกฎระเบียบองค์กรเพื่อความเป็นระเบียบเรียบร้อย ให้ผู้บังคับบัญชาสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาเครื่องจักรในช่วงเวลา Shut Down หรือ Break Down ได้สำเร็จลุล่วงไปได้ด้วยดี และใช้เวลาให้ได้น้อยที่สุด

Job_Title: ESG Technical and Business Development Executive
Job_Description: Main Responsibilities: Be Technical leader in SGS ESG business development by working with Sales and Marketing Team including plan for market approach, supporting technical knowledge/material for sales activities, seminar/webinar conducting and presentation/technical advice to those marketing and sale function where require Prepare of technical resources and support on SGS ESG business growth including personal development plan and documentation Corporate between internal and external partners to seek for ESG business opportunities and enhance growth. This would be based on strategic partnership planed with product/certification manager Develop Training program / Consultant program relating to ESG market needs As verifier/assurer/auditor, ensure that all necessary documents of audit package are correctly carried out as per SGS-KN procedures and submit on time Training and develop of new verifiers/assurers/auditors Plan, prepare and carry out assigned audit/verification as assigned in accordance with relevant GSPs and GPPs Complete all relevant documents for verifier/assurer/auditor qualification Ensure that all necessary documents of audit/verification package are correctly carried out as per SGS-KN procedures. Respond to client enquiries on SGS-KN certification/training products. Conduct all the necessary follow-up with clients to ensure clients clearly understand all of the requirements of the auditing/verification process and the status of their contract Professional manner/act in accordance with the non-disclosure agreement and SGS Codes of Integrity. Strictly conduct all assessment/assurance work in accordance with SGS-KN Global and Thailand procedures Report any customer complaints, problems and/or system deficiencies to Managers Conduct internal audits of the SGS-KN where required and assigned Respond to client enquiries on all technical matters regarding to SGS-KN certification/verification/training products. Being trainer of training courses per assignment Qualify as a Lead auditor/verifier/assurer in more than one standard and conduct integrated audit where required as per KN guidance and instructing of SSC Product Manager Initiative in identifying work to be done, execute and completion of the project or assigned tasks timely Respond the queries from pack rejection timely manner Qualifications: Bachelor degree or above in Financial, Engineering, Science or related fields Minimum of 3 years work experience in ESG verification/consultant/certification business Experience as ESG verifier/assurer in standards such as GRI, AA1000, etc. would be benefits Strong leadership and accept challenge for new market development Initiative and creative for new prospects Good reading, writing and speaking in English and some other alternative languages Good communication skill and Professional manner Logical approach to problem solving for the audit team and back-office staffs Able to work/travel in upcountry and oversea Working Location: Head Office, Nanglinchee Road At SGS, we offer stability, opportunities for growth and the chance to make a difference. Job_Title: Material Planner (1 year contract based Bangpu plant Samutprakarn)
Job_Description: What you will do Receive order from customers, place order and send to factories. Coordinate with other departments concerning customers’ requirement and specifications based on Order Management function. Be Key in sales order and information related to sales and response for CCMP and  E-mail correspondent FG management from Order Forecast till arrived Customers. Day-to-Day problem solving of material unavailability and coordinate with concern department to reach Supply Chain objective Maintain, Elaborate, Publish, Review production plan to align with customer demand and manufacturing efficiency To maintain and exceed department and factory key performance ,Expected contributions of the position to the results of the organization) (KPI) To achieve target of OTDM/OTDS/OTDC2, DIN of Finished Goods FG    Optimize level of inventory and minimize Excess stock Organize FG DIN as target ‘s settled and control inventory level to be at the optimum as target and appropriate FG Inventory and set FG Inventory Strategies to be  appropriate with Factory and Customer and also update FG stock status data according to formal adjustment information, Prepare data reports to update information on daily, weekly and monthly basis. Ensure the product quantity from production line to finished goods out going and delivery on time Coordinate with concerned department when problem of production plan is occurs. Analyzes the customer demand against the material delivery schedule to propose the production start date. Co-ordinates with related function who concerned new Project to get achieve as Project timeframe plan. Be Key in sales order and information related to sales and response for CCMP and  E-mail correspondent Coordinate and cooperate with Sales team and Logistics to ensure effective supply process and Logistic offer agreement. Cooperate with Accounting and Sales teams for inventory checking. Maintaining relationships with existing clients and also expanding the client base Other related jobs as assigned Experience and skills we are looking for: Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, Statistic, Industrial or related filed Fresh Graduates are Welcome Good command in English, Leadership skill, Problem solving skill and Team player Able to operate in PC (Microsoft Work, Excel, PowerPoint and others)

Job_Title: Chief Service Engineer (Pattaya Branch)/หัวหน้าวิศวกรบริการ (สาขาพัทยา)
Company: Sports Engineering And Recreation Asia Ltd.
Job_Description: Job Responsibilities / ความรับผิดชอบ ดูแลบริการงานติดตั้งเครื่องและงานซ่อมเครื่องออกกำลังกายหลังการขาย(Service Engineer) ดูแลบริการงานติดตั้งเครื่องและงานซ่อมเครื่องออกกำลังกายหลังการขาย รับผิดชอบหัวหน้าทีมช่างและดูแลทีมงานช่างในเรื่องของเทคนิค การซ่อมและช่วยแก้ไขปัญหางานต่างๆให้กับทีมงาน สามารถแนะนำการใช้งานเครื่องและให้คำแนะนำการดูแลรักษาเครื่องหรือการใช้เครื่องเบื้องต้นให้กับลูกค้าได้ จัดทำรายงานหลังเข้าบริการให้แก่ลูกค้า ติดตามงานซ่อมและการแก้ไขปัญหาเครื่องให้กับลูกค้าจนกระทั้งลูกค้าสามารถใช้งานเครื่องได้ตามปกติ ทำความเข้าใจในสินค้า มีความเชียวชาญในการอ่านคู่มือภาษาอังกฤษและ การดูคู่มือ bill of material ได้ Qualification/คุณสมบัติ วุฒิปริญญาตรีวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ด้านไฟ้ฟ้า มีประสบการณ์งานซ่อมหรืองานบริการลูกค้าอย่างน้อย 3 -5 ปีขึ้นไป สามารถออกไปบริการลูกค้านอกบริษัทได้ทุกวันหรือตามตารางงานที่วางแผนไว้ สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษได้เบื้องต้น มีความเป็นผู้นำสูง สามารถรับผิดชอบงานบริการหลังการขาย โดยเป็นภาพลักษณ์ให้แก่บริษัทได้ ชอบออกกำลังกายหรือมีประสบการ์ณใช้อุปกรณ์การออกกำลังกายจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีรถยนต์ของตนเอง ทำงานประจำที่สาขาพัทยา ถ.ชัยพฤกษ์ ต.หนองปรือ อ.บางละมุง จ.ชลบุรี Please submit your resume stating your present and expected salary and recent photo to below email. Khun Tippaklaw (HR Manager) Sports Engineering And Recreation Asia Ltd. (SEARA) 164 Soi Soonvijai 14, Bangkapi, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310 Tel :0-2185-1920-4 Company website : http://www.searasports.com [link removed]

MAIN DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: As Industrial Digitization Developer, you will be a part of the Industrial Digitization team to play a vital role in the digital transformation initiatives within Dextra’s industrial operations and services. The Digitization Developer will be responsible for adoption of digital solutions to our customers and plants and ensuring the seamless integration of technology into our industrial environment. Key Responsibilities: Help Desk Monitoring and Incident/Change Resolution: Monitor, track, and manage the Help Desk for incidents and changes related to key projects based on the TITL v4 system. Coordinate resolution efforts, ensuring timely and effective responses to industrial digitization issues. Team and Collaboration: Collaborate with various departments within Dextra to ensure a cohesive and integrated approach to digital solutions. Collaborate with the IT infrastructure team on connectivity topics to ensure a robust and secure digital environment. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate digital solutions into industrial operations. Liaise regularly with representatives of plant operations, Engineering and ITS to discuss the progress on digitization projects. Standardization and Harmonization: Harmonized and standardized the industrial platform. Implement digital solution optimize operational efficiency. Implementation of technology, including industrial IoT and data analytics, to digitize industrial operations. Proactively identify opportunities for digital innovation and solutions in industrial processes. Integration of Digital Solutions: Collaborate with team to implement innovative digital solutions that align with business objectives. Exploring new industrial platform/technology and validating the system. Ensure adherence to IT policies, procedures, and best practices to maintain a secure and compliant technology environment. QUALIFICATIONS REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree in industrial, computer engineering or related field. Minimum 1-3 years of experience in industrial digitization or related field. Experience in software developer field is a plus. Experience in Industrial IoT is a plus. Basic knowledge in industrial protocol is a plus. Knowledge of 2D and 3D CAD is a plus. Preferably SolidWorks. Knowledge in SQL database is a plus. Good communication in English Experience in programing languages such as C, C++, C# etc. Basic knowledge in cloud platform. Microsoft office tools Good knowledge of the industrial workflow. Ability to adapt to evolving technologies and methodologies. Self-initiative, enthusiasm

Work Location: Chonburi province (Hemaraj Eastern Seaboard Industrial Estate - Map: https://goo.gl/maps/1aAndse411fTru7p8) Job responsibilities; Lead all production and operational activities, supervising staff, organizing and monitoring work flow and ensuring company standards of efficiency and quality. Planning and coordinating work schedules, assignments and production processes to meet production goals. Manage plant manufacturing assets, driving improvement in costs, quality and productivity. Provide leadership for the successful in operation & manufacturing. Ensure & manage production to achieve key performance in yield ratio, productivity (kg/man-hrs). Provide estimated and actual production data (process flows, cycle times, capacity, etc.) Effectiveness long-term production plan to support multi – department. Contributes to successful product and volume reallocation. Qualifications; Minimum bachelor's degree in Engineering or related fields. At least 3 years of experience in Production function with related industry. (Experience in Chemical plant is an advantage) Knowledge of production management. Knowledge of quality management systems. Knowledge of SAP systems. Strong English verbal and written communication skills. Excellent computer skills, including proficiency in Microsoft Office. Able to work in Shift Rotation. Interested applicants are invited to Apply Now with full resume indicating qualifications and experience, transcript, expected salary and recent photo.
