Job_Title: Construction Site Manager/ผู้จัดการสถานที่ก่อสร้าง
Job_Description: Language Skills : Proficient in both Chinese and English Preferred Experience : Previous experience working in a Chinese company Job Responsibilities: Required Skills: You must know about mechanical and electrical engineering, including cleanroom projects, HVAC, and more. Project Planning and Coordination: Create plans to make sure construction finishes on time. Coordinate with different engineering departments and contractors to keep the project running smoothly. Resource Management: Manage the people, materials, and equipment needed for the project. Make sure there are enough resources to meet project needs. Quality Control: Watch over the construction process to make sure the quality meets the right standards. Create and follow quality control plans. Safety Management: Lead safety measures to keep the construction site safe. Make safety rules, oversee safety training for workers and contractors, and follow safety laws. Budget Management: Make and watch over the project's budget to stay within it. Control costs and manage expenses. Progress Monitoring: Keep an eye on the project's progress. Find and solve delays or problems to finish the project on time. Communication and Reporting: Talk with the project team, clients, and bosses. Make regular reports to show how the project is going and report issues to the bosses. Contractor and Supplier Management: Work well with contractors and suppliers. Watch their work and make sure they follow contracts and quality rules. Technical Support: Help with technical problems and solutions for engineering challenges. Document Management: Keep records and papers related to the project, like drawings, contracts, and other important documents.

Job_Title: Equipment Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายอุปกรณ์
Job_Description: - The Equipment Manager is responsible for assisting in the equipment maintenance and repair operations for the Maintenance department. - Assists the Production Manager in appropriate preventative and curative maintenance required for all factory equipment maintenance operations. - Completes daily servicerecords. - Ensures tha theequipment maintenance and appropriate areas are kept clean,organized,andprovidea safe working environment for staffmembers. - Must be thoroughly trainedin the procedures of each task before performing such tasks. - Must follow the guidelines in the factory Maintenance Operations Manual for each specific task. - Required to wear personal protective clothing and/or use protective equipment to comply with established safety operatingstandards. - Responsible for the detailed activities of the electrical department and engineering. - Review all electrical drawings, layouts, etc. - Implementation of various improvement projects, including power optimization and savings schemes.

Job Summary The I&C/EE Engineer’s role on an HRSG project team is to support the design of the overall process, through development of control documents such as P&IDs, Lists, and Control Philosophy, design of electrical and instrument cabling, and purchase of equipment and components required to operate the HRSG.  The Engineer will interface with other disciplines within the project team and customers to deliver a quality product. Essential Duties Maintains P&IDs and Process Flow diagrams Develops and maintains Line, Terminal Point, Valve, Instrument, Equipment, and I/O lists Designs point-to-point wiring diagrams, control and power distribution panel drawings, cable tray and conduit layouts, pull cards, single line diagrams, and interconnect drawings as needed per applicable code and contract requirements. Designs industrial power & instrument cabling routing and termination, low voltage power distribution, lighting/receptacle, lightning protection, and heat tracing. Trains and mentors other Product Engineers in electrical and instrument design. Develops and maintains – Electrical and instrument design tools. Develops specifications to purchase equipment, performs bid evaluation, and review vendor drawings. Develop and maintains Control and Operation Philosophy and Logic Diagrams Sizes and specifies for purchase engineered equipment such as deaerators, dampers, diverter damper, heat exchangers, sampling and dosing systems, aircraft warning lights, and hoists. Responsible for sizing, selecting, and specifying equipment, components, and instrumentation to support the HRSG and overall plant operation including valves and Motor/Pneumatic operator and 3PH motor. Miscellaneous calculations – line size, drain time, restriction orifices, piping insulation requirements Updates project schedules and attends project and design review meeting. Develops and maintains O&M manuals. Supports continuous improvement initiatives and maintains assigned company and departmental standards Participate and support company strategic initiatives and process improvements Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Good written and verbal communication skills 5 years’ experience in instruments and controls or electrical engineering preferred.

Job_Title: Factory Leader/หัวหน้าฝ่ายโรงงาน
Job_Description: คุณสมบัติ มีประสบการณ์ในตำแหน่งหัวหน้าฝ่ายผลิต 2 ปีขึ้นไป วุฒิการศึกษา ปวส.ขึ้นไป หรือปริญาตรี การจัดการโรงงาน/อุตสาหการ/สาขาช่างต่าง ๆ (ทุกสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง) มีใบขับขี่ส่วนบุคคล สามารถขับรถยนต์เกียร์ธรรมดาได้ สามารถยืดหยุ่นเวลางานและทำงานล่วงเวลาได้ สามารถใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์ Microsoft Office และ E-mail ได้ดี หากเคยใช้ระบบ ERP จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถทำงานเกี่ยวกับกากอุตสาหกรรมและคัดแยกกากอุตสาหกรรมได้ มีความเป็นผู้นำ กล้าตัดสินใจ สามารถควบคุมผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาได้ มีความรับผิดชอบและสามารถติดต่อประสานงานและเจรจาต่อรองได้ หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ ควบคุมงานคัดแยก กากอุตสาหกรรมอันตรายและไม่อันตราย ที่เข้าโรงงาน 105/106 ทำการคัดแยก-ทำลาย ตามวิธีที่กำจัด จัดทำใบน้ำหนัก หนัก-เบา ของกากอุตสาหกรรมที่เข้าโรงงาน จัดทำบันทึกน้ำหนักงานคัดแยก / น้ำหนักของที่ต้องส่งกำจัด ควบคุมการปฏิบัติงานให้แล้วเสร็จตามกำหนดที่ระบุไว้ในตั๋วต้นทุน แจ้งแผนส่งกากอุตสาหกรรมไปกำจัดและขายกากอุตสาหกรรมกับ Supplier ต่าง ๆ ดูแลความเรียบร้อยของโรงงาน ดูแลสต๊อกของที่ต้อง Support ลูกค้า เช่น ถัง 200 ลิตร /BigBag/และอื่น ๆ ปฏิบัติตามนโยบายคุณภาพและสิ่งแวดล้อมของบริษัทฯ หน้าที่อื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : ประจำโรงงานแพรกษาซอย 10/2 สมุทรปราการ เวลาปฏิบัติงาน : จันทร์ - เสาร์ เวลา 08.00-17.00 น. (หยุดอาทิตย์)

Job_Title: QC Engineer Store Team Leader/วิศวกรโยธา
Company: Central Retail Corporation Ltd. (Central Hardline Group)
Job_Description: Role & Responsibility วางแผนการทำงาน กำกับดูแล ตรวจสอบ ควบคุมคุณภาพหน้างานรวมทั้งความถูกต้องในการทำงานของทีมติดตั้งให้เป็นไปตามแผนที่กำหนด รวมถึงการพัฒนาทักษะฝีมือทีมงาน ติดตั้ง ให้มีคุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพในการแข่งขันในตลาดได้ อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ มียอดผู้เข้ามาใช้บริการเพิ่มขึ้นตามเป้าหมายที่กำหนดในแต่ละปี ทั้งในส่วนงานที่เป็นติดตั้งและงานปรับปรุงอาคาร ส่งเสริมภาพลักษณ์ที่ดีให้กับองค์กรหรือแบรนด์ vFIX หน้าที่รับผิดชอบหลัก 1) สำรวจและส่งผลสำรวจ ตรวจสอบความถูกต้องแบบ พร้อมทำใบเสนอราคา 2) วางแผนงานและกำหนดรูปแบบหน้างานให้ถูกต้องตามหลักวิศวกรรมและวิชาการ และควบคุมงานให้เป็นไปตามแผนงานที่วางไว้ 3) เข้าเปิดงานการติดตั้งงาน Renovate ติดตามความคืบหน้า ตรวจสอบความถูกต้องตามหลักวิศวกรรมประสานงานลูกค้าพร้อมทั้งชี้แจงถึงขอบข่ายการทำงาน 4) ตรวจสอบแก้ไขปัญหาหน้างานหรือข้อร้องเรียนในงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายหรือพื้นที่รับผิดชอบ เข้าประสานงานลูกค้าและแก้ไขปัญหาอย่างทันท่วงที พร้อมทั้งรายงานปัญหาตามลำดับขั้นบริหาร 5) สรุป OH Renovate (Tracking2) และ ตารางสรุปยอดงานสำรวจ QT QC (Tracking1) Report ในส่วนงานที่รับผิดชอบ หรือเอกสารอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อเพิ่มหรือส่งเสริมประสิทธิภาพการทำงานและการขายงานติดตั้ง งานปรับปรุงพื้นที่ Qualifications : 1.) ปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมศาสตร์/ครุศาสตร์บันฑิต ทางด้านโยธา, ก่อสร้าง หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง 2.) ประสบการณ์ทำงานอย่างน้อย 2-3 ปี ผ่านการควบคุมงานควบคุมงานการก่อสร้าง งานโยธาสถาปัตย์ ตกแต่ง งานระบบไฟฟ้า ประปา สุขาภิบาล, งานตรวจสอบคุณภาพบ้านก่อนส่งมอบลูกค้า, สามารถคำนวณหาปริมาณวัสดุ, คำนวณ โครงสร้างคอนกรีตเสริมเหล็ก โครงสร้างเหล็ก 3.) สามารถใช้โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์พื้นฐาน MS office, Auto cad เป็นต้น 4.) สามารถขับขี่รถยนต์หรือจักรยานยนต์ พร้อมใบขับขี่ส่วนบุคคล 5.) ได้รับใบอนุญาตประกอบวิชาชีวิศวกรรมควบคุม จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ *** พื้นที่ในความรับผิดชอบกรุงเทพฯและปริมณฑล (สามารถปรับเปลี่ยนพื้นที่รับผิดชอบได้ตามความเหมาะสม)*** **ทำงานหยุดเดือนละ 6 วัน (อาจไม่ได้หยุดตรงกับเสาร์-อาทิตย์) Zone ที่รับผิดชอบ ( แยกกันตามโซน ) 1.บางบัวทอง บางกรวย บางใหญ่ ปทุมธานี นนทบุรี 2. อ้อมน้อย มหาชัย บางขุนเทียน บางบอน จอมทอง พระประแดง 3. บางนา บางพลี ประเวศ อ่อนนุช ลาดกระบัง สำโรง ปากน้ำ บางปู

Job_Title: Safety Health & Environment Manager / EHS Manager...
Job_Description: Job Highlights Environmental, Occupational Health and Safety 7+ years’ Experience working in Manufacturing companies (Group Company) Background in the Tire or Rubber industry or relate field Job Description SHE Manager, you will be responsible for creating, enforcing, and overseeing Environmental Health and Safety strategies, policies, and procedures to enhance workplace conditions and ensure governmental compliance and international standard. Responsibilities: Formulate strategies and procedures for Environmental Health and Safety (EHS) to enhance the working environment and uphold workplace safety and government compliance and International Standard. Develop a comprehensive Occupational Health and Safety plan for all relevant personnel to promote safe work practices and environmentally friendly behaviors. Propose solutions for health and safety challenges affecting company personnel and property. Prepare and communicate new or updated information and legislation related to Safety, Health, and Environment to the management. Investigate, analyze, and report incidents/accidents within the plant in accordance with corporate policies. Ensure that the Safety Committee fulfills its legal obligations and required activities. Provide consultancy to colleagues to maintain or enhance working conditions, promoting safe work habits among all employees. Develop EHS activities to raise employee awareness. Ensure compliance with internal and external safety, health, and environmental instructions, rules, and regulations. Take prompt remedial action and conduct accurate investigations and reporting for all accidents and incidents. Manage all chemicals and production waste in a safe and environmentally friendly manner. Prepare and manage budgets for EHS expenses of the group of companies. Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Occupational Health and Safety or a related field. 7+ years of direct experience in Safety, Health and Security Manager in manufacturing industry or related field. Knowledge Thai Safety Law regulation, ISO 45001:2018 & ISO 14001:2015, TLS, Good command in English language (listening, speaking, reading, writing) Computer skill – MS Office i.e. Word, Excel, PowerPoint Good presentation and excellent organizational, leadership and motivational skills Deep understanding of legal health and safety guidelines Strong end-to-end business knowledge of poultry or similar businesses preferred Strong analytical skill, process-oriented mindset Excellent problem solving, communication, and organizational influence skills, and experience working in cross-functional teams. Extensive background in the Tire or Rubber industry is preferable.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Management Manage the effective achievement of HSSE department objectives through leadership of the HSSE department. This includes setting individual objectives, managing performance, developing and motivating staff, providing formal and informal feedback, and conducting appraisals. The goal is to maximize the performance of both subordinates and the HSSE department. Be a part of the company's Leadership team to support the BU Country Manager in creating a sustainable HSSE culture. This involves encouraging the reporting and investigation of HSSE issues in an open manner, with the aim of achieving the best performance for the organization. HSSE & AI Strategies, Plans, Programs and Budget Develop the company HSSE objectives, plans and programs in line with the corporate vision in order to provide guidance on the way forward for HSSE. Contribute to and support the development of the Corporate HSSE strategic plan and policies taking into account business requirements and aligned with international best practice and applicable legislation Ensure implementation of corporate HSSE strategies and policies Ensure implementation of HSSE plans at all company facilities Direct the preparation and consolidation of the HSSE function budgets to ensure timely, quality and fit for purpose delivery of plans and programs. Manage and monitor department budget and actual expenses. HSSE Operations Develop an operational HSSE Management System in order to ensure that all company and contractor staff implement Key Processes and Procedures and standard operating procedures in line with the management system Ensure Safe System Of Work (SSOW) is implemented and maintained Develop and execute an Emergency Response Plans (ERPs) in line with best practice and international standards Develop an HSSE internal and external audit plan for each division in order to ensure that corporate HSSE standards, KPPs and SOPs are implemented and recommendations reviewed to pursue policies of continuous improvement Occupational Health and Safety Management Ensure advanced Safety/Risk Management measures and precautions are implemented within the organization in accord with internal safety standards Ensure compliance with all local and international regulations and legislation Advise management on any aspect of a safety and occupational health/risk management program Formulate and provide recommendations to management on hazard control and abatement Recommend to management safety program changes and modifications to existing safety and occupational health programs Conduct surveillance of employees both company and contractors through regular health checks to ensure compliance with all health regulations Risk Management Assess the risks associated with implementation of HSSE policies and procedures and recommend corrective action to mitigate the risks in line with best practice and local regulations Key Performance Indicators HSSE risks have been assessed and risk mitigation measures are in place Up to date company risks and opportunities register Effective risk controls resulting from the audits Environment Management Direct the development and maintenance of Environment standards, processes and practices across the sites in line with local regulations, company sustainability policy and recognized international standards Ensure all Environment Impact Assessment (EIA) for company activities are approved by Government agencies before starting the activities Develop environmental reports as per local regulations, ISO14001 requirements Identify significant environmental aspects and implement best practices to minimize impacts Security Direct the assurance of safety and security of people, assets, property and information at all times in order to protect the company's interests and peoples lives and ensure continuity of business Business Continuity Management Provide overall strategic direction. Assess, invoke, and escalate the responses to disruptive event(s) based on predefined criteria. Direct the BC responses during the disruptive event(s) Manage the recovery efforts of the Country Response Team (CRT), Communications Support Team, IT DR Team and the BC Recovery Teams. Adjudicate competing demands for recovering priorities. Direct and authorize internal and external communications. Decide the stand down and return to normal business; and Initiate post-incident review and communicate key lessons learned Asset Integrity Develop and implement Al assurance plan to ensure related process, practices and procedures are implemented across all assets following AIM standard Verify Al assessment of all company facilities to demonstrate fit for service. QUALIFICATIONS: Knowledge & Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Engineering / Science or Occupational Health and Safety or an equivalent qualification. Masters degree in industrial safety, process safety or post graduate diploma in Occupational Safety and Health from reputable authority is preferable. Good knowledge of local and international legislation and regulations and best practice on HSSE Experience: At least 15 years of HSSE experience in the Oil & Gas industry, with at least 5 years in management position. Being exposed in depth to HSSE and/or Asset integrity management in Oil and Gas industry. Skills: Interpersonal skills, good communication and presentation skills, Technical writing skills, Advanced computer skills, instructional skills, Negotiation skills, Management skills including planning and organization Ability to conduct accident and fire investigations Strong proficiency in Thai and English both in Speaking and Writing. Chatuchak, Bangkok 10900

Job_Description: ตรวจสอบและเสนอแนะให้สถานประกอบการปฏิบัติตามกฎหมายด้านความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัย และสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน วิเคราะห์และประเมินความเสี่ยงของแผนงาน หรือโครงการและเสนอแนะมาตราการด้านความปลอดภัย แนะนำ ฝึกสอน จัดการอบรมลูกจ้าง เพื่อให้ปฏิบัติตาม และปฏิบัติงานให้เป็นไปตามมาตราการด้านความปลอดภัย ชีวอนามัย และสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน ตรวจวัดและประเมินสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน หรือดำเนินการร่วมกับบุคคลหรือนิติบุคคลที่ขึ้นทะเบียนหรือได้รับอนุญาตตามกฎหมายว่าด้วยความปลอดภัย รวบรวมสถิติ วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล จัดทำรายงาน เกี่ยวกับข้อเสนอแนะเกี่ยวกับการประสบอันตราย การเจ็บป่วย หรือการเกิดเหตุเดือดร้อนรำคายอันเนื่องมาจากการทำงานของลูกจ้างเสนอต่อนายจ้าง ปฏิบัติงานด้านความปลอดภัย ชีวอนามัย และสิ่งแวดล้อม ดำเนินงาน บริหารจัดการ ให้ตรงกับหลักการของความปลอดภัย ชีวอนามัย และสิ่งแวดล้อม คุณสมบัติ วุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป (สาขาอาชีวอนามัยและความปลอดภัย หรือสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง) ประสบการณ์ 1 ปีขึ้นไป มีความรู้ด้านกฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องกับความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัย และสิ่งแวดล้อม มีความรู้เรื่องระบบ ISO 9001, ISO 22301, ISO 45001, ISO 14001 สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์โปรแกรม MS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี

Job_Title: Environmental Health and Safety Manager (EHS Manager) (150-200K)
Job_Description: Position: Environmental Health and Safety Manager (EHS Manager) (150-200K) Package: 150,000-200,000 Baht salary plus other benefits Based:  Bangkok Contact Recruiter: Kanokphan 065-237-8156 kanokphan (at) mriww.co.th Our client is one of the global medical device manufacturer based in Bangkok. They are now looking for an Environmental Health and Safety Manager(EHS Manager) Responsibilities: Provide consultancy to colleagues to maintain or improve the working conditions, encourage all employees to practice safe work habits at all times. Develop an Environmental Health and Safety activities to promote the employee awareness. Ensure compliance with all internal and external safety, health and environmental instruction, rules and regulations. Ensure the Safe Workplace and prevent the risk to health or the environment through the regular audits, inspections and training. Ensure prompt remedial action and accurate investigation and reporting of all accidents and incidents. Ensure that all chemicals and production waste are managed in a safe and environmental friendly manner. Ensure the Safety Committee performs the activities as required by law. Investigate, analyze and report the incident/accident occurred within the plant according to corporate policy. Develop a program to train all concerned personnel for a safe work and environmental friendly practices. Conduct fire drill and emergency responses assessment to ensure an effective plant emergency response. Prepare any new or updated information or legislation concerned Safety, Health and Environment to management. Suggest the solutions for the Health and Safety problems that affect company personnel and property. Develop the Environmental Health and Safety strategies and procedures to improve the working environmental and ensure a safe workplace and Government Compliance. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Occupational Health and Safety or Environmental Engineering, Engineering or related field and / or. 5 years in Environmental Health and Safety functions with 3 years experience at management level. Good people oriented and coaching skill with ability to interface with a broad spectrum of people, both within and outside the company. Comprehensive working knowledge of Safety and Environmental Laws, Labor Law, Labor Relations Acts and related legislations. GMP, ISO 9001, ISO 14000, ISO18000 and National Safety Award requirements. Good command of English and computer literate. Attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates. Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refer the position as an Environmental Health and Safety Manager (EHS Manager) to   Kanokphan If you believe that you are the right one, call Kanokphan"NOW" 065 237 8156 kanokphan (at) mriww.co.th

Job_Description: ซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักร เช่น  รถโฟล์คลิฟท์/รถกระเช้า/เครื่องปั่นลม/เครื่องลม คุณสมบัติ : -   เพศชาย  อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี -   วุฒิ ปวส. ขึ้นไป  สาขาช่างยนต์/ช่างกล หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง -   มีประสบการณ์ด้านการจัดซื้ออะไหล่เครื่องจักรก่อสร้าง -   มีประสบการณ์ด้านซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักร 1 ปี ขึ้นไป -   มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่รถยนต์ สวัสดิการ : เงินเดือน :  ขึ้นอยู่กับประสบการณ์ - เบี้ยขยัน - โอที - ค่าคอมมิชชั่น - ประกันสุขภาพพนักงานและครอบครัวพนักงาน - กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ - โบนัส / ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี - ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี - งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ประจำปี - ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : -   นิคมอุตสาหกรรมลาดกระบัง -   สำนักงานสาขาชลบุรี -   สำนักงานสาขาระยอง -   นิคมอุตสาหกรรมปิ่นทอง วันทำงาน :  จันทร์ – ศุกร์ : 08.30 – 17.30  เสาร์   :  09.00 – 17.00  (1 วัน / เดือน ตามปฏิทินบริษัท)

ตำแหน่ง วิศวกรไฟฟ้า (จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีไฟฟ้ากําลัง) โฟร์แมนไฟฟ้า (จบการศึกษาระดับปวส. ไฟฟ้ากําลัง) วิศวกรเครื่องกล(จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี) โฟร์แมนเครื่องกล (จบการศึกษาระดับปวส.) หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ควบคุมหน้างาน ประเมินราคา ออกแบบเเละติดตั้งงานระบบ ซ่อมบํารุงอุปกรณ์ไฟฟ้าเเละอุปกรณ์เครื่องกล/ระบบควบคุมไฟฟ้าเเละระบบควบคุมเครื่องกล คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาระดับปวส. ขึ้นไป สำหรับโฟร์แมนไฟฟ้าเเละโฟร์แมนเครื่องกล จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป สำหรับวิศวกรไฟฟ้าเเละวิศวกรเครื่องกล ประสบการณ์ที่เกี่ยวข้อง 0-3 ปีขึ้นไป มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานรับเหมาจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถเขียน AutoCAD ได้ (Optional) ทักษะการวางเเผน, บริหาร, วิเคราะห์งานโครงงาน สามารถไปทำงานต่างจังหวัดได้ ขับรถยนต์ได้และมีใบขับขี่ สามารถทำงานล่วงเวลาได้ อดทนต่อสภาวะความกดดันได้ เวลาทำงาน จันทร์-เสาร์ 09.00น.- 17.00น. (เวลาสามารถเปลี่ยนเเปลงได้ตามสภาพงาน)

Business Type: Construction Work Location: Bangkok (BTS Ploenchit) Working time : Mon. - Fri. 8:30 a.m. - 17:30 p.m. Job Description Reports to the Senior Project Manager and Project Manager and is responsible for the project under his charge. Prepare project estimates and costs to keep trace of variation to the contract To minimize project costs and risks while achieving required legal standards and statutory building regulations Solicit competitive quotations per project requirements with negotiation with suppliers for contracts, favorable commercial terms and conditions and pricing Prepare purchase documents, quotation, tender agreement and contracts if necessary (Client’s asset list, project costing sheets, vendors’ monthly progress claim, tracking progress claims from clients and vendors) Participate in meetings for claims, arbitration and dispute resolution Collaborate with requestors and suppliers to resolve issues related to requirements, substitutions, priorities, damages, quality delivery and other important terms and conditions Follow up with vendors to ensure prompt delivery and fulfillment of customers’ order Perform RFQ and total cost analysis. Handle miscellaneous projects as and when necessary. Follow ISO 9001, 14001 and 45001 system. Job requirements: Able to work under pressure and meet deadlines. At least 5 years of experience in handling QS or Contract management. Good command in English Able to create a contract in English to clients Computer literacy especially in MS Office, Word, Excel, Outlook, and Auto CAD. Good communication skills. Welfare: Provident Fund Group Insurance Transportation Allowance Meal Allowance Bonus Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by E-mail JAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd 10F Emporium Tower  622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Contact : K.Supawan Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website : https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

Job Purpose / Overview: Continuous Improvement (CI) activities especially focusing on quality, productivity, safety, factory performance, waste reduction and operational process/ system of pouch factory in all areas. Support implementation and daily execution of the Mars Supply Excellence (MSE) program This associate shall be linked to an operations team and will be supporter of MSE. To be the lead for tasks such as: Problem solving/ root cause identification, focused improvement, Autonomous Maintenance (AM), performance KPIs, DiB and related SiG. The Job holder in this role must lead by example and be willing to share experiences with others to improve the technical self-sufficiency of the operation team. Responsibilities: Efficiently Converts Raw Materials into Finished Goods Responsible for CAPA performance in operation and ensure that CAPA process is followed through effectively until closed. Initiate improvement projects to improve areas of quality, productivity, safety, waste reduction, working process and operating system. Lead and manage throughout improvement projects to be completed smoothly and collaboratively within the budget and time frame. Optimizes the Supply Chain Support CVS phase of factory / production line expansion to ensure on time start-up, and therefore site master plan is delivered as planned. Responsible for Site manufacturing data reporting and administration of data reporting tools. Interact with engineering, operations and maintenance teams to improve equipment efficiency, as well as, eliminate waste Analyses and Improves Performance Identify opportunities and initiates projects to achieve MCC improvement which means reduce manufacturing cost and increase profit margin. Supports and lead projects in DiB work stream to achieve identified MCC improvement. Implement focused improvement projects in conjunction with the FI pillar and Continuous Improvement teams, directed at equipment stops reduction and waste reduction Perform root cause analysis on process interruptions by leading small group of associates thru Mars problem solving tools Participate for implement and strengthen building blocks for Mars Supply Excellence (MSE) for example 5S, Kaizen, AM/PM/FI/FMOS etc. Participate and support the implementation of AM activities, as well as, development of Autonomous Work Teams (AWT) on new equipment. Participate and support the sustainment of AM / AWT at existing equipment thru health checks, daily / weekly audits and feedback to zone owners. Responsible for quality of KAIZEN projects. Responsible for process effectiveness of FMOS (Factory Mars Operating System). Also being a key member by assign in Daily Performance Meeting and responsible for escalation process of issues / abnormality handling that required supports, from both FMOS and daily performance meeting. Drive the mindset and methodology to increase “Mean Time Between Failures” (MTBF) and Zero Breakdown and zero losses culture To be key technical in pouch operation trainer for working team. Special project assigned by Line Manager Qualifications & Other Requirements: Minimum education is bachelor’s degree of mechatronic engineering or electronic & automation related field, engineer preferable. Good English writing and speaking and be comfortable presenting in front of others Essential computer skills ex. MS office (Words and Excel), Power point etc. Good interpersonal skill, able to work with cross functional team 3-5 years of experience in production process Ability to teach others with tools such as one point lessons and leading by example Mechanical machinery aptitude is essential Fundamental electrical and automation understanding Fundamental understanding of industrial controls Strong organizational skills and self-directed capability Ability to lead a small team of people to achieve a common solution TPM, AM, 5S, Continuous Improvement, Problem Solving experience / training is desired

Primary Function: This position is responsible to control &maintain the products meeting the Golf Pride standard to serve the customer’s requirements and expectations.  Applies &develops the (ELSS) Eaton Lean & Six Sigma system to improve &control the manufacturing processes to reach &meet the targets in term of Safety, quality, productivity, delivery, cost and budget.  Implement, ensure and maintain ISO 9001 Quality System and ISO 14001 Environmental System Collects and evaluates engineering data for improve plant operation meet goal and objective setting. Using a variety of professional references, investigates and recommends straightforward solutions to complete plant operations gap and quality issue as well as EHS area. Essential Functions; Supports, develops &provides the solution to production for solving the technical issue &improve the production yield for all products. Collecting data & make an evaluation for process controlling &process improvements Testing and Prepare Standard / work instruction (new process, new product) Interface with new product development to launch new products and processes. Analyze quality data, create actions and lead problem solving teams. Evaluate new technologies and report/implement improvements. Evaluate and refine manufacturing process work instructions. Assist in development clear and concise documentation of these procedures in accordance with quality requirements. Improve cycle time of production process. Monitoring and improve plant production processes Validate plat work processes Utilize and implement Lean tool Support and utilize ISO9001/14001, Eaton Quality System, Lean Audit and EHS Support Manufacturing as required Control &maintains the manufacturing processes to meet all requirements in the control plan Coach &re-trains the operators, and technicians for skills up and development Motivate and promote the effective teamwork. Basic Bachelor’s Degree from Engineering fields. At least 3-5 years’ experience and hand on the position of Process Engineer from related the manufacturing processes Able to work under pressure and limit of time. Able to work at Nakhonratchasima Preferred Bachelor’s Degree in engineering, rubber technology, materials, polymer sciences or related fields. At least 3 years experiences in combining advance rubber mold and tooling and manufacturing technologies to achieve technical performance A strong technical professional to develop and apply state-of-the art materials technology to highly engineered technical products Demonstrate strong initiative and drive for results as well as good interpersonal and teaming behavior. Good command of English both spoken and written skills Good Computer literate (Microsoft Office & CAD a plus) Technical knowledge Familiar with Lean Kaizen &Six Sigma and Cost Saving project Experience in Process Control &Process Improvement Soft skills Good analytical skills and systematic approach Good observations and quick learning &quick actions Good communication skills We offer attractive remuneration packages and career opportunities to successful candidate. Interested applicants are invited to apply in person or send application with full resume Indicating qualifications and experience to HR Department via " Apply Now " or more information please contact the phone number 044 233 100-3 Eaton Industries (Thailand) Ltd. 156 Moo 3 Ratchasima-Chockchai Road Tumbol Nongbuasala, Amphur Muang, Nakhonratchasima 30000 Tel: 04-4233-100 Fax: 04-4212-164

Order, tracking, replenishment of Lean material, lean equipment and relate stuff. Participates in inspection and maintenance of activities Lean & EHS Qualifications : High school diploma or equivalent in Electrical, Electronic, Mechanical engineer or related field. Able to work in a team environment and work productively in team assignments Willing to maintain good communication with personnel from engineer and concern people. Willing to Learn and apply Lean Manufacturing principles and techniques. Q ualifications : Ensuring the engineering requirement are as per the specification, drawings, execution plan and ITRs while executing the job such as analysis for Process Control Narrative, Cause & Effect, Logic Diagram of Instrument Engineering Documents. Carrying out Dry Function Test and Wet Function Test as per design documents and assistance instrument engineer  for Pre-commissioning and Commissioning (assistance for vendor) of Honeywell(DCS System), Triconex safety system (ESD), MMS System, F&G System. Function Test of, Process Control Narrative Cause & Effect Instrument Logic Diagram Instrument Range Alarm & Trip Setting List P&ID (Process& Instrument Diagram) Analyzing project requirements and reviewing all the project specification wherein mapping requirements of manpower/ materials resources in which ensuring cost effective execution as per schedule. Developing project baselines while monitoring and controlling projects with respect to cost, resource deployment, time over-runs and quality compliance to ensure its satisfactory execution. Implementing present pre-commissioning and commissioning methodologies & systems in compliance with quantity & cost control standards. Responsibilities: Results-oriented Professional with Minimum 7 year of experience in : Site & Instrument Comm. Activities. Expertise in instrument execution and maintenance of plant capital projects. Proficient in implementing stringent systems and quality plans to ensure high quality standards during all the stages of project. Distinction of supervising all pre-commissioning and commissioning activities including providing technical inputs for methodologies of construction & commissioning coordination with site management activities. Creative and Multi-disciplinary Executive renowned for swiftly executing projects with competent cross-functional skills and ensuring on time deliverables within pre-set cost parameters. An effective communicator & negotiator with strong analytical, problem solving and organizational skills. Skilled in preparing various types of MS, Permits & Task Risk Assessment (TRA) and JSEA (Job Safety and Environmental Analysis) for pre-commissioning and Commissioning activities from Construction Site and Running Plants.

Q ualifications : We are looking for a dedicated Instrument Inspector to perform official inspection with client, pre-inspection (Internal inspection), drafting RFI (Request for Inspection), Planning for inspection and managing correction work found during pre-inspection. Instrument Inspector shall be capable for instrumentation knowledge and able to judge instrument work quality based on project specification. Proffered to have 3 years and more of prior experience in Oil & Gas industry. A Bachelor’s degree in relate field. (Instrument Engineering, Construction or Commissioning) Good computer skills (Microsoft Office, Excel, Word, PPT etc . ) Good English skill for communicate with foreigner . Well communicate with co-workers . Responsibilities : Performing official inspection with client. Performing pre-inspection, finding correction and  rectification prior to official inspection. Reporting and suggesting site issue to Instrument Manager to perform inspection. Preparing, scheduling, coordinating and monitoring inspection status with Subcontractor. Interacting with clients, interpreting their needs and requirements, and representing them in the field. Controlling punches and findings during inspection and closing the punches.

Responsibilities: Verify the backflushed component of each bike as per Assembly BOM and communicate to relevant departments to take corrective action. Support the production, Engineering, Project Manager, Material Handling on any stock and LN system issues. Job_Title: Production Manager (FMCG, Packaging / 90K ) Pathumthani / Kon Kaen
Job_Description: Our cliennt is a leading FMCG Company This position is responsible to manage and supervise the shift leaders and operators to achieve in all aspects of quality, quantity, turnover, absenteeism and overtimes in line with budget and cost.  Analyzing production results, implement and follow-up corrective actions. RESPONSIBILTIES ￭ Ensure the realization of the shift production program and day to day management of the workshop. ￭ Control the KPIs for his/her respective shifts: quality, manpower and machine, productivity, flows, EHS, materials consumption and general expenses. ￭ Debrief with shift leaders during production meetings, report to Assistant Production Manager. ￭ Contribute to the production plan, forecast disturbances. ￭ Follow-up availability of equipment and machine and plan major interventions. Ensure availability and suitability of consumables usage. ￭ Lead the production meetings with shift leaders. Flow down and cascade internal and global information. ￭ Monitor and manage the absenteeism and turnover of manpower in order to reach to the productivity and target. ￭ Plan and request the manpower to fulfill the capacity and productivity in line with forecast, budget and turnover. Required qualifications ￭ Bachelor's degree of Engineer or related field. ￭ At least 7 years of experience in production management with minimum 3 years in supervisory level. ￭ Good command of English both writing and speaking. ￭ Good analytical skills (KPIs measurement & analysis) ￭ Problem solving skills, with an ability to see potential problems early and build in suitable contingencies. ￭ Good in communication skill, analytical thinking and prioritization. ￭ Ability to interact with people from both technical and non-technical backgrounds. Click “apply now” for this challenging career opportunity in an international and very dynamic environment. *Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. ** In case your friends experience is match with this position, please forward this job to them / provide us with their references and we shall get in touch with them

Job_Title: Maintenance Technician/ช่างซ่อมบำรุง
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน จัดการ ตรวจสอบ ดูแล และซ่อมแซ่มเครื่องจักรของบริษัท ติดตั้งเครื่องจักรใหม่ที่บริษัทจัดหามาตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย จัดเตรียมอะไหล่สำหรับซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักรเป็นประจำเพื่อให้เพียงพอต่อการใช้งาน เข้าร่วมประชุมด้านความปลอดภัยเพื่อตรวจสอบให้แน่ใจว่าการทำงานของเครื่องจักรเป็นไปตามที่กฎหมายกำหนด งานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาระดับ ปวส. หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์งานซ่อมบำรุงในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรม อย่างน้อย 1ปีขึ้นไป สามารถอ่านแบบ Drawing ได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีประสบการณ์ด้านเครื่องจักร CNC , Fanuc Robodrill มาจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

RESPONSIBILITIES: Optimize/configure processes and equipment for building surface mount electronics assemblies. Perform design of experiments (DOE) to launch new models and optimize SMT process yield. Specify equipment and process requirements for PCBA build processes. Perform process development and validation on new models in extremely aggressive timelines. Lead efforts to uncover root-cause and develop a permanent resolution on issues found during pre-production. Ensure the successful transition of products from development to volume production. BASIC QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor's degree in an engineering discipline. Professional experience working in SMT or PCBA process/manufacturing engineering. PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE: 5+ years of experience working in SMT or PCBA process/manufacturing engineering. Hands on experience with stencil print, SPI, pick & place, reflow, AOI, ICT, x-ray inspection, underfill and staking processes. Ability to define requirements for equipment and process control. Ability to design efficient floor layout and drive facilities improvements. Experience with high volume commercial, industrial or consumer grade electronics manufacturing. Proven experience in dynamic NPI environment and transition to full scale production. Good communication skills, both written and verbal. We offer attractive compensation, benefits packages and career opportunities to the successful candidates. Tel. (662) 524-9600 ext. 6471 Website: www.fabrinet.com

Company: BRIDGESTONE AIRCRAFT TIRE MANUFACTURING (THAILAND) CO., LTD.
Job_Description: Job Duty: Perform tire defect analysis and define tire damages, defects and removal reasons. Assist to perform warranty and incident investigations and forensic analysis work. Perform physical RTD (aircraft tire remaining tread depth) measurement investigation work and input the measured data. Coordinate with production team for any ad hoc tasks. Compile internal monthly management reports, and rejection analysis Promote full utilization of tires to customers for LPT and PMR improvement. Handle basic customer inquiries. Perform technical service section administrative tasks, e.g. compiling warranty and incident cases and managing logs. Be able for short-period duty travel, as travel to the APAC region may be required for customer visits. Understand the company policies, and implement accordingly. Good Command of English (All in Reading, Writing and Speaking) Highly Competent Of MS Office Applications Especially in MS Excel (Familiarity With Databases Management Preferred) Good Analytical Skills. Responsible, Initiative and Disciplined Positive Attitude and Open-Minded Safety Awareness and Safety Mind Be Able to Perform Physical Work on a Factory Ground Expected Skill: TOEIC Score Beyound 650 Preferred

Flexlink FlexLink is an industry leader in automated production and material flow solutions. Working closely with our global customers, we provide state-of-the-art solutions that deliver production efficiency and enable sustainable manufacturing today and tomorrow. FlexLink serves a broad customer base, ranging from local producers to global corporations and end-users to machine manufacturers. We are a leading provider of high-end solutions to manufacturing industries such as food, beverages, tissues, personal care, pharmaceutical, automotive, batteries and electronics. We serve customers through our operational units and a global network of strategic partners. The partner network has been an essential strategic element of FlexLink’s business model since its start in 1980, enabling the company to enhance efficiency at factories in more than 60 countries worldwide. Overall Job Description The Project & After Sales Engineer satisfies customer requirements and achievements of the company budget and schedule through the development of specific activities for project management or after-sales service. Main Responsibilities Based on specific customer requirements, elaborate on the offer evaluating whether it can be applied to adequate technical solutions or if it has to be declined for technical reasons. Project planning and implementing the work schedules for the Mechanical and Electrical staff. Reading and interpreting design schematics to ensure the proper installation of Mechanical and Electrical systems. Troubleshooting major system failures and equipment malfunctions. Ensuring the work is completed following the schedule and under the costing. Communication with end-users, builders, architects, and other workers on-site. Providing motivation and assistance when necessary. Able to work on some weekends. Able to travel and work outside the Bangkok area. Collaborate with sales engineers for problems related to assembly, installation, or in the event of customer complaints. Requirements Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or related field. Minimum 3 years experience in an engineering function. Automation background 3-5 years Project management Customer Awareness Customer technology Technical drawing Autodesk CAD Tools Strong project management and leadership skills Advanced troubleshooting skills Supplier management skills Teamwork Able to Communicate in Thai & English Assertiveness

Job_Title: Technician/ช่างเทคนิค

Job_Title: Supervisor Injection/หัวหน้าแผนกฉีดพลาสติก
Company: Fortune Parts Industry Public Company Limited
Job_Description: หน้าที่หลัก 1. ควบคุมและจัดการการผลิตให้เป็นไปตามแผนผลิต 2. รายงานปัญหาในการผลิตต่อผู้จัดการฝ่ายผลิตในกรณีที่เครื่องจักรหรือแม่พิมพ์มีการหยุดการแก้ไขเกิน 4 ชั่วโมงหรือเกิดเหตุขัดข้องไม่สามารถทำการผลิตได้ตามแผน 3. ให้คำแนะนำและอบรมงานให้แก่ผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชารวมถึงเรื่องสิ่งแวดล้อมและความปลอดภัยในการทำงาน 4. ดูแลความประพฤติของผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาให้เป็นไปตามกฏระเบียบของแผนกและของบริษัท 5. กำหนดแผนการดำเนินงานภายในแผนก 6. ควบคุมดูแลทรัพย์สินของบริษัท 7. ควบคุมการใช้เม็ดพลาสติกให้ตรงตามที่ระบุไว้ในใบสั่งผลิต 8.การให้คำแนะนำและอบรมให้แก่ผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชารวมถึงเรื่องกิจกรรม CSR ,QCC,TPM และโครงการอนุรักษณ์พลังงานและอื่นๆ 9.ตรวจสอบการปปฏิบัติงานของหัวหน้ากะและพนักงานตามข้อกำหนดของ WI 5S และ Safety อย่างน้อยสัปดาห์ละ 1 ครั้ง 10.จัดทำและ Update เอกสารระบบ ISO14001 ISO 50001 ISO45001 และจัดทำเอกสารการบริหารความเสี่ยง Risk  Management  รายงานผู้บริหาร ตามข้อกำหนดของตลาดหลักทรัพย์ 11.จัดทำการประเมินและ update Process Approach IATF16949 ในกระบวนการฉีดพลาสติก คุณสมบัติประจำตำแหน่ง 1. วุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมพลาสติก อุตสาหกรรม เครื่องกล หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง 2. มีประสบการณ์ทางด้านงานฉีดพลาสติก 5 ปีขื้นไป 3. มีประสบการณ์ตรงเกี่ยวกับงานฉีดพลาสติกในอุตสาหกรรมยานยนต์ 4. ความรู้เกี่ยวกับ ISO/TS16949, ISO14001. 5. ความรู้เกี่ยวกับ New Model 6. มีทักษะในการวิเคราะห์ มีทักษะในการแก้ปัญหา และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้          7. ใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office, CAD ได้

Prime Function: Governance Cycle (Annual) Define scope and targets for the upcoming year (both on group and OBU-level) Identify stakeholders both on GPV Group and OBU-level. Driving Eco Vadis ratings across GPV, supporting and facilitating OBU assessments. Mapping relevant stakeholders and conducting training. Knowledge sharing, mapping common documentation and best practice. Ensuring accurate registration and reporting of documentation. Experienced using MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) Experience using the Eco Vadis assessment platform is a plus.

Job_Title: ช่างประจำอาคาร/ช่างประจำอาคาร
Job_Description: รับสมัครพนักงาน ตำแหน่ง ช่างอาคาร รายละเอียดงาน รับผิดชอบ ตรวจสอบความเรียบร้อยของอาคาร ทำงานเป็นกะ 24 ชม. ให้บริการและคำปรึกษากับลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับงานซ่อมบำรุงภายในอาคาร ประสานงานกับสำนักงานเกี่ยวกับการแจ้งซ่อมแซมภายในอาคารต่างๆ ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆ เช่น หน่วยรักษาความปลอดภัย ผู้รับเหมาภายนอก การไฟฟ้า เป็นต้น ดูแลตรวจสอบความผิดปกติต่างๆภายในอาคาร รวมถึงอุปกรณ์ในการซ่อมบำรุง บันทึกข้อมูลและรายงานผล ปฏิบัติตามแผนงานตรวจสอบระบบต่างๆ เช่น ระบบหม้อแปลงไฟฟ้า, โครงสร้างอาคาร, ลิฟต์, ระบบปรับอากาศ, ระบบประปา เป็นต้น งานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ ผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร หรือได้รับการยกเว้น การศึกษาระดับ ปวช., ปวส., ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาไฟฟ้ากำลัง หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานซ่อมบำรุงต่างๆ เช่น ไฟฟ้า ประปา โทรศัพท์ เครื่องปรับอากาศ ฯลฯ มีบัตรประจำตัวช่างไฟฟ้า หรือใบ กว.20 ช่างไฟฟ้ากำลัง สามารถทำงานเป็นทีม และแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ มีความกระตือรือร้น รับผิดชอบ ตรงต่อเวลา มีความอดทน ยินดีที่จะทำงานล่วงเวลา และทำงานเป็นกะได้ สวัสดิการ ประกันสังคม ประกันกลุ่ม (ประกันอุบัติเหตุ) โบนัสตามผลประกอบการประจำปี วันทำงาน สัปดาห์ละ 6 วัน ทำงานเป็นกะ มีค่าล่วงเวลา ( OT )

Job_Title: ผู้ช่วยช่างระบบเทคนิค/ผู้ช่วยช่างระบบเทคนิค
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ งานประจำวันหน้าที่หลัก ติดตั้ง แก้ไข ซ่อมบำรุง ปรับปรุง ระบบงานไอทีงานไฟฟ้า ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ งานรักษาความปลอดภัย สัญญาณกันขโมย กล้องวงจรปิด ทีวีอาคาร โซล่าเซลล์ EVชาร์จเจอร์ คีย์การ์ด ไม้กั้นอัตโนมัติ มอเตอร์ประตูรีโมท เป็นต้น งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับหมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษา ม.3, ปวช., ปวช. ขึ้นไป มีพื้นฐานหรือเคยผ่านงานด้านไฟฟ้า ทำงานนอกสถานที่หรือต่างจังหวัดได้ มีประสบการณ์ติดตั้งระบบ CCTV จะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สวัสดิการ เบี้ยขยัน ประกันอุบัติเหตุ ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม มีอาหารกลางวันและน้ำดื่มให้

Job_Title: Day-Night Shift Production Supervisor (50K+OT+allowance)  Automation & Lean /...
Job_Description: Interested please submit CV  or send cv to kasemsak (@) aouasia.com and call “ 063 726 6628 ” Feel free to connect me for more jobs This position is responsible to manage and supervise the shift leaders and operators to achieve in all aspects of quality, quantity, turnover, absenteeism and overtimes in line with budget and cost. Assist the Production Manager in analyzing production results, implement and follow-up corrective actions. RESPONSIBILTIES ￭ Ensure the realization of the shift production program and day to day management of the workshop. ￭ Control the KPIs for his/her respective shifts: quality, manpower and machine, productivity, flows, EHS, materials consumption and general expenses. ￭ Debrief with shift leaders during production meetings, report to Assistant Production Manager. ￭ Contribute to the production plan, forecast disturbances. ￭ Follow-up availability of equipment and machine and plan major interventions. Ensure availability and suitability of consumables usage. ￭ Lead the production meetings with shift leaders. Flow down and cascade internal and global information. ￭ Monitor and manage the absenteeism and turnover of manpower in order to reach to the productivity and target. ￭ Plan and request the manpower to fulfill the capacity and productivity in line with forecast, budget and turnover. ￭ Enhance safety consciousness and awareness in the workplace by respecting EHS rules. Required qualifications ￭ Bachelor's degree of Engineer or related field. ￭ At least 7 years of experience in production management with minimum 3 years in supervisory level. ￭ Good command of English both writing and speaking. ￭ Good analytical skills (KPIs measurement & analysis) ￭ Problem solving skills, with an ability to see potential problems early and build in suitable contingencies. ￭ Good in communication skill, analytical thinking and prioritization. ￭ Ability to interact with people from both technical and non-technical backgrounds. ￭ Ability to rotate in shifts (Day/Night), and to follow the team OT arrangement Click “apply now” for this challenging career opportunity in an international and very dynamic environment. *Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. ** In case your friends experience is match with this position, please forward this job to them / provide us with their references and we shall get in touch with them

Job_Title: Marketing & Sales Manager (Construction Company)/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายตลาดและการขาย
Job_Description: Job Summary: The Marketing & Sales Manager is responsible for leading and managing the sales team to achieve sales targets and drive revenue growth for the construction company. This role involves developing strategic sales plans, building and maintaining relationships with clients and providing excellent customer service to clients. Responsibilities: Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve company sales goals and objectives. Lead, mentor, and motivate the sales team to meet and exceed individual and team targets. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, including construction contractors, architects, developers, and other key stakeholders. Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and customer needs. Prepare and deliver sales presentations, proposals, and contracts to clients. Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions of contracts to ensure profitable sales. Collaborate with other departments, such as project management and operations, to ensure smooth project execution and customer satisfaction. serves as a primary point of contact between the construction company and its clients. They must effectively communicate with customers to understand their needs, relay information about products or services, and coordinate any necessary actions or follow-ups. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Working experience in the related position 5 - 10 years Proven experience in sales within the construction industry, preferably in a managerial or leadership role. Strong knowledge of construction products, materials, and processes. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Results-oriented with a track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. Strong leadership and team management skills. Ability to analyze market trends and develop effective sales strategies. Willingness to travel as required. Good command in English and computer literate

To sell Endress+Hauser products and services; and to be a consulting business partner to customers to determine current and future needs. People in this position become technically competent with the application of products, and gain a general understanding of process conditions. This position helps customers by providing the correct solutions to their problems; being a problem-solver, a trusted advisor, and a technical expert in applying our products; and being a liaison between the customer and the company. Moreover, people in the position build relationships and rapport with customers (they become more than just a point of contact); and also understand the customer’s processes. Responsibilities : Achieve sales objectives within product range. Respond market and present & promote secure new sales for the full rang of E & H. product or exceed sales and profit targets for your account. Have Products Knowledge of Instrumentation. Ensure & Accuracy and Completely - PO. (Purchasing Order) and Order Processing for customers. Promote customer appropriate products and service. Analyze, prepare and assist on proposal offer to the customer. Support project team to conclude order. Coordinator during project team & customer for project execution. Coordinator with oversea specialist for customer special requirement. Solution assessment and coordinate service support for customer. Responsibility for on-site visit. Coordinate & Follow up on-time delivery products with logistics. Provide input of sales forecast. Pursue sales leads. Maintaining and building up relationship with customer. Responsibility for Sales reports and Activities reports. Cooperate with other departments. Special assignment at per attachment. Qualifications : · Good command in English (Written, Spoken, Listened). · Graduated Bachelor's or Master's Engineering of Instrumentation, Control & Instrumentation and related field - with GPA 2.5 up · People who's experience in business market -Local people will be advantage. · Work experience at least 2 years(up) in Instrumentation / Control instrumentation, Automation and 5 years experience in related field. · Knowledge Basic Instrument Engineering. · Good knowledge in the general industries - in Northeast & Central area. · Ability to recognize key decision makers within a customer’s organization. · Have a good understanding of general process operations (e.g. recognize limitations of technologies, recognize competitive limitations, and recognize potential problems at a customer’s plant). · Recognize sales opportunities beyond what the customer called you out for. · Ability to be persistent and determined, and to handle rejection. · Ability to build and sustain relationships with customers. · High responsibilities and able work under pressured and work in aggressively. · Proficiency in Microsoft office, Lotus Note, SAP. etc. Personal attributes : (Must have) Analytical Interpersonal Skills Service Mind Dependability Detail Oriented Work Ethic Able to travel up - country As an innovative company we offer you the long-term opportunity to advance in your career and build on your qualifications. Working in a motivated and committed team, you will input with interesting ideas and help us shape the future together. Your personality counts! Job_Description: The Continuous Improvement specialist (Sustainability), will coordinate the implementation of corporate sustainability programs which seek to reduce the organization's adverse impact on the environment or other sustainability related issues. In this role, you will provide information and expertise regarding viable sustainable projects and conduct material research to guide performance analysis, track key metrics and support sustainable education efforts. JOB RESPONSIBILITIES. Develop methods to evaluate the progress of sustainability initiatives, such as tracking emission reductions and updating greenhouse gas emissions inventory. Coordinate and facilitate community and collaborator involvement in established sustainability and climate protection initiatives. Collaborate with other departments to ensure that our sustainability efforts have a limited impact on productivity or quality standards. Develop and assess the viability of strategies meant to support conservation, increase usage of renewable resources or reduce energy costs or misused output. Support analysis of Supply chain that accurately identify the organization's environmental footprint including energy usage and gas, water, transportation or other waste emissions. Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or related field Minimum of 2-3 of related experience in continuous improvement Experience in supply chain & warehouse continuous improvement is preferable Hold self and others accountable to meet commitments. Know the most effective and efficient processes to accomplish work, focusing on continuous improvement. Plan and prioritize work to meet commitments aligned with organizational goals. Ability to work as part of a team. Oral and written communication skills. Ability to build collaborative relationships. Problem and situation analysis.

Summarize statistic of internal failure report. Advise technical to production for process improvement. Special job responsibilities and functions assigned by superior. Job_Title: SHE Manager (Safety, Health and Environment)/ผู้จัดการ ความปลอดภัย...
Job_Description: PURPOSE TYSON APAC is recruiting for a Senior Health & Safety Manager with an eye for detail to identify, compliance issues, health and safety law violations and create a plan to prevent breaking these laws in the future. S/He is also responsible for educating staff about the health and safety protocols in the workplace for our factory location in Samutprakarn. LOCATION Bangsaothong - Samutprakarn, Thailand RESPONSIBILITIES Define Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), plans, budgets, and projects related to occupational health, safety, and environmental conditions in alignment with company standards. Monitor and review company operations to ensure compliance with laws and regulations regarding occupational health, safety, and the environment. Provide recommendations for maintaining compliance. Analyze work processes for potential risks and propose control measures to mitigate them. Develop training plans for occupational health, safety, and environmental awareness aligned with legal requirements. Create plans for environmental workplace assessments, ensuring adherence and corrective actions for non-compliance. Coordinate annual employee health check-ups, new employee health assessments based on risks, and follow-up on abnormal findings. Control and track accidents, injuries, work-related illnesses, severe incidents, and crisis behavior. Conduct investigations to identify root causes and implement preventive measures. Compile operational safety data, accident statistics, and incident reports for management reporting. Monitor and assess the company's safety performance. Perform on-site checks and assessments at all Tyson Thailand plant locations. Implement IBU safety programs and track results. Conduct PSIF (Potential Serious Injury or Fatality) assessments and follow all corrective and preventive actions. Collaborate with Department Manager to supervise a development system aligned with Company strategy for staff in your area. Develop safety activities to enhance safety awareness. Provide a targeted training program to improve work knowledge for accountable staff, enhancing their efficiency. QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor’s Degree in Occupational Health and Safety or a related field. 5+ years of direct experience in Safety, Health and Security Manager in manufacturing industry or related field. Knowledge Thai Safety Law regulation, ISO 45001:2018 & ISO 14001:2015, TLS, SWA and Food Safety Management System and Security Management System. Proficient in English language (listening, speaking, reading, writing) Computer skill – MS Office i.e. Word, Excel, PowerPoint Good presentation and excellent organizational, leadership and motivational skills Deep understanding of legal health and safety guidelines Strong end-to-end business knowledge of poultry or similar businesses preferred Strong analytical skill, process-oriented mindset Excellent problem solving, communication, and organizational influence skills, and experience working in cross-functional teams.

Job_Title: Sales Manager Solar Cell Business/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายขาย ธุรกิจโซล่าเซลล์
Job_Description: บริษัท โกลด์ ไลท์ เอ็นเนอร์ยี่ จำกัด บริษัท ผู้นำเข้า จัดจำหน่าย และติดตั้งระบบพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์คุณภาพสูงด้วยนวัตกรรมชั้นนำของโลก มาตรฐานยุโรป และอเมริกา ที่มีอุดมการณ์ในการผลักดันและร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งในการส่งเสริมเพื่อให้คนไทยทุกคนได้มีโอกาสใช้พลังงานสะอาดด้วยมาตรฐานความปลอดภัยชั้นนำ เพื่อคุณภาพชีวิตที่ดีกว่า มีความประสงค์รับบุคลากร เพื่อร่วมทีมและพร้อมที่จะเติบโตไปกับองค์กร ในตำแหน่ง Sales Manager / ผู้จัดการฝ่ายขาย ธุรกิจโซล่าเซลล์ Qualifications: ปริญญาตรีวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า / อิเลกโทรนิกส์ / พลังงาน หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์หัวหน้าทีมขาย หรือ งานขายในธุรกิจพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์การติดตั้งโซล่าเซลล์ไม่น้อยกว่า 3ปี มีความเข้าใจระบบการติดตั้งโซล่าเซลล์ ทั้งด้านเทคนิค และการดำเนินธุรกิจ สามารถออกแบบการติดตั้งโซล่าเซลล์ และคำนวณการประหยัดค่าไฟฟ้าได้ มีประสบการณ์ขออนุญาตติดตั้งระบบพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์หน่วยงานราชการ มีประสบการณ์บริหารงานขาย การโฆษณาประชาสัมพันธ์ ที่ดี มีภาวะผู้นำ รักงานขายและงานบริการ ทักษะการวิเคราะห์งานที่ดี ความคิดสร้างสรรค์ และมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี

Job Purpose This position is required to aid manufacturing production to ensure production is always on time with good quality, the role will also be managing ECR and ECN implementation as well as problem solving and problem solutions, including part error, design error, continuous improvement etc. Job Context This role will require mainly office and computer work but will sometimes require hands on work on the shop floor Job Dimensions The role is based in Thailand although it may entail travelling abroad to other Lucy sites as appropriate. Undertake any reasonable hours necessary to carry out the role effectively. Key Accountabilities General organises and manages project labour and the delivery of materials, plant andequipment. establishes standards and policies for installation, modification, quality control, testing, inspection and maintenance according to engineering principles and safety regulations. 1. Support to production: - Managing Engineering change request (ECR) and Engineering change notification (ECN), this will entail analysing incoming ecn’s monitoring and supporting the implementation. It will also involve raising ECR’s for design issues when they arise, Continuous improvement ideas to reduce cost, implementation of new ideas and solutions relating to design and procurement. Support to production when there is a fault on the shop floor, to identify issues, root cause, isolation, and implement solutions, then follow up with required ECR to ensure no repeat issues. Managing routing and implementing single part costing. Maintenance coordination with breakdown and improvements. 2. Suggest and implement improved method of manufacturing: - Through a better sequence of operation/process improvement, design changes etc. Through efficient and latest machinery. Help with Procurement of machines and necessary tools. Implementation of improved “scientific” layout. All of the above should be accompanied by proper analysis and feasibility reports for presenting to the management. Suggest and implement improvements to process or product design for Continuous improvement. 3. Lean manufacturing. Eliminate waste activities Suggest and implement alternate layouts based on batch/single piece flow using lean tools. Ergonomic design and positioning of workbenches All these changes need to be done in the tandem with production through presentations, cost benefits due to improved efficiency. 4. Time database and work instructions: Generate extensive database for various assemblies/product groups with a view to have the requisite data ready for use during layout generation. Generate work instructions for all new product and new process introduced in Thailand site, where-ever required. 5. New Product Introduction: Product study from a manufacturing perspective and design correction for production ease Pre-production run In-corporate all manufacturing facility for new product and also ensuring all testing and documentation is in place. Liaise with Industrial engineer/manager to take over the industrial engineering part of production introduction. Iron out issues before production release. Create / update and follow up on obstruction during prototype and preproduction build Secondary activities / tasks To undertake any other duties and responsibilities as required / instructed in order to maintain and / or improve the efficiency, quality and service provided by the company. Comply with all company policies and procedures and maintain confidentiality of information relating to the company’s business and staff. Qualifications, Experience & Skills Minimum Qualifications, Knowledge and Experience Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical/Industrial Engineering with minimum 6-7 years’ experience in a production engineering role. Have good managerial capabilities to be able to lead teams on projects Good command in English, both written and spoken. Well versed in understanding engineering drawings. Skills with CAD system and drawing management systems. Skills with CRM software. Have fire in him to grow in the organization. A background in Switchgear or Electrical / mechanical related industry (Desirable). Behavioural Competencies Drive to achieve results - sets own standards, checks own work, and demonstrates a positive approach. Ability to work to tight deadlines and handle high volume workloads Strong communication skills with the ability to influence and guide business managers. Team player Analysis and problem solving - sees range of options, deciphers and reacts positively. Working collaboratively - actively contributes to achieve organizational objectives. Confident, proactive and customer focused approach. Process driven with the ability to drive continuous improvement. If you are interested in this job, Please apply follow link as below . Production Engineer - Job - Lucy Group Careers

Job_Title: Workshop Manager (ผู้จัดการส่วนซ่อมบำรุงรถยนต์)
Job_Description: Responsibility: Control day-to-day operation in the workshop. Maintain/Improve productivity and efficiency of the workshop in order to maximize revenue. Measure individual performance and coach team member to achieve monetary target and customer satisfaction target. Monitor and control warranty submission and related operation such as warranty audit. Make sure that all warranty practices conform with manufacturere's standard and processed within a timely manner to maintain customer satisfaction and reduce down time. Supervise technicial support team who will be responsible for investigation of complex technical issue and act as a point of contact with manufacturer. Ensure that the team is working in accordance with standard and submit/solve technical issue within timely manner. Lead training activity and deligate training team to deliver adequate number of internal training courses. Plan training path and support related staff to take part in local/oversea training. Summarize training progress report and identify development plan for each employee. Coordinate with parts / service advisor team to make sure operation runs smoothly and correct information is communicated to the customer. Advice/Provide technical knowledge to related staff, when necessary, to create better understanding internally and externally. Work with workshop controller and foreman to enforce disciplinary rules and procedure for workshop staff. Perform internal audit to maintain workshop standard in terms of work process, tools and equipment, facility, cleanliness, safety, and others as required by AAS/manufacturer. Study any new standard/practice and transfer knowledge to related staff. Work with manufacturer/local supplier to source new tools & equipment as required for new model / or to replace old&damaged existing ones. Qualifications: 5 years experiences in workshop (Automotive) Good communication both of Thai & English Workshop Management,

Job_Title: SALE ENGINEER/วิศวกรฝ่ายขาย
Job_Description: คุณสมบัติ : สำเร็จการศึกษาระดับ ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวะ-พลังงานแสงอาทิตย์  สาขาวิศวะ-ไฟฟ้ากำลัง หรือสาขาอื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความสามารถในการวางแผน การบริหารจัดการ มีทักษะในการคำนวณ ใช้ Excel ในระดับ Advance มีทักษะในการใช้โปรแกรม Autocas, Sketchup, Solidwork, PVsyst, 3D มีพาหนะเป็นของตนเอง เดินทางออกพื้นที่ และต่างจังหวัดได้สะดวก หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ JD : สร้างยอดขายโดยขยายฐานลูกค้าใหม่ และรักษาลูกค้าเก่าให้มียอดการสั่งซื้ออย่างต่อเนื่อง วางแผนการขายประจำวัน ติดต่อประสานงาน เข้าเยี่ยมลูกค้า สร้างความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้า สำรวจหน้างาน ร่วมประชุมกับลูกค้า ออกแบบ/ถอดแบบ Auto Cad, Sketchup, PVsyst ถอด BOQ จัดทำใบเสนอราคาขาย อุปกรณ์ติดตั้ง Solar Mounting-Solar Farm & Solar Rooftop

Job_Description: 1. การให้คำปรึกษา และการฝึกอบรมประสานงาน 2. คำนวณ คาร์บอนฟุตพริ้นต์ขององค์กร (CFO) และ คาร์บอนฟุตพริ้นท์ผลิตภัณฑ์ (Carbon Footprint of Product : CFP) 3. มีความรู้ด้าน SBTi ,CDP, Carbon Neutral ,TCFD 4. ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย Requirements 3-5 Years’ of work experience with good knowledge on Environmental or Sustainable Development concept, CSR, Carbon Footprint of Product (CFP),Carbon Footprint of Organization (CFO),Water footprint (WFP),Circular economy (CE),Zero waste to landfill, SROI etc. Great knowledge of Corporate, Social and Environmental governance Comprehensive understanding of Carbon legislation and climate change policies Logical and creative thinking problem solving Degree in sustainable development, engineering , sciences or related field is required. good human relations and have high responsibility Must be fluent in English TOEIC 600+ Skills in coordinating between international cooperation agencies will be an advantage.

YOUR TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES Provide advice for improving quality and reliability of Specialty Films production by defining the process parameter setting, identifying process problems, analyzing data and coordinating with related parties. Develop and maintain a quality improvement action plan to achieve future key characteristics of the product quality to meet future market/customer requirements, including monitoring its implementation. Provide instruction of daily production plan to operation team to ensure product capacity target are met with good product quality with cost effectiveness. Prepare and maintain operating conditions for every grade and thickness including the special grade, update the operating conditions if so required. Coordinate with Technical/Maintenance, PCT and concerned parties to prepare system for maintenance and shut down works. Lead Film operating personnel to maintain effective team work and align with OEE target, cost effectiveness and safe environment Continuous check of process design and operation to improve yield and throughput WHO YOU ARE Bachelor of Science, Engineering, Industrial Technology with Working experience in production line between 3 - 5 years. Or master's degree in industrial related fields ie. Mechanic / Electrical / Chemistry or Science with working experience in production line 0-3 years Knowledge in machine function and parts assembly for Corrective and Preventive maintenance, maintenance tools and piping and modification skills Understand machine function and tools/special tools for repairing Good communications in English Location: Map ta phut, Rayong All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed will be notified. Interested candidates are invited to submit your resume with full details to APPLY NOW Covestro (Thailand) Co. Ltd. AIA Sathorn Tower Building, 17/F, Unit 1, 5-8 11/1 Sathorn Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120 Direct Line: 02-029-9086

More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550 dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in Southeast Asia. Purpose Being responsible for technical requests, solving technical problems and communicating with support, interdepartmental personnel and occasionally with customers. Position Responsibilities Designing and development of electrical, electronic and electro-mechanical sub-systems and components. Writing design & test specifications/procedures. Designing electrical subsystems which include wire harnesses, timers, switches, motors, pumps, valves, contactors and transformers. Utilizing Auto Cad, Creo or other CAD software to generate electrical system designs (i.e. wire harnesses and schematics). Setting up run and document tests on electrical and electronic controls and sub-systems. Working with suppliers and in-house personnel on the development of sub-systems and components. Understanding and designing sub-systems to marketing specifications and regulatory agencies. Supporting production as needed, working on QI's and CI and problem solving. Following ISO14001, ISO45001 and ISO9001. Position Qualifications 3 - 5 years of electrical/electronic experience preferred. Hands-on contributor with strong written and oral communication skills. Self-motivated and excellent decision-making skills. Good working knowledge of PC applications. Associate's Degree in Electrical, Electronics or Electro-Mechanical Technology preferred. Position involves sitting for long periods, standing, manual dexterity, stooping, bending and minimal lifting.

Job Purpose / Overview: Continuous Improvement (CI) activities especially focusing on quality, productivity, safety, factory performance, waste reduction and operational process/ system of pouch factory in all areas. Support implementation and daily execution of the Mars Supply Excellence (MSE) program This associate shall be linked to an operations team and will be supporter of MSE. To be the lead for tasks such as: Problem solving/ root cause identification, focused improvement, Autonomous Maintenance (AM), performance KPIs, DiB and related SiG. The Job holder in this role must lead by example and be willing to share experiences with others to improve the technical self-sufficiency of the operation team. Responsibilities: Efficiently Converts Raw Materials into Finished Goods Responsible for CAPA performance in operation and ensure that CAPA process is followed through effectively until closed. Initiate improvement projects to improve areas of quality, productivity, safety, waste reduction, working process and operating system. Lead and manage throughout improvement projects to be completed smoothly and collaboratively within the budget and time frame. Optimizes the Supply Chain Support CVS phase of factory / production line expansion to ensure on time start-up, and therefore site master plan is delivered as planned. Responsible for Site manufacturing data reporting and administration of data reporting tools. Interact with engineering, operations and maintenance teams to improve equipment efficiency, as well as, eliminate waste Analyses and Improves Performance Identify opportunities and initiates projects to achieve MCC improvement which means reduce manufacturing cost and increase profit margin. Supports and lead projects in DiB work stream to achieve identified MCC improvement. Implement focused improvement projects in conjunction with the FI pillar and Continuous Improvement teams, directed at equipment stops reduction and waste reduction Perform root cause analysis on process interruptions by leading small group of associates thru Mars problem solving tools Participate for implement and strengthen building blocks for Mars Supply Excellence (MSE) for example 5S, Kaizen, AM/PM/FI/FMOS etc. Participate and support the implementation of AM activities, as well as, development of Autonomous Work Teams (AWT) on new equipment. Participate and support the sustainment of AM / AWT at existing equipment thru health checks, daily / weekly audits and feedback to zone owners. Responsible for quality of KAIZEN projects. Responsible for process effectiveness of FMOS (Factory Mars Operating System). Also being a key member by assign in Daily Performance Meeting and responsible for escalation process of issues / abnormality handling that required supports, from both FMOS and daily performance meeting. Drive the mindset and methodology to increase “Mean Time Between Failures” (MTBF) and Zero Breakdown and zero losses culture To be key technical in pouch operation trainer for working team. Special project assigned by Line Manager Qualifications & Other Requirements: Minimum education is bachelor’s degree of mechatronic engineering or electronic & automation related field, engineer preferable. Good English writing and speaking and be comfortable presenting in front of others Essential computer skills ex. MS office (Words and Excel), Power point etc. Good interpersonal skill, able to work with cross functional team 3-5 years of experience in production process Ability to teach others with tools such as one point lessons and leading by example Mechanical machinery aptitude is essential Fundamental electrical and automation understanding Fundamental understanding of industrial controls Strong organizational skills and self-directed capability Ability to lead a small team of people to achieve a common solution TPM, AM, 5S, Continuous Improvement, Problem Solving experience / training is desired
